wisdom.quote: Men are better than their theology
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Let us be silent, that we may hear the whisper of God
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: God enters by a private door into every individual
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Make your own Bible. Select and collect all the words and sentences that in all your readings have been to you like the blast of a trumpet
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The religion of one age is the literary entertainment of the next
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The progress of religion is steadily to its identity with morals. Strength enters just as much as the moral element prevails
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The god of the cannibals will be a cannibal, of the crusaders a crusader, and of the merchants a merchant
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The religion that is afraid of science dishonors God and commits suicide
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: In the matter of religion, people eagerly fasten their eyes on the difference between their own creed and yours; whilst the charm of the study is in finding the agreements and identities in all the religions of humanity
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: A sect or party is an elegant incognito devised to save a man from the vexation of thinking
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Ralph Waldo Emerson
wisdom.quote: In how many churches, by how many prophets, tell me, is man made sensible that he is an infinite Soul; that the earth and heavens are passing into his mind; that he is drinking forever the soul of God?
Religion is to do right. It is to love, it is to serve, it is to think, it is to be humble
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: When a man lives with God, his voice shall be as sweet as the murmur of the brook and the rustle of the corn
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: God offers to every mind its choice between truth and repose
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: All I have seen teaches me to trust the creator for all I have not seen
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The faith that stands on authority is not faith
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The less government we have, the better — the fewer laws, and the less confided power
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Society everywhere is in conspiracy against the manhood of everyone of its members
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: A nation never falls but by suicide
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Man exists for his own sake and not to add a laborer to the state
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The two parties which divide the state, the party of Conservatism and that of Innovation, are very old, and have disputed the possession of the world ever since it was made
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Ralph Waldo Emerson
wisdom.quote: These rabble at Washington … see, against the unanimous expression of the people, how much a little well-directed effrontery can achieve, how much crime the people will bear, and they proceed from step to step…

Conservatism stands on man’s confessed limitations; reform on his indisputable infinitude; conservatism on circumstance; liberalism on power; one goes to make an adroit member of the social frame; the other to postpone all things to the man himself; conservatism is debonnair and social; reform is individual and imperious
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Reform is affirmative, conservatism negative; conservatism goes for comfort, reform for truth
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Conservatism is more candid to behold another’s worth; reform more disposed to maintain and increase its own
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Conservatism makes no poetry, breathes no prayer, has no invention; it is all memory. Reform has no gratitude, no prudence, no husbandry
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: When a whole nation is roaring Patriotism at the top of its voice, I am fain to explore the cleanness of its hands and the purity of its heart
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The true test of civilization is, not the census, nor the size of the cities, nor the crops – no, but the kind of man the country turns out
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: From Washington, proverbially ‘the city of distances,’ through all its cities, states, and territories, it is a country of beginnings, of projects, of designs, and expectations
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Those who stay away from the election think that one vote will do no good: ‘Tis but one step more to think one vote will do no harm
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: There is always a certain meanness in the argument of conservatism, joined with a certain superiority in its fact
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: These are the voices which we hear in solitude, but they grow faint and inaudible as we enter into the world
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Society is a wave. The wave moves onward, but the water of which it is composed does not
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson (Self-Reliance and Other Essays)

wisdom.quote: All men plume themselves on the improvement of society, and no man improves
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: With the past, I have nothing to do; nor with the future. I live now
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Let us leave hurry to slaves
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: We ask for long life, but ’tis deep life, or noble moments that signify. Let the measure of time be spiritual, not mechanical
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson (Society and Solitude)

wisdom.quote: Time dissipates to shining ether the solid angularity of facts
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Speak your latent conviction, and it shall be the universal sense; for the inmost in due time becomes the outmost, — and our first thought is rendered back to us by the trumpets of the Last Judgment
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson (Self-Reliance and Other Essays)

wisdom.quote: A man builds a fine house; and now he has a master, and a task for life: he is to furnish, watch, show it, and keep it in repair, the rest of his days
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Alcohol, hashish, prussic acid, strychnine are weak dilutions. The surest poison is time
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: I cannot remember the books I’ve read any more than the meals I have eaten; even so, they have made me
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Life is not so short but that there is always time enough for courtesy
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson (Letters and Social Aims)

wisdom.quote: Who hears me, who understands me, becomes mine, a possession for all time
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Nature is methodical, and doeth her work well. Time is never to be hurried
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The imagination and the senses cannot be gratified at the same time
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Manners require time, and nothing is more vulgar than haste
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: This day is all that is good and fair. It is too dear, with its hopes and invitations, to waste a moment on the yesterdays
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Guard well your spare moments. They are like uncut diamonds. Discard them and their value will never be known. Improve them and they will become the brightest gems in a useful life
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: This time, like all times, is a very good one, if we but know what to do with it
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The sum of wisdom is that time is never lost that is devoted to work
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Today is a king in disguise
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Grow angry slowly – there’s plenty of time
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Finish each day before you begin the next, and interpose a solid wall of sleep between the two. This you cannot do without temperance
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Tobacco, coffee, alcohol, hashish, prussic acid, strychnine, are weak dilutions. The surest poison is time
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: So much of our time is spent in preparation, so much in routine, and so much in retrospect, that the amount of each person’s genius is confined to a very few hours
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: A moment is a concentrated eternity
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Ralph Waldo Emerson
wisdom.quote: What would be the use of immortality to a person who cannot use well a half an hour?
Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Health is the first muse, and sleep is the condition to produce it
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Give me health and a day, and I will make the pomp of emperors ridiculous
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson (Nature, Essay)

wisdom.quote: The imagination is not a talent of some men but is the health of every man
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Few people know how to take a walk. The qualifications are endurance, plain clothes, old shoes, an eye for nature, good humor, vast curiosity, good speech, good silence and nothing too much
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The one thing in the world, of value, is the active soul
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson (The American Scholar)

wisdom.quote: Health is the condition of wisdom, and the sign is cheerfulness – an open and noble temper
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: When I go into the garden with a spade, and dig a bed, I feel such an exhilaration and health that I discover that I have been defrauding myself all this time in letting others do for me what I should have done with my own hands
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Sickness is poor-spirited, and cannot serve anyone; it must husband its resources to live. But health or fullness answers its own ends, and has to spare, runs over, and inundates the neighborhoods and creeks of other men’s necessities
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: We forget ourselves and our destinies in health, and the chief use of temporary sickness is to remind us of these concerns
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Prudence is the virtue of the senses. […] It is content to seek health of body by complying with physical conditions, and health of mind by the laws of the intellect
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: I will say, get health. No labor, pains, temperance, poverty, nor exercise, that can gain it, must be grudged
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The best part of health is fine disposition. It is more essential than talent, even in the works of talent
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Whenever you are sincerely pleased, you are nourished. The joy of the spirit indicates its strength. All healthy things are sweet-tempered
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Intellectual tasting of life will not supersede muscular activity
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: We don’t grow old. When we cease to grow, we become old
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: What is true anywhere is true everywhere
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us, or we find it not (The Essays of Ralph Waldo Emerson)
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The voyage of the best ship is a zigzag line of a hundred tacks. See the line from a sufficient distance, and it straightens itself to the average tendency (Self-Reliance and Other Essays)
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Travelling is a fool’s paradise. Our first journeys discover to us the indifference of places
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: At home I dream that at Naples, at Rome, I can be intoxicated with beauty, and lose my sadness. I pack my trunk, embrace my friends, embark on the sea, and at last wake up in Naples, and there beside me is the stern fact, the sad self, unrelenting, identical, that I fled from. I seek the Vatican, and the palaces. I affect to be intoxicated with sights and suggestions, but I am not intoxicated. My giant goes with me wherever I go
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The most advanced nations are always those who navigate the most
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: I am not much an advocate for traveling, and I observe that men run away to other countries because they are not good in their own, and run back to their own because they pass for nothing in the new places. For the most part, only the light characters travel
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: For the most part, only the light characters travel. Who are you that have no task to keep you at home?
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: No man should travel until he has learned the language of the country he visits. Otherwise he voluntarily makes himself a great baby – so helpless and so ridiculous
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Everything good is on the highway
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: It is for want of self-culture that the superstition of travelling, whose idols are Italy, England, Egypt, retains its fascination for all educated Americans
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Our minds travel when our bodies are forced to stay at home
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The soul is no traveler; the wise man stays at home, and when his necessities, his duties, on any occasion call him from his house, or into foreign lands, he is at home still
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: I have no churlish objection to the circumnavigation of the globe, for the purposes of art, of study, and benevolence, so that the man is first domesticated, or does not go abroad with the hope of finding somewhat greater than he knows
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: He who travels to be amused, or to get somewhat which he does not carry, travels away from himself, and grows old even in youth among old things
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The antidotes against this organic egotism, are, the range and variety of attractions, as gained by acquaintance with the world, with men of merit, with classes of society, with travel, with eminent persons, and with the high resources of philosophy, art, and religion: books, travel, society, solitude
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: He that does not fill a place at home, cannot abroad. He only goes there to hide his insignificance in a larger crowd
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: You do not think you will find anything there which you have not seen at home? The stuff of all countries is just the same
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The phrase ‘to know the world,’ or to travel, is synonymous with all men’s ideas of advantage and superiority. No doubt, to a man of sense, travel offers advantages
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The uses of travel are occasional, and short; but the best fruit it finds, when it finds it, is conversation; and this is a main function of life
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: A foreign country is a point of comparison, where from to judge his own
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: If we follow the truth, it will bring us out safe at last
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The good news is that the moment you decide that what you know is more important than what you have been taught to believe, you will have shifted gears in your quest for abundance. Success comes from within, not from without
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: There is no fear for one whose mind is not filled with desires
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: If anything is worth doing, do it with all your heart
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: A man is not called wise because he talks and talks again; but if he is peaceful, loving and fearless then he is in truth called wise
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Do not look for a sanctuary in anyone except your self
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: To live a pure unselfish life, one must count nothing as one’s own in the midst of abundance
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought
wisdom.author: Buddha
Buddha
wisdom.quote: If we fail to look after others when they need help, who will look after us? Buddha
One who acts on truth is happy in this world and beyond
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Wear your ego like a loose fitting garment
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: What you are is what you have been. What you’ll be is what you do now
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: When watching after yourself, you watch after others. When watching after others, you watch after yourself
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: There is nothing so disobedient as an undisciplined mind, and there is nothing so obedient as a disciplined mind
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Give, even if you only have a little
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The greatest gift is to give people your enlightenment, to share it. It has to be the greatest
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: He who loves 50 people has 50 woes; he who loves no one has no woes
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Irrigators channel waters; fletchers straighten arrows; carpenters bend wood; the wise master themselves
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Drop by drop is the water pot filled. Likewise, the wise man, gathering it little by little, fills himself with good
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: If you knew what I know about the power of giving, you would not let a single meal pass without sharing it in some way
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The root of suffering is attachment
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Silence the angry man with love. Silence the ill-natured man with kindness. Silence the miser with generosity. Silence the liar with truth
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Even as a solid rock is unshaken by the wind, so are the wise unshaken by praise or blame
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: If you find no one to support you on the spiritual path, walk alone
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: People with opinions just go around bothering each other
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: You yourself must strive. The Buddhas only point the way
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Nothing can harm you as much as your own thoughts unguarded
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Understanding is the heartwood of well-spoken words
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Ambition is like love, impatient both of delays and rivals
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Meditate… do not delay, lest you later regret it
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Ceasing to do evil, cultivating the good, purifying the heart: this is the teaching of the Buddhas
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Delight in meditation and solitude. Compose yourself, be happy. You are a seeker
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Ardently do today what must be done. Who knows? Tomorrow, death comes
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: If you propose to speak always ask yourself, is it true, is it necessary, is it kind
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Stop, stop. Do not speak. The ultimate truth is not even to think
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make the world
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Just as the great ocean has one taste, the taste of salt, so also this teaching and discipline has one taste, the taste of liberation
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The one in whom no longer exist the craving and thirst that perpetuate becoming; how could you track that Awakened one, trackless, and of limitless range
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Endurance is one of the most difficult disciplines, but it is to the one who endures that the final victory comes
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Long is the night to him who is awake; long is a mile to him who is tired; long is life to the foolish who do not know the true law
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Whatever precious jewel there is in the heavenly worlds, there is nothing comparable to one who is Awakened
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Our life is shaped by our mind; we become what we think. Joy follows a pure thought like a shadow that never leaves
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Like a fine flower, beautiful to look at but without scent, fine words are fruitless in a man who does not act in accordance with them
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Our theories of the eternal are as valuable as are those which a chick which has not broken its way through its shell might form of the outside world
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea
wisdom.author: Buddha
Buddha
wisdom.quote: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?
Chaos is inherent in all compounded things. Strive on with diligence
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Attachment leads to suffering
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: May all beings have happy minds
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Born out of concern for all beings
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: I am the miracle
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: A jug fills drop by drop
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Every human being is the author of his own health or disease
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The tongue like a sharp knife… Kills without drawing blood
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: You can only lose what you cling to
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: As rain falls equally on the just and the unjust, do not burden your heart with judgments but rain your kindness equally on all
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: I never see what has been done; I only see what remains to be done
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: As you walk and eat and travel, be where you are. Otherwise you will miss most of your life
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: A man asked Gautama Buddha, "I want happiness." Buddha said, "First remove "I," that’s Ego, then remove "want," that’s Desire. See now, you are left with only "Happiness"
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: A family is a place where minds come in contact with one another
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Believe nothing, no matter where you read it, or who said it, no matter if I have said it, unless it agrees with your own reason and your own common sense
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: In the end, only three things matter: how much you loved, how gently you lived, and how gracefully you let go of things not meant for you
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The foot feels the foot when it feels the ground
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: A dog is not considered a good dog because he is a good barker. A man is not considered a good man because he is a good talker
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: If we destroy something around us we destroy ourselves. If we cheat another, we cheat ourselves
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Every experience, no matter how bad it seems, holds within it a blessing of some kind. The goal is to find it
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Doubt everything. Find your own light
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: A generous heart, kind speech, and a life of service and compassion are the things which renew humanity
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Just as a snake sheds its skin, we must shed our past over and over again
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: When you realize how perfect everything is you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Meditate. Live purely. Be quiet. Do your work with mastery. Like the moon, come out from behind the clouds! Shine
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: My doctrine is not a doctrine but just a vision. I have not given you any set rules, I have not given you a system
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: In the sky, there is no distinction of east and west; people create distinctions out of their own minds and then believe them to be true
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: What you think you create, what you feel you attract, what you imagine you become
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Your work is to discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: There has to be evil so that good can prove its purity above it
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: When you like a flower, you just pluck it. But when you love a flower, you water it daily
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you, not by angels or by demons, heaven or hell
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: If you truly loved yourself, you could never hurt another
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Life is so very hard. How can we be anything but kind?
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Should a seeker not find a companion who is better or equal, let them resolutely pursue a solitary course
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Live every act fully, as if it were your last
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Virtue is persecuted more by the wicked than it is loved by the good
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Nothing ever exists entirely alone; everything is in relation to everything else
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Purity or impurity depends on oneself. No one can purify another
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: To support mother and father, to cherish wife and child and to have a simple livelihood; this is the good luck
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: One moment can change a day, one day can change a life and one life can change the world
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: She who knows life flows, feels no wear or tear, needs no mending or repair
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Whatever words we utter should be chosen with care for people will hear them and be influenced by them for good or ill
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: To be idle is a short road to death and to be diligent is a way of life; foolish people are idle, wise people are diligent
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly, our whole life would change
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: True love is born from understanding
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Radiate boundless love towards the entire world
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Love is a gift of one’s inner most soul to another so both can be whole
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Let all-embracing thoughts for all beings be yours
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: We will develop and cultivate the liberation of mind by lovingkindness, make it our vehicle, make it our basis, stabilize it, exercise ourselves in it, and fully perfect it
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Hatred does not cease through hatred at any time. Hatred ceases through love. This is an unalterable law
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Kindness should become the natural way of life, not the exception
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Speak only endearing speech, speech that is welcomed. Speech, when it brings no evil to others, is a pleasant thing
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: One is not called noble who harms living beings. By not harming living beings one is called noble
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Being deeply learned and skilled, being well trained and using well spoken words: this is good luck
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Just as a mother would protect her only child with her life, even so let one cultivate a boundless love towards all beings
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: In whom there is no sympathy for living beings: know him as an outcast
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Let us rise up and be thankful, for if we didn’t learn a lot today, at least we learned a little, and if we didn’t learn a little, at least we didn’t get sick, and if we got sick, at least we didn’t die; so, let us all be thankful
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: He is able who thinks he is able
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: It is a man’s own mind, not his enemy or foe, that lures him to evil ways
wisdom.author: Buddha
Buddha
wisdom.quote: Delight in heedfulness! Guard well your thoughts!
Everything is based on mind, is led by mind, is fashioned by mind. If you speak and act with a polluted mind, suffering will follow you, as the wheels of the oxcart follow the footsteps of the ox
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: A mind unruffled by the vagaries of fortune, from sorrow freed, from defilements cleansed, from fear liberated — this is the greatest blessing
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Know from the rivers in clefts and in crevices: those in small channels flow noisily, the great flow silent. Whatever’s not full makes noise. Whatever is full is quiet
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: You are a seeker. Delight in the mastery of your hands and your feet, of your words and your thoughts
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: See them, floundering in their sense of mine, like fish in the puddles of a dried-up stream — and, seeing this, live with no mine, not forming attachment for states of becoming
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: ‘As I am, so are these. As are these, so am I.’ Drawing the parallel to yourself, neither kill nor get others to kill
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: All experiences are preceded by mind, having mind as their master, created by mind
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one’s family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one’s own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: All wrong-doing arises because of mind. If mind is transformed can wrong-doing remain?
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: What we are today comes from our thoughts of yesterday, and our present thoughts build our life of tomorrow: Our life is the creation of our mind
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The one who has conquered himself is a far greater hero than he who has defeated a thousand times a thousand men
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Transcendental intelligence rises when the intellectual mind reaches its limit and if things are to be realized in their true and essential nature, its processes of thinking must be transcended by an appeal to some higher faculty of cognition
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: I will not look at another’s bowl intent on finding fault: a training to be observed
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The external world is only a manifestation of the activities of the mind itself, and the mind grasps it as an external world simply because of its habit of discrimination and false-reasoning. The disciple must get into the habit of looking at things truthfully
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Mind precedes all mental states. Mind is their chief; they are all mind-wrought
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: If with a pure mind a person speaks or acts happiness follows him like his never-departing shadow
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to yourself and others
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The enlightened one, intent on jhana, should find delight in the forest, should practice jhana at the foot of a tree, attaining his own satisfaction
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: It is in the nature of things that joy arises in a person free from remorse
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Set your heart on doing good. Do it over and over again, and you will be filled with joy
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Should a person do good, let him do it again and again. Let him find pleasure therein, for blissful is the accumulation of good
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: We are formed and molded by our thoughts. Those whose minds are shaped by selfless thoughts give joy when they speak or act. Joy follows them like a shadow that never leaves them
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Looking deeply at life as it is in this very moment, the meditator dwells in stability and freedom
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Meditation brings wisdom; lack of meditation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what hold you back, and choose the path that leads to wisdom
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Whatever a monk keeps pursuing with his thinking and pondering, that becomes the inclination of his awareness
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Resolutely train yourself to attain peace
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Indeed, the sage who’s fully quenched rests at ease in every way; no sense desire adheres to him whose fires have cooled, deprived of fuel. All attachments have been severed, the heart’s been led away from pain; tranquil, he rests with utmost ease. The mind has found its way to peace
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: He who sits alone, sleeps alone, and walks alone, who is strenuous and subdues himself alone, will find delight in the solitude of the forest
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Do not turn away what is given you, nor reach out for what is given to others, lest you disturb your quietness
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The fool who knows he is a fool is that much wiser
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Whatever has the nature of arising has the nature of ceasing
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Unity can only be manifested by the Binary. Unity itself and the idea of Unity are already two
wisdom.author: Buddha
Buddha
wisdom.quote: What is the appropriate behavior for a man or a woman in the midst of this world, where each person is clinging to his piece of debris? What’s the proper salutation between people as they pass each other in this flood?
Let none find fault with others; let none see the omissions and commissions of others. But let one see one’s own acts, done and undone
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The true master lives in truth, in goodness and restraint, non-violence, moderation, and purity
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Offend in neither word nor deed. Eat with moderation. Live in your heart. Seek the highest consciousness. Master yourself according to the law. This is the simple teaching of the awakened
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Life is like the harp string, if it is strung too tight it won’t play, if it is too loose it hangs, the tension that produces the beautiful sound lies in the middle
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Do not believe in anything simply because you have heard it. Do not believe in anything simply because it is spoken and rumored by many. Do not believe in anything simply because it is found written in your religious books. Do not believe in anything merely on the authority of your teachers and elders. Do not believe in traditions because they have been handed down for many generations. But after observation and analysis, when you find that anything agrees with reason and is conducive to the good and benefit of one and all, then accept it and live up to it
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Just as treasures are uncovered from the earth, so virtue appears from good deeds, and wisdom appears from a pure and peaceful mind. To walk safely through the maze of human life, one needs the light of wisdom and the guidance of virtue
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The wise ones fashioned speech with their thought, sifting it as grain is sifted through a sieve
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The virtues, like the Muses, are always seen in groups. A good principle was never found solitary in any breast
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Someone who has set out in the vehicle of a Bodhisattva should decide that ‘I must lead all the beings to nirvana, into that realm of nirvana which leaves nothing behind’. What is this realm of nirvana which leaves nothing behind?
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Nothing is forever except change
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: There is no fire like passion, there is no shark like hatred, there is no snare like folly, there is no torrent like greed
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Both formerly and now, it is only suffering that I describe, and the cessation of suffering
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: He who can curb his wrath as soon as it arises, as a timely antidote will check snake’s venom that so quickly spreads, — such a monk gives up the here and the beyond, just as a serpent sheds its worn-out skin
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: May all that have life be delivered from suffering
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: It is easy to see the faults of others, but difficult to see one’s own faults. One shows the faults of others like chaff winnowed in the wind, but one conceals one’s own faults as a cunning gambler conceals his dice
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Those attached to the notion ‘I am’ and to views roam the world offending people
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: There is nothing more dreadful than the habit of doubt. Doubt separates people. It is a poison that disintegrates friendships and breaks up pleasant relations. It is a thorn that irritates and hurts; it is a sword that kills
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Men, driven on by thirst, run about like a snared hare; let therefore mendicant drive out thirst, by striving after passionlessness for himself
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: When one has the feeling of dislike for evil, when one feels tranquil, one finds pleasure in listening to good teachings; when one has these feelings and appreciates them, one is free of fear
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The instant we feel anger we have already ceased striving for the truth, and have begun striving for ourselves
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Some do not understand that we must die, but those who do realize this settle their quarrels
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: All tremble at violence; all fear death. Putting oneself in the place of another, one should not kill nor cause another to kill
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Anger will never disappear so long as thoughts of resentment are cherished in the mind. Anger will disappear just as soon as thoughts of resentment are forgotten
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: I do not dispute with the world; rather it is the world that disputes with me
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: They blame those who remain silent, they blame those who speak much, they blame those who speak in moderation. There is none in the world who is not blamed
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Those who cling to perceptions and views wander the world offending people
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Whoever doesn’t flare up at someone who’s angry wins a battle hard to win
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Neither fire nor wind, birth nor death can erase our good deeds
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Should you find a wise critic to point out your faults, follow him as you would a guide to hidden treasure
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: As an elephant in the battlefield withstands arrows shot from bows all around, even so shall I endure abuse
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Praise and blame, gain and loss, pleasure and sorrow come and go like the wind. To be happy, rest like a giant tree in the midst of them all
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: In separateness lies the world’s greatest misery; in compassion lies the world’s true strength
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Be a lamp for yourselves. Be your own refuge. Seek for no other. All things must pass. Strive on diligently. Don’t give up
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Better it is to live one day seeing the rise and fall of things than to live a hundred years without ever seeing the rise and fall of things
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty… otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Without health life is not life; it is only a state of langour and suffering – an image of death
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, not to worry about the future, not to anticipate the future, but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Those who have failed to work toward the truth have missed the purpose of living
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Teach this triple truth to all: A generous heart, kind speech, and a life of service and compassion are the things which renew humanity
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: There are two mistakes one can make along the road to truth…not going all the way, and not starting
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: The calmed say that what is well-spoken is best; second, that one should say what is right, not unrighteous; third, what’s pleasing, not displeasing; fourth, what is true, not false
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Conquer the angry one by not getting angry; conquer the wicked by goodness; conquer the stingy by generosity, and the liar by speaking the truth
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: To follow Buddha is to not follow Buddha
wisdom.author: Sven Schnieders

wisdom.quote: If you use your mind to look for a Buddha, you won’t see the Buddha
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: And the Buddha is the person who’s free: free of plans, free of cares
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: Buddha means awareness, the awareness of body and mind that prevents evil from arising in either
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: Buddhas don’t practice nonsense
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: A Buddha is someone who finds freedom in good fortune and bad
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: Buddhas move freely through birth and death, appearing and disappearing at will
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: But deluded people don’t realize that their own mind is the Buddha. They keep searching outside
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: To find a Buddha all you have to do is see your nature.
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: No one can force us to transform our minds, not even Buddha. We must do so voluntarily. Therefore Buddha stated, ‘You are your own master’
wisdom.author: Dalai Lama

wisdom.quote: The color of the mountains is Buddha’s body; the sound of running water is his great speech
wisdom.author: Dogen

wisdom.quote: The Buddha and all sentient beings are nothing but expressions of the one mind. There is nothing else
wisdom.author: Huang Po

wisdom.quote: To awaken suddenly to the fact that your own Mind is the Buddha, that there is nothing to be attained or a single action to be performed. This is the Supreme Way
wisdom.author: Huang Po

wisdom.quote: The words of the Buddha offer this truth: Hatred never ceases by hatred but by love alone is healed
wisdom.author: Jack Kornfield

wisdom.quote: Respect Buddha and the gods without counting on their help
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: Even the buddha does not want anyone to follow him. Even the greatest masters cannot give you a single commandment. They see you so uniquely you, they see your freedom to be so uniquely for you
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Just two small things: meditation and let-go. Remember these two key words: meditation and surrender. Meditation will take you in, and surrender will take you into the whole. And this is the whole of religion. Within these two words Buddha has condensed the whole essence of religion
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: There is no need for God! If you want to meditate you can meditate without God. Buddha meditated without God; he had no belief in God
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: A Buddha is a Buddha, a Krishna is a Krishna, and you are you
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: He taught virtue, mindfulness, and wisdom. These are the three pillars of Buddhist practice, as well as the wellsprings of everyday well-being, psychological growth, and spiritual realization
wisdom.author: Rick Hanson

wisdom.quote: If you cannot bow to Buddha, you cannot be a Buddha. It is arrogance.
wisdom.author: Shunryu Suzuki

wisdom.quote: Buddha says there are two kinds of suffering: the kind that leads to more suffering and the kind that brings an end to suffering
wisdom.author: Terry Tempest Williams

wisdom.quote: The teachings of the Buddha tells you clearly and plainly to make this the most magnificent and wonderful moment of your life. You can train yourself to be free from worries and preoccupations about the past and the future
wisdom.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

wisdom.quote: You need to have confidence that you have the capacity to become a Buddha, the capacity of transformation and healing
wisdom.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

wisdom.quote: As long as you look for a Buddha somewhere else, you’ll never see that your own mind is the Buddha
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: Man suffers only because he takes seriously what the gods made for fun
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: The only thing that is ultimately real about your journey is the step that you are taking at this moment. That’s all there ever is
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: Everything in moderation, including moderation
wisdom.author: Buddhist saying

wisdom.quote: Learning to let go should be learned before learning to get. Life should be touched, not strangled. You’ve got to relax, let it happen at times, and at others move forward with it
wisdom.author: Ray Bradbury

wisdom.quote: Even if things don’t unfold the way you expected, don’t be disheartened or give up. One who continues to advance will win in the end
wisdom.author: Daisaku Ikeda

wisdom.quote: If we learn to open our hearts, anyone, including the people who drive us crazy, can be our teacher
wisdom.author: Pema Chödrön

wisdom.quote: Awareness is the greatest agent for change
wisdom.author: Huang Po

wisdom.quote: Zen has no business with ideas
wisdom.author: Suzuki Roshi

wisdom.quote: To understand everything is to forgive everything
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: We are not going in circles, we are going upwards. The path is a spiral; we have already climbed many steps
wisdom.author: Hermann Hesse

wisdom.quote: The secret of Buddhism is to remove all ideas, all concepts, in order for the truth to have a chance to penetrate, to reveal itself
wisdom.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

wisdom.quote: If you want to change the world, start with the next person who comes to you in need
wisdom.author: Maezumi Roshi

wisdom.quote: We are here to awaken from our illusion of separateness
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr

wisdom.quote: When you do something, you should burn yourself up completely, like a good bonfire, leaving no trace of yourself
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: Wherever you are, be there totally
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: Only the hand that erases can write the true thing
wisdom.author: Meister Eckhart

wisdom.quote: Treat every moment as your last. It is not preparation for something else
wisdom.author: Shunryu Suzuki

wisdom.quote: Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness. If, in our heart, we still cling to anything – anger, anxiety, or possessions – we cannot be free.
wisdom.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

wisdom.quote: If in our daily life we can smile, if we can be peaceful and happy, not only we, but everyone will profit from it. This is the most basic kind of peace work
wisdom.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

wisdom.quote: It is possible to live happily in the here and now. So many conditions of happiness are available – more than enough for you to be happy right now. You don’t have to run into the future in order to get more
wisdom.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

wisdom.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is an attribute of the strong
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: All know the way; few actually walk it.
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: The mind’s capacity is limitless, and its manifestations are inexhaustible. Seeing forms with your eyes, hearing sounds with your ears, smelling odors with your nose, tasting flavors with your tongue, every movement or state is all your mind
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: To seek is to suffer. To seek nothing is bliss
wisdom.author: Bodhidharma

wisdom.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
wisdom.author: Confucius

wisdom.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop
wisdom.author: Confucius

wisdom.quote: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change
wisdom.author: Confucius

wisdom.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
wisdom.author: Dalai Lama

wisdom.quote: Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other
wisdom.author: Dalai Lama

wisdom.quote: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness
wisdom.author: Dalai Lama

wisdom.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: Health is the greatest possession. Contentment is the greatest treasure. Confidence is the greatest friend. Non-being is the greatest joy
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: Wise men talk because they have something to say; fools, because they have to say something.
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.quote: You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
wisdom.author: Aristotle

wisdom.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves
wisdom.author: Aristotle

wisdom.quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all
wisdom.author: Aristotle

wisdom.quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: If you begin to understand what you are without trying to change it, then what you are undergoes a transformation
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: Tradition becomes our security, and when the mind is secure it is in decay
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: You have to grow from the inside out. None can teach you, none can make you spiritual. There is no other teacher but your own soul.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far
wisdom.author: Swami Vivekananda

wisdom.quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life; dream of it; think of it; live on that idea. Let the brain, the body, muscles, nerves, every part of your body be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success, and this is the way great spiritual giants are produced
wisdom.author: Swami Vivekananda

wisdom.quote: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: He is richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: Life begins where fear ends.
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Friendship is the purest love. It is the highest form of Love where nothing is asked for, no condition, where one simply enjoys giving
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Truth is not something outside to be discovered, it is something inside to be realized
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed
wisdom.author: Buddha

wisdom.quote: Most of life is a search for who and what needs you the most
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: No one is going to value you more than you value yourself
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A busy calendar and a busy mind will destroy your ability to create anything great
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You have one life. You’re dead for tens of billions of years, and you’re going to be dead for tens of billions of years
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Happiness is a state where nothing is missing
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Guard your time. It’s all you have
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You do not want to compete, you want to be a market of one
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The greatest superpower is the ability to change yourself
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: People spend too much time doing and not enough time thinking about what they should be doing
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Earn with your mind, not your time
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Most of modern life, all our diseases, are diseases of abundance, not diseases of scarcity
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: That’s the fundamental delusion – that there is something out there that will make you happy forever
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: As long as you can keep taking shots on goal, and you keep getting back up, eventually you’ll get through. Just stick at it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: True happiness comes out of peace. Peace comes out of many things, but it comes from fundamentally understanding yourself
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Nothing you do is going to matter that much in the long run. Don’t take yourself so seriously
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you could literally just sit for 30 minutes and be happy, you are successful
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The modern mind is overstimulated and the modern body is understimulated and overfed. Meditation, exercise, and fasting restore an ancient balance
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Guard your time. Forget the money
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You should be too busy to do coffee while keeping an uncluttered calendar
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Spend your time doing only what you can uniquely do
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Become the best in the world at what you do. Keep redefining what you do until this is true
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Meditation is intermittent fasting for the mind. Too much sugar leads to a heavy body, and too many distractions lead to a heavy mind. Time spent undistracted and alone, in self-examination, journaling, meditation, resolves the unresolved and takes us from mentally fat to fit
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Work as hard as you can. Even though what you work on and who you work with are more important
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Your goal in life is to find out the people who need you the most, to find out the business that needs you the most, to find the project and the art that needs you the most. There is something out there just for you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Most of our suffering comes from avoidance
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: In a billion dollar company, the employees aren’t working any harder than people in a million dollar company. They’re just doing the right things
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A happy, calm, and peaceful person will make better decisions. So if you want to operate at peak performance, you have to learn how to tame your mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: We waste our time with short term thinking and busywork. Warren Buffett spends a year deciding and a day acting. That act lasts decades
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Knowledge workers train, sprint, rest, and re-assess. Inspiration is perishable – act on it immediately. Be impatient with actions but patient with results
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Cynicism is easy. Mimicry is easy. Optimistic contrarians are the rarest breed
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: School, politics, sports, and games train us to compete against others. True rewards — wealth, knowledge, love, fitness, and equanimity — come from ignoring others and improving ourselves
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I don’t care how rich you are. I don’t care whether you’re a top Wall Street banker. If somebody has to tell you when to be at work, what to wear and how to behave, you’re not a free person. You’re not actually rich
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Mentors won’t make you rich. Doctors won’t make you healthy. Nutritionists won’t make you slim. Teachers won’t make you smart. Gurus won’t make you calm. Trainers won’t make you fit. Ultimately, you have to take responsibility. Save yourself
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: When you’re healthy you have 10000 needs, but when you’re sick you only have one need
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Sing the song that only you can sing, write the book that only you can write, build the product that only you can build… live the life that only you can live
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You can escape competition through authenticity, when you realize that no one can compete with you on being you. That would have been useless advice pre-internet. Post-internet, you can turn that into a career
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The modern struggle – Lone individuals summoning inhuman willpower, fasting, meditating, and exercising, up against armies of scientists and statisticians weaponizing abundant food, screens, and medicine into junk food, clickbait news, infinite porn, endless games and addictive drugs
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You make your own luck if you stay at it long enough
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Whatever the geeks are doing in their garage on weekends is what the entire earth will be doing 20 years later as a mainstream thing
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Now the main source of capital is how many "robots", programmers, and machines you have working for you. Those are the ultimate force multipliers
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You have to put in the time, but more important is the judgment. The direction you’re heading in matters more than how fast you drive
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The reality is life is a single-player game. You’re born alone. You’re going to die alone. All of your interpretations are alone. All your memories are alone. You’re gone in three generations and nobody cares. Before you showed up, nobody cared. It’s all single-player
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You get paid for being right first, and to be first, you can’t wait for consensus
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You’ll do better work if you’re bored rather than busy
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The world doesn’t always give what you want, but it often gives you what you need
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Learn to sell. Learn to build. If you can do both, you will be unstoppable
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you can’t see yourself working with someone for life, don’t work with them for a day
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought — they must be earned
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: All the real benefits in life come from compound interest
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The most important trick to be happy is to realize that happiness is a skill that you develop and a choice that you make. You choose to be happy, and then you work at it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You want to be rich and anonymous, not poor and famous
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: What you do, who you do with, and how you do it are way more important than how hard you work
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Trade money for time, not time for money. You’re going to run out of time first
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Arm yourself with specific knowledge
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Play long-term games with long-term people. All returns in life, whether in wealth, relationships, or knowledge, come from compound interest
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I would rather read the best hundred books over and over again until I absorb them rather than read every single book out there
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The means of learning are abundant, it’s the desire to learn that’s scarce
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I don’t plan. I’m not a planner. I prefer to live in the moment and be free and to flow and to be happy
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The phrase that I use the most to myself in my head is I just tell myself one word: accept
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I’m not afraid of death anymore. […] I don’t have the quest for immortality anymore
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The first rule of handling conflict is don’t hang around people who are constantly engaging in conflict
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The older the problem, the older the solution
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Productize yourself
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Less fear, more love
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Slow down, life is long
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Be present above all else
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Be too busy to "do coffee"
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Debate rather than dictate
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Signaling virtue is a vice
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Anything deep is interesting
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Live below your means for freedom
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Busy is the death of productivity
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Desire is just fear by another name
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: To be honest, speak without identity
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The heart decides, the head rationalizes
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A lot of happiness is just being present
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Eventually you will get what you deserve
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Ruthlessly cut meetings out of your life
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: No matter how high your bar is, raise it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Relax you’ll live longer and perform better
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Live the life you want other people to live
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Happiness is more about peace than it is about joy
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Ideally you want to end up specializing in being you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: No one in the world is going to beat you at being you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Good entrepreneurs don’t fail because they stay at it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Ego is false confidence, self-respect is true confidence
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: To a tree, there is no right or wrong. There is no good or bad
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Only through suffering do you have change and self-improvement
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Art is just creativity, it’s just anything done for its own sake
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The people who succeed are irrationally passionate about something
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Whether in commerce, science, or politics, history remembers the artists
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: To the experts, what looks like hard work from the outside, is play from the inside
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you have an unswerving desire to do something, then usually you’ll get it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you want to operate at peak performance, you have to learn how to tame your mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Pick your one overwhelming desire. It’s okay to suffer over that one. But on all the other desires, let them go so you can be calm and peaceful and relaxed
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You’re better off following your genuine intellectual curiosity rather than chasing whatever is hot right now
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The most successful entrepreneurs are authentic to who they are and what they uniquely can do
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: All of the really successful people I know have a really strong action bias. They just do things
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: I want to see truth. I want to see the world the way it is. Not through my filters. Not through my desires. Not through the way that other people want me to see it. And I want to accept it the way it is
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Today in society you get rewarded for creative work, for creating something brand new that society didn’t even know that it wanted that it doesn’t yet know how to get, other than through you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The best way to prepare for the future 20 years is find something you love to do, to have a shot at being one of the best people in the world at it. Build an independent brand around it, with your name, not a company’s name or other people’s names around it. Try to make a creative work, so you’ll stay interesting, stay ahead of the game
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Figure out what you’re good at and start helping other people with it; give it away. Pay it forward. Karma sort of works because people are very consistent. On a long enough timescale, you will attract what you project
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A contrarian isn’t one who always objects – that’s a conformist of a different sort. A contrarian reasons independently, from the ground up, and resists pressure to conform
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: All the great endeavors in life are creative
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: We all get shaped by adversity. All the great things that have happened to me in my life that I consider highly positive… they all started with something highly negative
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Asymmetric opportunities: Invest in startups. Start a company. Create a book, podcast, video. Create a (software) product. Go on many first dates. Go to a cocktail party. Read a Lindy book. Move to a big city. Buy Bitcoin. Tweet
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Once you’ve truly controlled your own fate, for better or for worse, you’ll never let anyone else tell you what to do
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 1. The way to retire is actually to find the thing that you know how to do better than anybody. And you know how to do it better than anybody because you love to do it
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 2. No one can compete with you if you love to do it. Be authentic and then figure out how to map that to what society actually wants, apply some leverage, put your name on it so you take the risks but you gain the rewards, have ownership and equity in what you do, and then just crank it out
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Being a founder is brutally difficult. It takes a long time and in the long run, the people who succeed are just the ones who persevere
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On who he considers successful: to me the real winners are the ones who step out of the game entirely, who don’t even play the game; who rise above it. Those are the people who have such internal mental and self control and self awareness that they need nothing from anybody else
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: No one can compete with you on being you, no one can compete with me on being me, so when I think about what my profession, what my job, what my work is, it’s just being me
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You’re meant to do something. You’re not just meant to lie there in the sand and meditate all day long. You should self-actualize. You should do what you are meant to do
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The best way, perhaps the only way, to change others is to become an example
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If it entertains you now but will bore you someday, it’s a distraction. Keep looking
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: ‘Consensus’ is just another way of saying ‘average’
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: We are going from bread and circuses to cannabis and video games to psychedelics and VR
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Politics is the exercise of power without merit
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A good conference is a vacation that you take with really smart friends
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you can’t delete an email without flinching or responding, you won’t scale
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Politics is sports writ large — pick a side, rally the tribe, exchange stories confirming bias, hurl insults and threats at the other side
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: It is the mark of a charlatan to explain a simple concept in a complex way
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On meditation: It’s self-therapy. Instead of paying a therapist to sit there and listen to you, you’re listening to yourself
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: We’re basically monkeys on a small rock orbiting a small backwards star in a huge galaxy, which is in an absolutely staggeringly gigantic universe, which itself may be part of a gigantic multiverse
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A vacation is a very expensive way to schedule the time to read a book in peace
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Given that the main function of universities these days is filtering and signaling, the best move is to get admitted to Stanford and then drop out
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: People who try to look smart by pointing out obvious exceptions actually signal the opposite
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Develop ‘strategic incompetence’ – people won’t ask you to do things you hate to do, if you’re bad at them
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you’re smart, you should be able to figure out how to be happy. Otherwise, you’re not that smart
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Twitter is television for intellectuals
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: More drugs are taken to quiet the mind than to heal the body
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Guilt is society’s voice speaking in your head
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Self-image is the prison. Other people are the guards
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: On what he wants to be remembered for: I don’t care. I’ll be dead
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: We are biological machines programmed to survive and replicate. Happy is anti-evolution
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant
Naval Ravikant
wisdom.quote: Is it so important to me that I be unhappy unless this goes my way?
If raising children was less rewarding than not doing it, the human race would have gone extinct
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: When you look at the greatest artists and creators, they have this ability to start over that nobody else does
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: You have social statisticians, scientists, and researchers in lab coats, literally the best minds of our generation figuring out how to addict you to the news. And if you fall for it, if you get addicted. your brain will get destroyed
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Suffering is a moment of clarity, when you can no longer deny the truth of a situation and are forced into uncomfortable change. Inside suffering is the seed of change
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Humans are always signaling. Rather than really looking at yourself, you’re looking at how other people look at you
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: It’s kind of a disease – social media is making celebrities of all of us and celebrities are the most miserable people in the world
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Modern society will shame you for earning money, shame you for being happy, shame you for being raised well, shame you for having children, and ultimately, shame you for existing. It isn’t just religion that controls you by declaring you a sinner
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Reality is neutral. Reality has no judgments. To a tree, there’s no concept of right or wrong or good or bad. You’re born, you have a whole set of sensory experiences… and then you die. How you choose to interpret that is up to you. And you do have that choice
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you eat, invest, and think according to what the ‘news’ advocates, you’ll end up nutritionally, financially and morally bankrupt
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The most powerful people in the world today are the people who are writing the algorithms for Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram because they’re controlling the spread of information. They’re programming the culture
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Involve groups in the creative process and you inevitably end up with a pile of pleasing, socially-acceptable lies. Contrast blockbuster movies with the great books
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The fundamental insecurity – most people need faith in something – religion, government, academia. Few are comfortable with decentralized systems
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 1. We’re used to constantly judging things. The act of judging something separates you from that thing
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 2. Over time, as you judge, judge, judge, you invariably judge people. You judge yourself. You separate yourself from everything, and then you end up lonely
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Part 3. That feeling of disconnection, loneliness, is eventually what leads to suffering
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Judgment allows us to move through the world, but it’s also what separates us from one another. If I’m judging my friends and family, I’m separating myself from them. I’m creating a gap between us by putting them down and propping myself up
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The universe has been around for a long time, and the universe is a very, very large place. If you’ll study even the smallest bit of science, for all practical purposes we are nothing. We are ameba. We are bacteria to the universe
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: This universe has been around probably for 10 billion years or more, and will be around for tens of billions of years afterwards. Your existence, my existence is just infinitesimal. It’s like a firefly blinking once in the night
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: When you’re on your death bed, when you’re on your last day, you’d give up every dollar in the bank for a few days, another hour, another minute
