wisdom.quote: The mind that asks a lot of questions is self-correcting
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: Paradise is within you, in your state of no-mind. And hell is also within you, in your very mind
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Distractions really work by exploiting the weaknesses of our mind
wisdom.author: Yuval Noah Harari

wisdom.quote: What the mind doesn’t understand, it worships or fears
wisdom.author: Alice Walker

wisdom.quote: Your mind is an abandoned playground. Left behind in early adulthood, now filled with clutter and trash. Meditation is how you remove them. Then you can play once again
wisdom.author: Johnny Uzan

wisdom.quote: In an age of mental gluttony, meditation is fasting for the mind. Before paying a therapist to listen to you, listen to yourself. Before clearing your inbox, clear your mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Your mind is an ever-producing thought machine. The world is an ever-producing noise machine. The older I get, the more I realize that success just means peace from both
wisdom.author: Jade Byfield

wisdom.quote: It is the mind of man alone that is the cause of his bondage or freedom
wisdom.author: Chanakya

wisdom.quote: The richest people have health, time and peace of mind
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Too many tricks have been played upon the mind for it to be quiet
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: How can a mind that is burdened with beliefs see clearly? How can it be free to observe?
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: A mind that has no fear is capable of great love
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: All the resources we need are in the mind
wisdom.author: Theodore Roosevelt

wisdom.quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life
wisdom.author: Aristotle

wisdom.quote: Most people are about as happy as they make up their minds to be
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rational mind is a faithful servant. We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.quote: Where the mind goes the body will follow
wisdom.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

wisdom.quote: Emancipate yourself from mental slavery. None but ourselves can free our minds
wisdom.author: Bob Marley

wisdom.quote: Hating clouds the mind. It gets in the way of strategy. Leaders cannot afford to hate
wisdom.author: Nelson Mandela

wisdom.quote: When a hundred men stand together, each of them loses his mind and gets another one
wisdom.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

wisdom.quote: The mind is a whore
wisdom.author: Susan Sontag

wisdom.quote: Maturity of mind is best shown in slow belief
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.quote: In the small matters trust the mind, in the large ones the heart
wisdom.author: Sigmund Freud

wisdom.quote: The conscious mind is a bad judge of its own situation and often persists in the illusion that its attitude is just the right one
wisdom.author: Carl Jung

wisdom.quote: I believe that the mind can be permanently profaned by the habit of attending to trivial things, so that all our thoughts shall be tinged with triviality
wisdom.author: Henry David Thoreau (Life Without Principle)

wisdom.quote: As a result of material development and modern education, people commonly seek happiness in external things, but neglect their minds. True, lasting happiness depends on our taming our unruly minds. This is not so much about intellectual development as cultivating a warm heart
wisdom.author: 14th Dalai Lama

wisdom.quote: The mind is definitely something that can be transformed, and meditation is a means to transform it
wisdom.author: 14th Dalai Lama

wisdom.quote: One always feels better when one has made up one’s mind. C.S
wisdom.author: Lewis (The Last Battle)

wisdom.quote: Rather a mind well-shaped than well-full
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: The most fruitful and natural exercise for our minds is, in my opinion, conversation
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: The greatest minds are capable of the greatest vices as well as of the greatest virtues
wisdom.author: René Descartes (Discourse on the Method)

wisdom.quote: If you take care of your mind, you take care of the world
wisdom.author: Arianna Huffington

wisdom.quote: Man can alter his life by altering his thinking
wisdom.author: William James

wisdom.quote: You are not your mind
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: Be the observer of your mind
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: Move the body. Rest the mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A clear mind is a happy heart
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: Your entitled mind is dead weight
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: All problems are illusions of the mind
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: A hasty walk is a sign of a restless mind
wisdom.author: Sven Schnieders

wisdom.quote: Creativity arises behind the conscious mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Beliefs and thoughts alter cells in your body
wisdom.author: Bruce Lipton

wisdom.quote: The world is nothing but your own magnified mind
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Fear doesn’t exist anywhere except in the mind
wisdom.author: Dale Carnegie

wisdom.quote: Answers fill your mind. Questions expand your mind
wisdom.author: Kunal

wisdom.quote: The greatest danger we face is the mind going soft
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: We have more idleness in the mind than in the body
wisdom.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

wisdom.quote: You have a mind, but you are not the boss of your mind
wisdom.author: Giovanni Dienstmann

wisdom.quote: The wiser you get, the less you take your mind seriously
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: When the mind is speaking without permission, it’s lying
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Mind always goes ahead or lags behind. Remain with the moment
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: It is our mind, and that alone, that chains us or sets us free
wisdom.author: Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche

wisdom.quote: The mind itself is a muscle — it can be trained and conditioned
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Your heart is the light of this world. Don’t cover it with your mind
wisdom.author: Mooji

wisdom.quote: The heart surrenders everything to the moment. The mind judges and holds back
wisdom.author: Ram Dass

wisdom.quote: Earn with your mind, not with your time
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas – not money
wisdom.author: Robert Collier

wisdom.quote: Perfect tranquility within consists in the good ordering of the mind, the realm of your own
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: You can’t always control what goes on outside, but you can always control what goes on inside
wisdom.author: Wayne Dyer

wisdom.quote: The only way to conquer the mind is to stop fighting it
wisdom.author: Sven Schnieders

wisdom.quote: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success
wisdom.author: Joyce Brothers

wisdom.quote: And I realize that no matter where I am, whether in a little room full of thought, or in this endless universe of stars and mountains, it’s all in my mind
wisdom.author: Jack Kerouac (Lonesome Traveler)

wisdom.quote: We all have forests on our minds. Forests unexplored, unending. Each one of us gets lost in the forest, every night, alone. Ursula K
wisdom.author: Le Guin (The Wind’s Twelve Quarters)

wisdom.quote: Sometimes our body is willing, but our mind is weak. Sometimes our mind is willing, but our body is weak. Do not be afraid. Strive to extend your capacity but do not be disappointed with yourself. What does not challenge us, cannot change us. B.K.S
wisdom.author: Iyengar

wisdom.quote: When your mind is telling you to quit and give up, remember all the repetitions and sacrifices made along the way
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: Get off your phones, computers, and shut the TV off. Don’t let this fast-paced world dull your sharpest weapon, that weapon being your mind
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: When your mind is telling you that you’re done, that you’re exhausted, that you cannot possibly go any further, you’re only actually 40% done
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: In the past, this mind has wandered as it liked, wherever it liked, at its own pleasure. Now I will control my mind wisely, as a mahout with his goad controls an elephant in must
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: Your mind created the entire world
wisdom.author: Byron Katie

wisdom.quote: Elevate yourself through the power of your mind, and not degrade yourself, for the mind can be the friend and also the enemy of the self
wisdom.author: Bhagavad Gita

wisdom.quote: The conventional mind is passive – it consumes information and regurgitates it in familiar forms. The dimensional mind is active, transforming everything it digests into something new and original, creating instead of consuming
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: If you thought that you were insignificant and had no power in this world, think again. Your mind is actually shaping the world around you
wisdom.author: Rhonda Byrne

wisdom.quote: Your mind has the power to change all of the outer aspects of your life. You create your life from the inside out
wisdom.author: Rhonda Byrne

wisdom.quote: See it in your mind until it excites and thrills you, and you will most surely hold it in your hands
wisdom.author: Rhonda Byrne

wisdom.quote: When we truly recognize that our beliefs are that powerful – we hold the key to freedom
wisdom.author: Bruce Lipton

wisdom.quote: When you transform your mind, everything you experience is transformed
wisdom.author: Yongey Mingyur Rinpoche

wisdom.quote: A mind is like a parachute. It doesn’t work if it is not open
wisdom.author: Frank Zappa

wisdom.quote: Do not be so open-minded that your brains fall out. G.K
wisdom.author: Chesterton

wisdom.quote: Sometimes I think my mind is a monkey constantly throwing feces at itself
wisdom.author: Kamal Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Singing connects the mind with the heart and the heart with the soul. So sing
wisdom.author: I dare you! Neale Donald Walsch

wisdom.quote: Some times saying "f*ck it" at the right time can be a very powerful thing. It tells your mind that you are willing to do whatever it takes to get to the other side
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: You have a mind? Yes
wisdom.author: Well, why not use it? Isn’t that all you want – for it to do its job? Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: If you never change your mind, why have one
wisdom.author: Edward de Bono

wisdom.quote: The moment is always complete. Only the mind is lacking
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: Speech is the index of the mind
wisdom.author: Seneca

wisdom.quote: Fear is what prevents the flowering of the mind
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: A mind that is controlled, disciplined in the sense of conforming to a pattern, such a mind is not free, it is a distorted mind
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: An infected mind is a far more dangerous pestilence than any plague — one only threatens your life, the other destroys your character
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: You’ll never change someone’s mind by telling them that they aren’t allowed to think that way
wisdom.author: Michael

wisdom.quote: A thief may harm a thief; an enemy may harm an enemy; but a wrongly directed mind can do oneself far greater harm
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: Mediocre minds usually dismiss anything which reaches beyond their own understanding
wisdom.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

wisdom.quote: The moment that judgment stops through acceptance of what is, you are free of the mind
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle (The Power of Now, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: The mind is a superb instrument if used rightly. Used wrongly, however, it becomes very destructive
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: The great viruses of our time spread through minds, not through bodies
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Pride blunts the very instrument we need to own in order to succeed: our mind. Our ability to learn, to adapt, to be flexible, to build relationships, all of this is dulled by pride
wisdom.author: Ryan Holiday

wisdom.quote: Mediocre minds are outraged by small insults but passive, subdued, and silent in front of very large ones
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (Bed of Procrustes, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: The crowd mind is the lowest mind in existence. It is the minimum sensibility, minimum consciousness, minimum love, minimum life
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Mind is the illusion that which is not but appears, and appears so much that you think that you are the mind
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: The mind is its own beautiful prisoner. E
wisdom.author: E Cummings (Tulips and Chimneys)

wisdom.quote: You can’t escape your mind but you can program it and beautify it
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Knowing your own mind is the solution to all our problems
wisdom.author: Lama Yeshe

wisdom.quote: Reality never comes as a problem. It is only the ideas about reality that comes as a problem
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Past and future are two aspects of the same coin. The name of the coin is mind
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: The mind’s direction is more important than its progress
wisdom.author: Joseph Joubert

wisdom.quote: The mind in itself has no needs, except for those it creates itself. Is undisturbed, except for its own disturbances. Knows no obstructions, except those from within
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: The mind commands the body and is instantly obeyed. The mind commands itself and meets resistance
wisdom.author: Augustine of Hippo

wisdom.quote: Not to do evil, to cultivate merit, to purify one’s mind – this is the Teaching of the Buddhas
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: Ignoring the mind is a beautiful sadhana. This is what many of the sages did. They ignored the mind out of existence. It loses its influence and its potency when it is ignored
wisdom.author: Mooji

wisdom.quote: Your mind is a prison, awareness is the key, and the door isn’t even locked
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: You don’t become awakened by adding more content to your mind. In fact, those that have awakened say that they actually know less. What comes with awakening is the ability to embrace "not knowing
wisdom.author: " Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: The average mind is focused on the future and paralyzed by fear. The wise mind is focused on the present and moved by love
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Don’t fight against your mind. Instead, try to understand it. Try to see why it’s behaving the way it is. Watching motivational videos will only lead you to fight against your mind. Journaling, calm contemplation, and meditation will help you understand your mind
wisdom.author: Kunal

wisdom.quote: Without understanding myself the mind can deceive itself, it can have illusions according to its particular conditioning. When you know your conditioning and are free of it, there is no possibility of any kind of illusion
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: Mind is mind. The contents might be different but the essence is the same. Understand your own mind and you will better understand the mind of others.
wisdom.author: Andy Puddicombe

wisdom.quote: To go out of your mind once a day is tremendously important, because by going out of your mind you come to your senses
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: The mind requires some relaxation, and cannot always support its bent to care and industry
wisdom.author: David Hume

wisdom.quote: The immature mind compares itself with what is and what should be
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: Fasting focuses the mind – it replaces all desires with a single desire
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: A mind that is fast is sick. A mind that is slow is sound. A mind that is still is divine
wisdom.author: Meher Baba

wisdom.quote: You become what you think about
wisdom.author: Napoleon Hill

wisdom.quote: You become that to which you are most exposed
wisdom.author: Denis Waitley

wisdom.quote: Whatever we plant in our subconscious mind and nourish with repetition and emotion will one day become a reality
wisdom.author: Earl Nightingale

wisdom.quote: If you do not run your subconscious mind yourself, someone else will run it for you
wisdom.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

wisdom.quote: You cannot entirely control your subconscious mind, but you can voluntarily hand over to it any plan, desire, or purpose which you wish transformed into concrete form
wisdom.author: Napoleon Hill

wisdom.quote: Your subconscious mind loves pictures, so when you place a picture in your subconscious mind, it must do everything to make it materialize
wisdom.author: Rhonda Byrne

wisdom.quote: Whatever goal you give to your subconscious mind, it will work night and day to achieve
wisdom.author: Jack Canfield

wisdom.quote: The funny thing about the mind is that if you ask a question and then listen quietly, the answer usually appears
wisdom.author: Yongey Mingyur Rinpoche

wisdom.quote: The mind does most of its best thinking when we aren’t there. The answers are there in the morning
wisdom.author: Alain de Botton

wisdom.quote: Our minds are susceptible to the influence of external voices, telling us what we require to be satisfied, voices that may drown our the faint sounds emitted from our souls, and distract us from the careful, arduous task of accurately naming our priorities
wisdom.author: Alain de Botton (Status Anxiety)

wisdom.quote: Your mind automatically generates thoughts related to the information you consume. Be conscious of your information diet
wisdom.author: Michael

wisdom.quote: Unresolved thoughts, prematurely pushed out of the mind, pile up in an internal landfill – which eventually pokes out of the subconscious and manifests as chronic, nonspecific anxiety
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Our subconscious minds have no sense of humor, play no jokes and cannot tell the difference between reality and an imagined thought or image. What we continually think about eventually will manifest in our lives
wisdom.author: Robert Collier

wisdom.quote: You will learn that the true purpose of meditation is to get beyond the analytical mind and enter into the subconscious mind so you can make real and permanent changes
wisdom.author: Joe Dispenza

wisdom.quote: As you sow in your subconscious mind, so shall you reap in your body and environment
wisdom.author: Joseph Murphy (The Power of Your Subconscious Mind)

wisdom.quote: You must make certain to give your subconscious only suggestions, which heal, bless, elevate, and inspire you in all your ways
wisdom.author: Joseph Murphy

wisdom.quote: Once the subconscious mind accepts and idea, it begins to execute it
wisdom.author: Joseph Murphy

wisdom.quote: What you write on the inside, you will experience it on the inside
wisdom.author: Joseph Murphy

wisdom.quote: Know that in your deeper mind are Infinite Intelligence and Infinite Power
wisdom.author: Joseph Murphy

wisdom.quote: The biggest asset in the world is your mindset
wisdom.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

wisdom.quote: Mind is never a problem. Mindset is
wisdom.author: Narendra Modi

wisdom.quote: Once your mindset changes, everything on the outside will change along with it
wisdom.author: Steve Maraboli

wisdom.quote: The forgiving state of mind is a magnetic power for attracting good
wisdom.author: Catherine Ponder

wisdom.quote: You can’t do anything extraordinary with an ordinary mind. It all starts with the way you think
wisdom.author: Gal Shapira

wisdom.quote: A serious mind can never be in the present. Only a playful mind, only children, are in the present. So be more childlike… play more
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: The mind is just like a muscle – the more you exercise it, the stronger it gets and the more it can expand
wisdom.author: Idowu Koyenikan

wisdom.quote: Open the window of your mind. Allow the fresh air, new lights and new truths to enter
wisdom.author: Amit Ray

wisdom.quote: No problem can withstand the assault of sustained thinking
wisdom.author: Voltaire

wisdom.quote: It’s very easy to neglect to train the most important thing – the mind
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: You train your body on a consistent basis. How often do you train your mind? You should not miss a training
wisdom.author: Gal Shapira

wisdom.quote: Think about how hard you have to work in the gym to change your body. That’s how hard you’re going to have to work to train your mind
wisdom.author: Tom Bilyeu

wisdom.quote: The mind is excitable and unsteady; it is difficult to control and to restrain. The wise one trains his mind to be upright as a fletcher straightens an arrow
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: The fear of being criticized gets you criticized. Get out of your mind. Most people will barely remember your name a few years from now. Do what you want to do, not what you think people expect from you
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: Your mind is constantly being shaped and molded. It gets sharper when you focus single-mindedly on one task. It gets tougher as it is exposed to adversity. It gets happier when you make gratitude a habit. It gets wiser when lessons finally sink in
wisdom.author: Yvan Byeajee

wisdom.quote: My teacher used to say ‘we can polish the car to make it look impressive but if the engine is rusty, it won’t go anywhere’. Look after your engine, look after your mind
wisdom.author: Andy Puddicombe

wisdom.quote: One who has control over the mind is tranquil in heat and cold, in pleasure and pain, and in honor and dishonor; and is ever steadfast with the Supreme Self
wisdom.author: Bhagavad Gita

wisdom.quote: You have ownership of your mind. One of the gravest mistakes to make is to tell yourself that you have no control over your thoughts. If you aren’t attempting to influence your own thoughts then someone else already has
wisdom.author: Bill Masur

wisdom.quote: Understand this: You live your entire life through your mind. If you leave your mind untrained, it will be trained by the society. As a result, you won’t live your life; the society will live it through you
wisdom.author: Kunal

wisdom.quote: Exercise your mind like you do your body. It needs resistance training: Push past pain, take cold showers, meditate for longer, read harder books. Pain is a teacher. Yet most people avoid it at all costs
wisdom.author: Aurelius

wisdom.quote: If your mind is trained well through spiritual practices, it befriends you and helps you. Otherwise your own mind behaves like an enemy
wisdom.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

wisdom.quote: The key is to quiet your mind while in mental hell and embrace whatever obstacle is in front of you with open arms
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: There are no special people, just special minds and the mind is something we can sharpen through hard work
wisdom.author: David Goggins

wisdom.quote: The toughest people had the biggest challenges. The weakest didn’t have that chance
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: The mind has to be empty to see clearly
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: There’s no way that a clear mind can live an unhappy life
wisdom.author: Byron Katie

wisdom.quote: The greatest need of our time is to clean out the enormous mass of mental and emotional rubbish that clutters our minds
wisdom.author: Thomas Merton

wisdom.quote: Strive to still your thoughts. Make your mind one-pointed in meditation
wisdom.author: Bhagavad Gita

wisdom.quote: Guard against evil thoughts, control your mind. Giving up evil thoughts, cultivate good thoughts
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: Those who follow the Tao are of clear mind. They do not load their mind with anxieties and are flexible in their adjustment to external conditions
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: To begin with the end in mind means to start with a clear understanding of your destination. It means to know where you’re going so that you better understand where you are now and so that the steps you take are always in the right direction. Stephen R
wisdom.author: Covey

wisdom.quote: The mind is incredible. Once you’ve gained mastery over it, channelling its powers positively for your purpose, you can do anything
wisdom.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

wisdom.quote: A busy mind, caught up in its own stuff, can make the world feel like a very small place. Meditation reminds us just how big the world really is
wisdom.author: Andy Puddicombe

wisdom.quote: We don’t meditate to change the mind. We meditate so we can learn to be at ease with the mind, however uncomfortable that can sometimes feel, however messy life can sometimes be
wisdom.author: Andy Puddicombe

wisdom.quote: We talk about training the mind, but we are not training it to do something; rather, we are training it to come to a place of natural rest, where we can see life more clearly with a new perspective
wisdom.author: Andy Puddicombe

wisdom.quote: Controlling the mind doesn’t take one to freedom. Controlling the mind adds another link to one’s shackles
wisdom.author: Wu Hsin

wisdom.quote: The real noise is not outside. It’s inside your mind. If your mind is calm and still, external turbulence can’t disturb you
wisdom.author: Kunal

wisdom.quote: Mind is your prison. No-mind is your freedom. Mind is your ignorance, no-mind is your enlightenment. Move from mind to no-mind. This is the whole path, this is the whole religion
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: All chases, whether flow, drugs, beauty, thrills, orgasm, or devotion, are attempts to escape from the mind. Meditation is the direct path
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Still your waters. Beauty comes when you embrace silence
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Just as you wash your hands before eating, clear your mind before engaging with the world
wisdom.author: Mooji

wisdom.quote: Part 1. You were born as a no-mind. Let this sink into your heart as deeply as possible because through that, a door opens
wisdom.author: Osho (Courage: The Joy of Living Dangerously, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: Part 2. If you were born as a no-mind, then the mind is just a social product. It is nothing natural, it is cultivated. It has been put together on top of you
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Part 3. Deep down you are still free, you can get out of it. One can never get out of nature, but one can get out of the artificial any moment one decides to
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: The intelligent come to know the world. The wise come to know themselves
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: Wise? No, I simply learned to think
wisdom.author: Christopher Paolini

wisdom.quote: The wise man knows it is better to sit on the banks of a remote mountain stream than to be emperor of the whole world
wisdom.author: Chuang Tzu

wisdom.quote: Awareness, not age, leads to wisdom
wisdom.author: Publilius Syrus

wisdom.quote: Do your work, then step back. The only path to serenity
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: Ignore what won’t impact your life
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: Knowledge wants to talk. Wisdom wants to listen
wisdom.author: Haemin Sunim

wisdom.quote: Most things will seem important and urgent. You become wise when you realize most are not
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: When a situation is within your control, take action. When a situation is outside your control, make preparations
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: Stay centered by accepting whatever happens to you. This is the ultimate
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: It is easier to look wise than to talk wisely
wisdom.author: Ambrose

wisdom.quote: Don’t go in and hide; don’t come out and shine; stand stock-still in the middle
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: The sage rests. Nothing unpleasant can disturb him, his virtue is complete and his spirit is not stirred up
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: The imagination of the genius vastly surpasses his intellect; the intellect of the academic vastly surpasses his imagination
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

wisdom.quote: Besides the noble art of getting things done, there is the noble art of leaving things undone. The wisdom of life consists in the elimination of non-essentials
wisdom.author: Lin Yutang

wisdom.quote: The coolest people don’t try to look cool. The happiest people don’t try to look happy. The smartest people don’t try to look smart. If you can’t love yourself sufficiently to not live for others, you will be miserable
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: In the dojo, aim for truth. At home, aim for harmony. At work, aim for progress. Among friends, aim for trust. In the world, aim for sincerity
wisdom.author: Awa Kenzô

wisdom.quote: The Master stays behind; that is why she is ahead. She is detached from all things; that is why she is one with them. Because she has let go of herself, she is perfectly fulfilled
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: The person seeking to learn wins what the person seeking to impress loses
wisdom.author: Angela Jiang

wisdom.quote: One is not born a genius, one becomes a genius
wisdom.author: Simone de Beauvoir

wisdom.quote: Just that you do the right thing. The rest doesn’t matter
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: The busy walk quickly. The healthy walk daily. The happy walk slowly
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: The sign of an intelligent people is their ability to control emotions by the application of reason
wisdom.author: Marya Mannes

wisdom.quote: Wisdom cannot be learned from a book. It is acquired only in a living formation…It is "lived". And unless one "lives" it, one cannot "have" it
wisdom.author: Thomas Merton

wisdom.quote: Many a genius has been slow of growth. Oaks that flourish for a thousand years do not spring up into beauty like a reed
wisdom.author: George Henry Lewes

wisdom.quote: When you have success, be extra wary. When you are angry, take no action. When you are fearful, know you are going to exaggerate the dangers you face
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: There’s a time for daring and there’s a time for caution, and a wise man understands which is called for
wisdom.author: John Keating (Robin Williams in Dead Poets Society)

wisdom.quote: The perfect man employs his mind as a mirror. It grasps nothing; it refuses nothing. It receives but does not keep
wisdom.author: Chuang Tzu

wisdom.quote: Suffering is part of our training program for becoming wise
wisdom.author: Ram Dass

wisdom.quote: Genius is finding the invisible link between things
wisdom.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wisdom.quote: The ability to observe without evaluating is the highest form of intelligence
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: Wisdom leads us back to childhood
wisdom.author: Blaise Pascal

wisdom.quote: The more intelligent one is, the more men of originality one finds. Ordinary people find no difference between men
wisdom.author: Blaise Pascal

wisdom.quote: Don’t gain the world and lose your soul; wisdom is better than silver or gold
wisdom.author: Bob Marley

wisdom.quote: Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose
wisdom.author: Yoda

wisdom.quote: The greatest lesson in life is to know that even fools are right sometimes
wisdom.author: Winston Churchill

wisdom.quote: Men of lofty genius sometimes accomplish the most when they work least, for their minds are occupied with their ideas and the perfection of their conceptions, to which they afterwards give form
wisdom.author: Leonardo da Vinci

wisdom.quote: A proud man is always looking down on things and people; and, of course, as long as you are looking down, you cannot see something that is above you. C.S
wisdom.author: Lewis

wisdom.quote: The only thing that we know is that we know nothing and that is the highest flight of human wisdom
wisdom.author: Leo Tolstoy

wisdom.quote: The best math you can learn is how to calculate the future cost of current decisions
wisdom.author: Wesley Snipes

wisdom.quote: Professing themselves to be wise, they became fools
wisdom.author: Romans 1:22

wisdom.quote: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future
wisdom.author: George Bernard Shaw

wisdom.quote: Wisdom cannot be imparted. Wisdom that a wise man attempts to impart always sounds like foolishness to someone else… Knowledge can be communicated, but not wisdom. One can find it, live it, do wonders through it, but one cannot communicate and teach it
wisdom.author: Hermann Hesse (Siddhartha)

wisdom.quote: Fools and wise folk are alike harmless. It is the half-wise and the half-foolish, who are the most dangerous
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: It is easier to be wise for others than for ourselves
wisdom.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

wisdom.quote: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck
wisdom.author: 14th Dalai Lama

wisdom.quote: Excellence is never an accident. It represents the wise choice of many alternatives. Choice, not chance, determines your destiny
wisdom.author: Aristotle

wisdom.quote: It is one thing to be clever, but quite another to be wise. George R.R
wisdom.author: Martin (Games of Thrones)

wisdom.quote: Lead from the back — and let others believe they are in front
wisdom.author: Nelson Mandela

wisdom.quote: There is a wisdom of the head, and… there is a wisdom of the heart
wisdom.author: Charles Dickens

wisdom.quote: What is right is not always popular and what is popular is not always right
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.quote: Only the autodidacts are free
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (Antifragile, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: Chasing happiness chases it away
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Bad happens fast. Good happens slow
wisdom.author: Jack Butcher

wisdom.quote: You will find only what you bring in
wisdom.author: Yoda

wisdom.quote: Convinced myself, I seek not to convince
wisdom.author: Edgar Allen Poe

wisdom.quote: How you do anything is how you can do everything
wisdom.author: Ryan Holiday

wisdom.quote: The way of the sage is to act but not to compete
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: Fools stand in dread of fortune, wise men bear it
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: It is vain to do with more what can be done with less
wisdom.author: William of Occam

wisdom.quote: The first rule of fishing is to fish where the fish are
wisdom.author: Charlie Munger

wisdom.quote: When learning, explore widely. When mastering, focus narrowly
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: When failure is expensive, plan carefully. When failure is cheap, act quickly
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: No great wisdom can be reached without sacrifice. C.S
wisdom.author: Lewis (The Magician’s Nephew)

wisdom.quote: To be popular add to the consensus/narrative. To help society leave it behind and explore
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: The fools are preoccupied by things they can’t control. That’s why they are tense. The wise are indifferent to things they can’t control. That’s why they are calm
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Conquer the angry man by love. Conquer the ill-natured man by goodness. Conquer the liar with truth
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: Your own Self-Realization is the greatest service you can render the world
wisdom.author: Ramana Maharshi

wisdom.quote: In Zen they say: If something is boring after two minutes, try it for four. If still boring, try it for eight, sixteen, thirty-two, and so on. Eventually one discovers that it’s not boring at all but very interesting
wisdom.author: John Cage

wisdom.quote: The universe is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper
wisdom.author: Eden Phillpotts

wisdom.quote: Reading is like fresh food for the mind. The consumption fills you with wisdom. Writing is like exercise for the mind. The effort leads to stronger ideas. Meditation is like fasting for the mind. The practice clears your mental digestive tract
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: Getting exceptional outcomes in life is often about knowing when to turn it on and when to turn it off. When to rest v. when to train hard. When to save v. when to invest. When to talk v. when to listen. When to act v. when to wait. It’s not the act, but the timing of the act
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: There is frequently more to be learned from the unexpected questions of a child than the discourses of men
wisdom.author: John Locke

wisdom.quote: Be wise; soar not too high to fall; but stoop to rise
wisdom.author: Philip Massinger (Duke of Milan)

wisdom.quote: Comfort makes you weaker. We need some variability, some stressors. Not too much, but just enough
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

wisdom.quote: We cannot choose our external circumstances, but we can always choose how we respond to them
wisdom.author: Epictetus

wisdom.quote: If I had just a little bit of wisdom, I should walk the great path and fear only straying from it
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: We know what we are, but not what we may be
wisdom.author: William Shakespeare

wisdom.quote: The smartest person is often the one who skips the meeting
wisdom.author: Shane Parrish

wisdom.quote: Idiots want to be smart, smart people try not to be idiots
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: When I think of all I have said, I envy the mute
wisdom.author: Seneca

wisdom.quote: The emptier the head, the louder the mouth
wisdom.author: Stephen King

wisdom.quote: Knowledge is knowing that a tomato is a fruit; wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad
wisdom.author: Miles Kington

wisdom.quote: It is easy to find a logical and virtuous reason for not doing what you don’t want to do
wisdom.author: John Steinbeck (East of Eden)

wisdom.quote: An erudite is someone who displays less than he knows; a journalist or consultant, the opposite
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: Probably the difference between man and the monkeys is that the monkeys are merely bored, while man has boredom plus imagination
wisdom.author: Lin Yutang

wisdom.quote: Blessed is the man who, having nothing to say, abstains from giving us wordy evidence of the fact
wisdom.author: George Eliot

wisdom.quote: Some would be sages if they did not believe they were so already
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: Mankind invented the atomic bomb, but no mouse would ever construct a mousetrap
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.quote: Losing an illusion makes you wiser than finding a truth
wisdom.author: Ludwig Borne

wisdom.quote: The wise win before they fight, while the ignorant fight to win
wisdom.author: Zhuge Liang

wisdom.quote: Teaching without words and working without doing are understood by very few
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: What the wise man does in the beginning, the fool does in the end
wisdom.author: Warren Buffett

wisdom.quote: A rational person understands people can act irrationally. An irrational person believes people always act rationally
wisdom.author: Angela Jiang

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is an iron shield against the tumult and monotony of a domestic existence
wisdom.author: Kapil Gupta

wisdom.quote: Intelligence lies in recognizing one’s own ignorance. Wisdom lies in the indifference to the pride of this realization
wisdom.author: Kapil Gupta

wisdom.quote: Truth lies in the indifference to self-image
wisdom.author: Kapil Gupta

wisdom.quote: The only thing you control is how you respond. Anything else is just pure coincidence
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Those who talk should do and only those who do should talk
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (Skin in the Game)

wisdom.quote: You don’t become completely free just by avoiding to be a slave; you also need to avoid becoming a master
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes)

wisdom.quote: People are much less interested in what you are trying to show them than in what you are trying to hide
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes)

wisdom.quote: The element move upward, downward, in all directions. The motion of virtue is different – deeper. It moves at a steady pace on a road hard to discern, and always forward
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: I have to tell jokes because you are all religious people, you tend to be serious. I have to tickle you so sometimes you forget your religiousness, you forget all your philosophies, theories, systems, and you fall down to earth. I have to bring you back to the earth again and again, otherwise you will tend to become serious, more and more serious. And seriousness is a canceric growth
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: The sage is still not because he takes stillness to be good and therefore is still. The ten thousand things are insufficient to distract his mind – that is the reason he is still
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: In an age of acceleration, nothing can be more exhilarating than going slow. In an age of distraction, nothing is so luxurious as paying attention. In an age of constant movement, nothing is so urgent as sitting still
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: Whenever you feel rooted and established in place, that is when you should be truly afraid
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: Either you create your circumstances or they will be created for you. The wise man creates, the fool ponders
wisdom.author: Carlos Del Valle

wisdom.quote: Where there are too many policemen, there is no liberty. Where there are too many soldiers, there is no peace. Where there are too many lawyers, there is no justice
wisdom.author: Lin Yutang

wisdom.quote: The most important piece of information there is on the battlefield is where you are
wisdom.author: Jocko Willink

wisdom.quote: Silence is that menacing sage that haunts you with its wisdom
wisdom.author: Roy Gillett

wisdom.quote: It requires wisdom to understand wisdom: the music is nothing if the audience is deaf
wisdom.author: Walter Lippmann

wisdom.quote: A memory without the emotional charge is called wisdom
wisdom.author: Joe Dispenza

wisdom.quote: Happiness is what people seek. Reality is what hits them. Disappointment is what they get. Detachment is what they need
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Gardening is not outcome-oriented. A successful harvest is not the end of a gardener’s existence, but only a phase of it. As any gardener knows, the vitality of a garden does not end with a harvest. James P
wisdom.author: Carse

wisdom.quote: Progress, like evolution, must be neither too slow nor too fast. Too slow means extinction from lack of adaptation. Too fast prevents retaining the benefits of past improvements, hence, again, extinction
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

wisdom.quote: The fragile wants tranquility, the antifragile grows from disorder, and the robust doesn’t care too much
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

wisdom.quote: They think that intelligence is about noticing things that are relevant (detecting patterns); in a complex world, intelligence consists in ignoring things that are irrelevant (avoiding false patterns)
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes)

wisdom.quote: Intuition is unconscious accumulated experience informing judgement in real time
wisdom.author: Alain de Botton (How Proust Can Change Your Life)

wisdom.quote: Mindfulness gives you time. Time gives you choices. Choices, skillfully made, lead to freedom
wisdom.author: Henepola Gunaratana

wisdom.quote: Wise men don’t need to prove their point; men who need to prove their point aren’t wise
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

wisdom.quote: The foolish reject what they see. The wise reject what they think
wisdom.author: Huang Po

wisdom.quote: When hungry, eat your rice; when tired close your eyes. Fools may laugh at me, but wise men will know what I mean
wisdom.author: Lin-Chi

wisdom.quote: The wise man is naturally quiet, subdued, and largely silent
wisdom.author: Kapil Gupta

wisdom.quote: The truth you believe and cling to makes you unavailable to hear anything new
wisdom.author: Pema Chödron

wisdom.quote: A people without the knowledge of their past history, origin and culture is like a tree without roots
wisdom.author: Marcus Garvey

wisdom.quote: Be crazy. But learn how to be crazy without being the center of attention. Be wise. But learn that wisdom is sometimes the art of behaving like a fool
wisdom.author: Paulo Coelho

wisdom.quote: Better to have fewer wants than greater riches to supply increasing wants
wisdom.author: Augustine of Hippo

wisdom.quote: Whatever you’re feeling, accept it. Whatever you’re thinking, ignore it
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Decisions: If you can’t decide, the answer is no. If two equally difficult paths, choose the one more painful in the short term (pain avoidance is creating an illusion of equality). Choose the path that leaves you more equanimous in the long term
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Among the most necessary knowledge is the knowledge of how to live well, that is, how to produce the least possible evil and the greatest goodness in one’s life
wisdom.author: Leo Tolstoy

wisdom.quote: Intelligence comes from meditation, intelligence comes from rebellion, intelligence does not come from memory
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: A great many people think they are thinking when they are merely rearranging their prejudices
wisdom.author: William James

wisdom.quote: People undervalue their time because it can’t be traded. As if pricelessness were the same as valuelessness
wisdom.author: Michael

wisdom.quote: Modern society is defined by an excess of opportunity. We have more information, more products, and more options than ever before. As a result, curating, filtering, and refining are more important skills than ever before. Those who edit best will find the signal in the noise
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: A little foolishness, enough to enjoy life, and a little wisdom to avoid the errors, that will do
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Acquiring wisdom is a moral duty as well as a practical one
wisdom.author: Shane Parrish

wisdom.quote: Doubt is wisdom. People are dangerous when they are certain that their cause is just and their facts are right
wisdom.author: Paulo Coelho

wisdom.quote: Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of others, instead, seek what they sought
wisdom.author: Matsuo Basho

wisdom.quote: We have access to more information, but lack the wisdom of our ancestors
wisdom.author: Bill Masur

wisdom.quote: The only sustainable game worth playing is the one where you control nothing
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: A man’s most urgent necessity is neither happiness or money. It is wisdom. For it is wisdom that he will need to navigate the turbulent waters of his day to day existence without succumbing to the ocean of turmoils or to the empty road of prescriptions
wisdom.author: Kapil Gupta

wisdom.quote: Stoicism is not a matter of gritting your teeth. It’s about seeing things differently so that you do not need to grit your teeth
wisdom.author: Richard Sorabji

wisdom.quote: Timeless: Science, math, philosophy, rhetoric, first principles, creating art and business, family and lifelong friends, habits to calm mind and body. Temporary: Politics, news, entertainment, memorizing facts, hourly work, transactional relationships, drugs and doctors for mind and body
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: My whole teaching consists of two words, meditation and love. Meditate so that you can feel immense silence, and love so that your life can become a song, a dance, a celebration
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Hard lessons are hard to forget. Let hardship be a source of knowledge, not bitterness. Wisdom is hard-won
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: Perfection is brittle. Imperfection is antifragile. The more you try to appear flawless – in work, in love, in life – the less you can "have problems." But if you identify as someone who is always learning and evolving, then facing problems is normal and you can start solving them
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: If anyone can refute me – show me I’m making a mistake or looking at things from the wrong perspective – I’ll gladly change. It’s the truth I’m after, and the truth never harmed anyone. What harms us is to persist in self-deceit and ignorance
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: Renunciation is not getting rid of the things of this world, but accepting that they pass away
wisdom.author: Robert Aitken

wisdom.quote: Take nothing on its looks; take everything on evidence. There’s no better rule
wisdom.author: Charles Dickens

wisdom.quote: You learn a lot when you learn to be humble
wisdom.author: Wesley Snipes

wisdom.quote: I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn’t learn something from him
wisdom.author: Galileo Galilei

wisdom.quote: We should not hoard knowledge; we should be free from our knowledge
wisdom.author: Shunryu Suzuki (Zen Mind, Beginner’s Mind, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: Getting wiser is a combination of humility and diligent curiosity. Without the first, the second is useless: You won’t truly learn anything
wisdom.author: Shane Parrish

wisdom.quote: Smart people tend to ask clarifying questions, listen, put things in their own words, and change their mind
wisdom.author: Shane Parrish

wisdom.quote: True education starts when you laugh at what you already know and realize all the things you don’t
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Someone who says ‘I don’t know’ to a question might know more than someone who answers with elaborate opinions
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: The novice gets excited when he knows the answer; the master gets excited when he doesn’t
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: You can learn a lot from a lot of people if you’re willing to listen and never think you know it all
wisdom.author: Ed Latimore

wisdom.quote: Save your wisdom for people who come looking for it. People would rather drown in ignorance than hop on an unsolicited life raft of knowledge
wisdom.author: Ed Latimore

wisdom.quote: I do not belong to the category of the learned. My whole life has been based on a fundamental truth which can only be called unlearning
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: Do not look down on other schools, but take from them whatever is good. Drop anything bad, even if it comes from your own school
wisdom.author: Bukuyo Takeda

wisdom.quote: Everything must be questioned. Then the mind becomes extraordinarily sensitive, alive and intelligent
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: When failure costs are low, it’s mathematically better to accelerate iteration speed than decrease error rate
wisdom.author: David Perell

wisdom.quote: We’re too concentrated on having our children learn the answers. We should teach them how to ask questions because that’s how you learn
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: The more primitive your building blocks, the more complex the structures are that you can build. Think from first principles
wisdom.author: Michael

wisdom.quote: The wise man corrects his own errors by observing those of others
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: Wise men learn more from fools than fools from the wise
wisdom.author: Cato the Elder

wisdom.quote: We don’t get wise by staying in a room with all the doors and windows closed
wisdom.author: Pema Chödrön

wisdom.quote: Abundance of knowledge does not teach men to be wise
wisdom.author: Heraclitus

wisdom.quote: All I can do for you is help you to unlearn
wisdom.author: Anthony de Mello

wisdom.quote: A truly wise man is always joyful
wisdom.author: Leo Tolstoy

wisdom.quote: Happiness does not depend on outward things but on the way we see them
wisdom.author: Leo Tolstoy

wisdom.quote: A symptom of inner peace is a smile. The evidence is calmness. The consequences are meaning and happiness. The causes are curiosity, solitude and understanding
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: It is perhaps wise to ask little of life and its people, to live as a gentle and inconspicuous human who is here for a short while. Weaves in and out of the lives of a few, asks nothing from them. Then one day, quietly retreats into the beyond
wisdom.author: Kapil Gupta

wisdom.quote: You’ll find more robust wisdom studying what the lives of happy people don’t include. Sever the negative tails rather than chase happiness
wisdom.author: Shane Parrish

wisdom.quote: If, then, I were asked for the most important advice I could give, that which I considered to be the most useful to the men of our century, I should simply say: in the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you
wisdom.author: Leo Tolstoy

wisdom.quote: Your conscious action creates your future. Your unconscious reaction recreates your past
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: If you understand things, if you see things properly, you will naturally, slowly develop peace from mind
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The secret of contentment is knowing how to enjoy what you have, and to be able to lose all desire for things beyond your reach
wisdom.author: Lin Yutang

wisdom.quote: It is important that man dreams, but it is perhaps equally important that he can laugh at his own dreams
wisdom.author: Lin Yutang

wisdom.quote: On the whole, the enjoyment of leisure is something which decidedly costs less than the enjoyment of luxury. All it requires is an artistic temperament which is bent on seeking a perfectly useless afternoon spent in a perfectly useless manner
wisdom.author: Lin Yutang

wisdom.quote: There is no value in life except what you choose to place upon it, and no happiness in any place except what you bring to it yourself
wisdom.author: Lin Yutang

wisdom.quote: My path is the path of stopping, the path of enjoying the present moment. It is a path where every step brings me back to my true home. It is a path that leads nowhere. I am on my way home. I arrive at every step
wisdom.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

wisdom.quote: The essence of philosophy is that a man should so live that his happiness shall depend as little as possible on external things
wisdom.author: Epictetus

wisdom.quote: Happiness is your nature. It is not wrong to desire it. What is wrong is seeking it outside when it is inside
wisdom.author: Ramana Maharshi

wisdom.quote: The happy man is one who is freed from both fear and desire because of the gift of reason
wisdom.author: Seneca

wisdom.quote: A fool sees himself as another, but a wise man sees others as himself
wisdom.author: Dogen

wisdom.quote: The wise person finds enemies more useful than the fool does friends
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: Wise men are able to make a fitting use even of their enmities
wisdom.author: Plutarch

wisdom.quote: The words of the proud man impose silence on all others so that he alone may be heard. The humble man speaks only in order to be spoken to
wisdom.author: Thomas Merton

wisdom.quote: Fools aim for fame. The wise aim for respect
wisdom.author: Jack Peach

wisdom.quote: Praise others. It will bring them peace of mind. Do not expect others to praise you. It will bring you peace of mind
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: Remember: You have only so much energy and so much time. Every moment wasted on the affairs of others subtracts from your strength
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: Focus, not on the rudenesses of others, not on what they’ve done or left undone, but on what you have and haven’t done yourself
wisdom.author: The Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: Don’t ask people what matters to them, watch how they live
wisdom.author: Shane Parrish

wisdom.quote: Understand that half the game is keeping quiet, and carefully watching those around you
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: You never win an argument until they attack your person
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes)

wisdom.quote: I am inclined to think that the power of wisdom is better shown by a display of calmness in the midst of provocation
wisdom.author: Seneca

wisdom.quote: Trade fear for courage and you obtain progress. Trade ambition for detachment and you obtain peace. The wisest are able to be both
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: You don’t have to be brilliant, only a little bit wiser than the other guys, on average, for a long, long time
wisdom.author: Charlie Munger

wisdom.quote: We try more to profit from always remembering the obvious than from grasping the esoteric. It is remarkable how much long-term advantage people like us have gotten by trying to be consistently not stupid, instead of trying to be very intelligent
wisdom.author: Charlie Munger

wisdom.quote: The easy path is only easy in the short term and the long path is only hard in the short term. If you stick with them over time, the paths switch. The short game becomes a headwind and the long game becomes a tailwind. This is difficult to appreciate
wisdom.author: Shane Parrish

wisdom.quote: The best way to protect yourself is to be as fluid and formless as water; never bet on stability or lasting order. Everything changes
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: In the long-run, adaptation is more useful than optimization. At some point, the environment you optimized for will shift. The rules of the game will change. The flexible prevail
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: All learning is dependent on feedback. The faster the feedback, the faster you can learn. Thus, in many domains, the individual, team, or organization with the fastest feedback cycle is the one that wins
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: You cannot be skilled at everything. You need to play to your strengths and not imagine you can be great at whatever you put your mind to
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: Your time is the most valuable resource you have. It’s finite in amount, always depleting, and can never be regained back if its lost in any way. Much of success in life can be reduced to who used their time wisely, and who did not. Your life is your time, so protect it as such. Alexander J
wisdom.author: A Cortes

wisdom.quote: Success is the result of right decisions. Right decisions are the result of experience. Experience is the result of wrong decisions
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: If you feel uncomfortable around people smarter than you, you’re status-seeking. If you feel lucky, you’re wealth-seeking
wisdom.author: Johnny Uzan

wisdom.quote: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: The harder you work, the more confidence you get. But you may be working hard on something that is false
wisdom.author: Charlie Munger

wisdom.quote: Working hard is overrated. Choosing what to work on and who to work on it with is underrated
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: It’s smart to emulate what works. It’s smarter to find out what works for you
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Creative ideas will come to you in the quiet moment in between your thoughts. You are wiser than you think. Be still and see what happens
wisdom.author: Haemin Sunim

wisdom.quote: Focused on the process, our creative life retains a sense of adventure. Focused on the product, the same creative life can feel foolish or barren
wisdom.author: Julia Cameron

wisdom.quote: A large part of problem-solving is the ability to see a problem in its true form. If you’re able to describe a problem in a sufficiently clear and precise fashion, most of the solution will become evident. Writing helps. Write about your problems. It’s more precise than thinking
wisdom.author: François Chollet

wisdom.quote: The wise man lets go of all results, whether good or bad, and is focused on the action alone
wisdom.author: Bhagavad Gita

wisdom.quote: A wise doctor is one who never lets his knowledge predominate over his humanity
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: When you have one eye focused on an outcome, you get drawn to secrets and shortcuts. The shortcut won’t make you better. The secret won’t get you there faster. One eye on the outcome means you only have one eye on the process. You control the process, not the outcome
wisdom.author: Shane Parrish

wisdom.quote: We choose outcomes as goals and treat processes as chores. A wiser approach is to set processes as goals and treat outcomes as by-products
wisdom.author: Kunal

wisdom.quote: Where you apply your effort matters more than how much effort you apply. You might be able to work 10% harder, but working on the right thing can deliver 100x results. Unfortunately, most days we are too busy working on the next thing to ask if we are working on the best thing
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: In order to master a field, you must love the subject and feel a profound connection to it. Your interest must transcend the field itself and border on the religious
wisdom.author: Robert Greene

wisdom.quote: Sometimes it is more important to discover what one cannot do, than what one can do
wisdom.author: Lin Yutang

wisdom.quote: To act with a minimum of effort and obtain the maximum results, such is the way of the wise man
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: Without understanding yourself, what is the use of trying to understand the world?
wisdom.author: Ramana Maharshi

wisdom.quote: A person who know little likes to talk, and one who knows much mostly keeps silent. This is because a person who knows little thinks that everything he knows is important, and wants to tell everyone. A person who knows much also knows that there is much more he doesn’t know. That’s why he speaks only when it is necessary to speak, and when he is not asked questions, he keeps his silence
wisdom.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

wisdom.quote: Wisdom waits for you to be silent enough to hear. B. D
wisdom.author: Schiers

wisdom.quote: Perhaps wisdom is realizing how small I am, and unwise, and how far I have yet to go
wisdom.author: Anthony Bourdain

wisdom.quote: The source of wisdom is whatever is happening to us right at this very instant
wisdom.author: Pema Chödrön

wisdom.quote: All the gold on the earth is not enough to exchange for virtue
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.quote: Be like a warrior with the process, be like water with the results
wisdom.author: Nate Miyaki

wisdom.quote: The perfect man uses his mind as a mirror. It grasps nothing. It regrets nothing. It receives but does not keep
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: Man’s primary art is virtue itself
wisdom.author: Seneca

wisdom.quote: Knowledge is discovered collectively, wisdom is rediscovered individually
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Spend your money on the things money can buy. Spend your time on the things money can’t buy
wisdom.author: Haruki Murakami (The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle)

wisdom.quote: Only when someone refuses to do certain things will he be capable of doing great things
wisdom.author: Mencius

wisdom.quote: Sometimes taking time is actually a shortcut
wisdom.author: Haruki Murakami

wisdom.quote: People who know little are usually great talkers, while men who know much say little
wisdom.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

wisdom.quote: Knowledge creates noise. Understanding creates silence. Wisdom creates peace
wisdom.author: Sven Schnieders

wisdom.quote: Ancient wisdom is the medicine for the modern world
wisdom.author: Don Howard

wisdom.quote: Do everything as if it were the only thing in the world that mattered, while all the time knowing that it doesn’t matter at all
wisdom.author: Pema Chödrön

wisdom.quote: When you break your life down to first principles, all you have is two key variables: 1. Time. 2. Energy. Invest it like your life depends on it. Because it literally does
wisdom.author: George Mack

wisdom.quote: The best advice doesn’t specify what to do. It highlights blind spots in our thinking and helps us clarify our priorities
wisdom.author: Adam Grant

wisdom.quote: Preparation. Patience. Discipline. Objectivity
wisdom.author: Charlie Munger (On his most fundamental guiding principles)

wisdom.quote: No drives, no compulsions, no needs, no attractions; when your affairs are under control you are free
wisdom.author: Chuang Tzu

wisdom.quote: The sage shuns excess, shuns grandiosity, shuns arrogance
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is a quality, not an accumulation
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: Only when you ask nothing of the world can you be truly free
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: Wisdom lies in correctly discerning where we are free to mould reality according to our wishes and where we must accept the unalterable with tranquillity
wisdom.author: Alain de Botton (The Consolations of Philosophy)

wisdom.quote: Be extraordinary in your excellence, if you like, but be ordinary in your display of it. The more light a torch gives, the more it burns away and the nearer ‘tis to going out. Show yourself less and you will be rewarded by being esteemed more
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: Do not seek fame. Do not make plans. Do not be absorbed by activities. Do not think that you know. Be aware of all that is and dwell in the infinite. Wander where there is no path. Be all that heaven gave you, but act as though you have received nothing. Be empty, that is all
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: When an archer shoots for enjoyment, he has all his skill; when he shoots for a brass buckle, he gets nervous; when he shoots for a prize of gold, he begins to see two targets
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: The man of contentment seeks nothing that he doesn’t have and understands that whatever he has isn’t his to own
wisdom.author: Wu Hsin

wisdom.quote: One thousand days of lessons for discipline; ten thousand days of lessons for mastery
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: Wisdom comes to those who learn nothing, unlearn everything. That transformation is the consequence not of something done, but of something dropped
wisdom.author: Anthony de Mello

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is knowing what to do next; virtue is doing it
wisdom.author: David Star Jordan

wisdom.quote: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom
wisdom.author: Bertrand Russell

wisdom.quote: Meditation brings understanding. Understanding brings peace. Peace brings happiness
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: And once you are awake, you shall remain awake eternally
wisdom.author: Friedrich Nietzsche (Thus Spoke Zarathustra)

wisdom.quote: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so
wisdom.author: William Shakespeare

wisdom.quote: Knowledge divorced from justice is cunning, not wisdom
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.quote: The whole is more than the sum of the parts
wisdom.author: Aristotle

wisdom.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: Are you not ashamed of heaping up the greatest amount of money and honour and reputation, and caring so little about wisdom and truth and the greatest improvement of the soul?
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: The attempt to combine wisdom and power has only rarely been successful and then only for a short while
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.quote: One must know oneself. Even if it does not help in finding truth, at least it helps in running one’s life, and nothing is more proper
wisdom.author: Blaise Pascal

wisdom.quote: The truly great man is he who would master no one, and who would be mastered by none
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: You only have to do a very few things right in your life so long as you don’t do too many things wrong
wisdom.author: Warren Buffett

wisdom.quote: Reading makes a full man, meditation a profound man, discourse a clear man
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.quote: Wrong does not cease to be wrong because the majority share in it
wisdom.author: Leo Tolstoy

wisdom.quote: It is better to imitate ancient than modern work
wisdom.author: Leonardo da Vinci

wisdom.quote: One can pass on knowledge but not wisdom. One can find wisdom, one can live it, one can be supported by it, one can work wonders with it, but one cannot speak it or teach it
wisdom.author: Hermann Hesse

wisdom.quote: The Sage puts his own views behind so ends up ahead. He stays a witness to life so he endures
wisdom.author: What could he grab for that he does not already have? What could he do for himself that the universe itself has not already done? Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

wisdom.quote: He who chases two hares will catch neither
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: I have often regretted my speech, never my silence
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: Knowledge is real knowledge only when it is acquired by the efforts of your intellect, not by memory. Only when we forget what we were taught do we start to have real knowledge
wisdom.author: Henry David Thoreau

wisdom.quote: The errors of great men are venerable because they are more fruitful than the truths of little men
wisdom.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

wisdom.quote: The happiest is he who suffers least; the most miserable is he who enjoys least
wisdom.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

wisdom.quote: Let us permit Nature to take her own ways; she better understands her own affairs than we
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: Stupidity and wisdom meet in the same centre of sentiment and resolution, in the suffering of human accidents
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: Cautious silence is the holy of holies of worldly wisdom
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: It is far easier to prevent than to rectify
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: The Way is in training
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: Preparation over prediction
wisdom.author: Shane Parrish

wisdom.quote: Enough is as good as a feast
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: Do nothing which is of no use
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: Slow is smooth. Smooth is fast
wisdom.author: Military saying

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is acquired by meditation
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: In all things have no preferences
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: You can convert peace to happiness
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Wisdom naturally leads to indifference
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: The Tao is near and people seek it far away
wisdom.author: Mencius

wisdom.quote: No fear, no hesitation, no surprise, no doubt
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: It is a bad plan that admits of no modification
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: To know much is often the cause of doubting more
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: Having answers is great. Having questions is greater
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Whatever you can lose, you should reckon of no account
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: Whoever will be cured of ignorance, let him confess it
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: If experience is the mother of wisdom, pain is the father
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: You are happy when you are rich in time and poor in desire
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: Get beyond love and grief: exist for the good of man
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: Look back and be grateful. Look ahead and be hopeful. Look around and be helpful
wisdom.author: Paulo Coelho

wisdom.quote: When action grows unprofitable, gather information; when information grows unprofitable, sleep. Ursula K
wisdom.author: Le Guin (The Left Hand of Darkness)

wisdom.quote: Certainly, if he still has himself, a man of understanding has lost nothing
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: The birth of all things is weak and tender; and therefore we should have our eyes intent on beginnings
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: The loving say yes to almost everything. The successful say no to almost everything. The happy talk to almost everybody. The wise listen to almost everybody
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: It’s our responsibility to work with vision, determination and wisdom to create a happier, more peaceful world. We need to take action, while respecting others and their needs, considering all 7 billion human beings alive today as belonging to one human family
wisdom.author: 14th Dalai Lama

wisdom.quote: Remember this principle when something threatens to cause you pain: the thing itself was no misfortune at all; to endure it and prevail is great good fortune
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: If you work hard to do what is right, do not be upset by roadblocks; think about how many of the things in your life haven’t turned out as you wanted them to, but as they should have
wisdom.author: Musonius Rufus

wisdom.quote: The virtuous man may not have to stand alone, but he must be willing to
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: Knowing isn’t doing. Certificates aren’t competence. A plan isn’t implementation. Ideas aren’t invoices. Revenue isn’t profit. "No" isn’t the end
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: The Sage is like Heaven and Earth. To him none are especially dear nor is there anyone he disfavors. He gives and gives without condition offering his treasure to everyone
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

wisdom.quote: The Sage rules by stilling minds and opening hearts, by filling bellies and strengthening bones. He shows people how to be simple and live without desires, to be content and not look for other ways
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

wisdom.quote: Part 1. The Sage acts without action and teaches without talking. All things flourish around him and he does not refuse any one of them. He gives but not to receive
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

wisdom.quote: Part 2. He works but not for reward. He completes but not for results. He does nothing for himself in this passing world so nothing he does ever passes
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

wisdom.quote: Choose the path that leaves you more equanimous in the long term
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: When you want wisdom and insight as badly as you want to breathe, it is then you shall have it
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: The loudest voice rarely carries the most wisdom
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: We’ve got a lot of experience of not having any experience
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett

wisdom.quote: The only Zen you’ll find on mountain tops is the Zen you bring up there with you
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: Also in learning it is a subtle plan of the pupil to contradict the master, who thereupon takes pains to explain the truth more thoroughly and with more force, so that a moderate contradiction produces complete instruction
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: Acquire worldly wisdom and adjust your behaviour accordingly. If your new behaviour hives you a little temporary unpopularity with your peer group… then to hell with them
wisdom.author: Charlie Munger

wisdom.quote: I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day. E.B
wisdom.author: White

wisdom.quote: Better to be tentative than to be recklessly sure – to be an apprentice at sixty, than to present oneself as a doctor at ten
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: Dogs look up to you, cats look down on you. Give me a pig. He just looks you in the eye and treats you as an equal
wisdom.author: Winston Churchill

wisdom.quote: How many legs does a dog have if you call the tail a leg? Four. Calling a tail a leg doesn’t make it a leg
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: Advice from a failed practitioner will be better than from a successful theorist
wisdom.author: Michael

wisdom.quote: Let others praise ancient times; I am glad I was born in these
wisdom.author: Ovid

wisdom.quote: It is folly to punish your neighbour by fire when you live next door
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: Nothing matters
wisdom.author: Kapil Gupta

wisdom.quote: Your preciousness lies in your essence; it cannot be lost by anything that happens
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: Generally speaking, the Way of the warrior is resolute acceptance of death
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: Nothing is more terrible than ignorance in action
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: Forget happiness. Aim for inner peace
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Everyone starts out innocent. Everyone is corrupted. Wisdom is the discarding of vices and the return to virtue, by way of knowledge
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: The pure present is an ungraspable advance of the past devouring the future. In truth, all sensation is already memory
wisdom.author: Haruki Murakami (Kafka on the Shore)

wisdom.quote: Wisdom isn’t about understanding things (and people); it is knowing what they can do to you
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes)

wisdom.quote: Never trust the words of a man who is not free
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (Antifragile)

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is acquired through pain, not through books. Reading helps you make sense of your mistakes faster and get more wisdom per unit of pain. Pain is the currency. Readers pay less
wisdom.author: Johnny Uzan

wisdom.quote: If you can’t simplify it, you don’t understand it. If you can only simplify it, you don’t understand it. Mastery is feeling comfortable across the spectrum of complexity
wisdom.author: Johnny Uzan

wisdom.quote: Nothing is durable, whether for an individual or for a society; the destinies of men and cities alike sweep onwards
wisdom.author: Seneca

wisdom.quote: When you see someone who is worthy, concentrate upon becoming their equal; when you see someone who is unworthy, use this as an opportunity to look within yourself
wisdom.author: Confucius

wisdom.quote: People who have depth often appear serious and people who are light often seem flaky. A childlike simplicity along with the depth of a thousand year old, fun with wisdom is a rare combination
wisdom.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

wisdom.quote: All snowflakes eventually melt
wisdom.author: Ed Latimore

wisdom.quote: Everybody is full of wisdom for others, but struggle to apply for themselves
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: Wisdom need not be sought. When the barriers have been removed, it will come
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: To practice death is to practice freedom. A man who has learned how to die has unlearned how to be a slave
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: Stop struggling against the fact that nothing’s solid to begin with and things don’t last
wisdom.author: Pema Chödrön

wisdom.quote: Preparations for war should be long in making, that victory may be the more speedy
