wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: He who possesseth little is so much the less possessed
wisdom.author: Blessed be moderate poverty! Friedrich Nietzsche

wisdom.quote: Buddhism itself is all about empowering yourself, not about getting what you want
wisdom.author: Pema Chödrön

wisdom.quote: True straightness seems crooked. True wisdom seems foolish. True art seems artless
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: The sage is fluid. He has no shape of his own. He is like water which takes the form of the vessel through which it passes. He has no rigidity of ego. Thus he is in perfect harmony with what is. In his formlessness he becomes one with existence
wisdom.author: Unknown

wisdom.quote: It is the act of an ill-instructed man to blame others for his own bad condition; it is the act of one who has begun to be instructed, to lay the blame on himself; and of one whose instruction is completed, neither to blame another, nor himself
wisdom.author: Epictetus

wisdom.quote: When people come to you for advice on a decision, resist the urge to give them an answer. People rarely need to hear your conclusion. They benefit from hearing your thought process and your perspective on the relevant criteria for making the choice
wisdom.author: Adam Grant

wisdom.quote: Good mentors help you follow their path. Great mentors help you navigate your own path
wisdom.author: Adam Grant

wisdom.quote: In their seeking, wisdom and madness are one and the same. On the path of love, friend and stranger are one and the same
wisdom.author: Rumi

wisdom.quote: To become empty is to become one with the divine – this is the Way
wisdom.author: Awa Kenzō

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is not an answer, it’s a question, it’s not knowledge, it’s curiosity, it’s not fear, it’s love
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: The intuitive recognition of the instant, thus reality… is the highest act of wisdom. D.T
wisdom.author: Suzuki

wisdom.quote: A wise person is someone who usually knows the right thing to do
wisdom.author: Paul Graham

wisdom.quote: The man of Tao remains unknown. Perfect virtue produces nothing. No self is true Self. And the greatest man is nobody
wisdom.author: Chuang Tzu

wisdom.quote: The sage keeps her wisdom to herself, while ordinary people flaunt their knowledge
wisdom.author: Chuang Tzu

wisdom.quote: Taoism isn’t a process of learning more facts or greater skills, it is the unlearning of wrong habits and opinions
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: The perfect man has no self; the holy man has no merit; the sage has no fame
wisdom.author: Lie Yukou

wisdom.quote: When you understand certain things and they become a part of you, you naturally become a more peaceful person
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: Be detached from desire your whole life long
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: It is not possible to live well today unless you treat it as your last day
wisdom.author: Musonius Rufus

wisdom.quote: You may be capable of great things, but life consists of small things
wisdom.author: Deng Ming-Dao

wisdom.quote: Freedom cannot be organized, and when it is it ceases to be freedom
wisdom.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: There is no knowledge so hard to acquire as the knowledge of how to live this life well and naturally
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: If you’re looking for perfect investment; you’ll never be able to invest. If you’re looking for perfect spouse; you’ll never get married. If you’re looking for perfect job; you’ve to remain unemployed. If you’re looking for perfect life; you’ll never enjoy living. D
wisdom.author: Muthukrishnan

wisdom.quote: 99% of information is noise. 99% of interactions are fake. 99% of opportunities are traps. Life is a search for the 1%
wisdom.author: Johnny Uzan

wisdom.quote: You don’t have a lot of envy, you don’t have a lot of resentment, you don’t overspend your income, you stay cheerful in spite of your troubles, you deal with reliable people and you do what you’re supposed to do. All these simple rules work so well to make your life better
wisdom.author: Charlie Munger (One of the richest man in the world)

wisdom.quote: I don’t feel that it is necessary to know exactly what I am. The main interest in life and work is to become someone else that you were not in the beginning
wisdom.author: Michel Foucault

wisdom.quote: Sometimes the wisdom of our hearts proves to be deeper than the insight of our brains. And sometimes the most reasonable thing is not to try to be too reasonable. Viktor E
wisdom.author: Frankl (The Will to Meaning)

wisdom.quote: Meditation brings self-knowledge which brings indifference to what others think
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: The definition of wisdom is focusing on what you control, letting go of what you can’t control, and recognizing the difference
wisdom.author: Mark Manson

wisdom.quote: Wisdom comes with the ability to be still. Just look and just listen. No more is needed. Being still, looking, and listening activates the non-conceptual intelligence within you. Let stillness direct your words and actions
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: The world is a spiritual vessel and cannot be forced. Whoever forces it spoils it. Whoever grasps it loses it
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: One seeks and seeks, but cannot find. One then gives up, and the answer comes by itself
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: Each of us finds his unique vehicle for sharing with others his bit of wisdom
wisdom.author: Ram Dass

wisdom.quote: Information is just bits of data. Knowledge is putting them together. Wisdom is transcending them
wisdom.author: Ram Dass

wisdom.quote: What we call the present is given shape by an accumulation of the past
wisdom.author: Haruki Murakami (1Q84)

wisdom.quote: Everything fades so quickly; turns into legend, and soon oblivion covers it
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: Every man hears only what he understands
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: The first problem for all of us, men and women, is not to learn, but to unlearn
wisdom.author: Gloria Steinem

wisdom.quote: I want, once and for all, not to know many things. Wisdom requires moderation in knowledge as in other things
wisdom.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

wisdom.quote: Knowledge is overrated. Wisdom is underrated. It’s not accumulation that counts, it’s what you do with it
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Learned we may be with another man’s learning: we can only be wise with wisdom of our own
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: Ridding oneself of ignorance is worth more than the acquisition of knowledge. With memory gone the past is gone relinquishing hopes and fears The future is gone. The present is upon you. In every moment. You are free
wisdom.author: Wu Hsin

wisdom.quote: A man cannot understand the art he is studying if he only looks for the end result without taking the time to delve deeply into the reasoning of the study
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: Learning must never cease… The noble person who studies widely and examines himself each day will become clear in his knowing and faultless in his conduct
wisdom.author: Xunzi

wisdom.quote: Knowledge is an accumulation, but intelligence is a quality
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: Knowledge is not for knowing: knowledge is for cutting
wisdom.author: Michel Foucault

wisdom.quote: Experts don’t walk around claiming to be experts. They demonstrate their expertise through the questions they ask and the knowledge they share
wisdom.author: Adam Grant

wisdom.quote: Obviously, the more hard lessons you can learn vicariously, instead of from your own terrible experiences, the better off you will be
wisdom.author: Charlie Munger

wisdom.quote: Knowledge all by itself, without deep wisdom, ends up becoming despair
wisdom.author: Ram Dass

wisdom.quote: The guru can only point out your errors. When you drop your errors, you will know the truth
wisdom.author: Anthony de Mello

wisdom.quote: The ultimate test of your knowledge is your capacity to convey it to another
wisdom.author: Richard Feynman

wisdom.quote: Only a man who loves to prove himself wrong is the true seeker of knowledge
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: Reflect on everything you hear, but believe only on proof
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: Science is what you know. Philosophy is what you don’t know
wisdom.author: Bertrand Russell

wisdom.quote: The object of education is to teach us to love beauty
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.quote: Philosophy is at once the most sublime and the most trivial of human pursuits
wisdom.author: William James

wisdom.quote: A little philosophy inclineth man’s mind to atheism; but depth in philosophy bringeth men’s minds about to religion
wisdom.author: Francis Bacon

wisdom.quote: Don’t focus on happiness, focus on peace. It’s impossible to be happy all the time but to be peaceful is
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: There is more wisdom in your body than in your deepest philosophy
wisdom.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

wisdom.quote: Philosophy is life’s dry-nurse, who can take care of us — but not suckle us
wisdom.author: Søren Kierkegaard

wisdom.quote: Constant awareness that everything is born from change. The knowledge that there is nothing nature loves more than to alter what exists and make new things like it. All that exists is the seed of what will emerge from it. You think the only seeds are the ones that make plants or children? Go deeper
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: When they go fishing, it is not really fish they are after. It is a philosophic meditation. E.T
wisdom.author: Brown

wisdom.quote: Let there be no unnecessary expenditure either of knowledge or of power. The skilful falconer only flies enough birds to serve for the chase
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: Zen has no goal; it is a traveling without point, with nowhere to go. To travel is to be alive, but to get somewhere is to be dead
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: There are three classes of men; lovers of wisdom, lovers of honor, and lovers of gain
wisdom.author: Plato (Republic)

wisdom.quote: To examine desire is to free oneself from it
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: The game is not about becoming somebody, it’s about becoming nobody
wisdom.author: Ram Dass

wisdom.quote: If you have desires, you’re human. If you have desires, you’re suffering. Choose wisely
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Maybe that’s enlightenment enough: to know that there is no final resting place of the mind; no moment of smug clarity
wisdom.author: Anthony Bourdain

wisdom.quote: The attachment to beliefs is the greatest shackle. To be free is to know that one does not know
wisdom.author: Wu Hsin

wisdom.quote: Chasing after the things one yearns for is inferior to chasing after the source of the yearning
wisdom.author: Wu Hsin

wisdom.quote: When one is enthralled with the beauty on the surface of the ocean, the immensity of its depths can never be discerned
wisdom.author: Wu Hsin

wisdom.quote: At the center of all desires is the very one that is never examined: the desire to become happy. When one searches for happiness, he remains tied to misery. The two are inseparable. Recognizing the futility of happiness, the wise man drops the search. In dropping the search, life loses the power to make him miserable
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: High-minded thoughts and inner work are one thing, but all that matters is what you do. The health of our spiritual ideals depends on what we do with our bodies in moments of truth
wisdom.author: Ryan Holiday (Stillness is the Key, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: One of the most powerful teachings of the Buddhist tradition is that as long as you are wishing for things to change, they never will
wisdom.author: Pema Chödrön

wisdom.quote: Events give rise to both emotions and lessons. Often we hold onto emotions and don’t learn. Wisdom is to drop emotions and move on with lessons
wisdom.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

wisdom.quote: Profundity of thought belongs to youth, clarity of thought to old age
wisdom.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

wisdom.quote: We don’t mature through age; we mature in awareness
wisdom.author: Byron Katie

wisdom.quote: Wisdom: taking a step back without regrets
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: When you have wit of your own, it’s a pleasure to credit other people for theirs
wisdom.author: Criss Jami

wisdom.quote: Against the great superiority of another there is no remedy but love
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: A sign of intelligence is the ability to recognize intelligence in others. A sign of wisdom is the ability to appreciate the wisdom of others, instead of limiting your learning to your own experience. Possessing a virtue makes it easier to see in others
wisdom.author: Adam Grant

wisdom.quote: You can learn a lot about someone from how they react to a new idea. Smart people ask questions. Dumb people form opinions
wisdom.author: Johnny Uzan

wisdom.quote: A moment of wrath or of pleasure carries you on farther than many hours of calm, and often a short diversion may put a whole life to shame
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: For many, the first step on a spiritual journey is to become lost. The final step is losing one’s self
wisdom.author: Wu Hsin

wisdom.quote: Ordinarily we do not discover the wisdom of our feelings because we do not let them complete their work. We try to suppress them or discharge them in premature action. Not realizing that they are a process of creation which, like birth, begins as a pain and turns into a child
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: Trying to force a lock bends the key, for which reason a truly intelligent man never forces an issue. He resorts instead to judo, the "gentle way" of trimming one’s sails to the wind, of rolling with the punch, and of splitting wood along the grain
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: The sage does not collect precious things. He does not hold on to ideas. He brings men back to what they have lost
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

wisdom.quote: Seeking wisdom externally is what has prevented you from finding it
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: We should keep our word even to the undeserving
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: Put more confidence in your eyes than your ears
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: If you are a mariner, let landsmen’s business alone
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: In abundance prepare for scarcity
wisdom.author: Mencius

wisdom.quote: Water overcomes all obstacles by its gentleness and pliability
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: To win any battle, you must fight as if you are already dead
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: My secret had been I know what to ignore
wisdom.author: Francis Crick (Nobel Prize, 1962)

wisdom.quote: The wisdom of the head is all about strategy and calmness. The wisdom of the heart is all about perseverance. Be a warrior. Use them both
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: The highest level of mastery is simplicity. Most information is irrelevant and most effort is wasted, but only the expert knows what to ignore
wisdom.author: James Clear

wisdom.quote: Simplicity is the end result of long, hard work, not the starting point
wisdom.author: Frederick Maitland

wisdom.quote: Just because it’s not what you were expecting, doesn’t mean it’s not everything you need right now
wisdom.author: Paulo Coelho

wisdom.quote: I am afraid that our eyes are bigger than our stomachs, and that we have more curiosity than understanding. We grasp at everything, but catch nothing except wind
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional. Say you’re running and you think, "Man, this hurts, I can’t take it anymore". The "hurt" part is an unavoidable reality, but whether or not you can stand anymore is up to the runner himself
wisdom.author: Haruki Murakami

wisdom.quote: The first stage of any compounding activity is a test, to see whether you can endure linear growth long enough, to be worthy of experiencing the exponential kind
wisdom.author: Johnny Uzan

wisdom.quote: The essence of strategy is choosing what not to do
wisdom.author: Michael Porter

wisdom.quote: They will envy you for your success, your wealth, for your intelligence, for your looks, for your status – but rarely for your wisdom
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes)

wisdom.quote: The classical virtues are all decision-making heuristics to make one optimize for the long term rather than for the short term
wisdom.author: Naval Ravikant

wisdom.quote: If you’ve got a good temperament, which basically means being very patient, yet combine that with a vast aggression when you know enough to do something, then you just gradually learn the game, partly by doing, partly by studying
wisdom.author: Charlie Munger

wisdom.quote: Successful people are those who can go above themselves to see things objectively and manage those things to shape change
wisdom.author: Ray Dalio

wisdom.quote: The person who is in training must strive to habituate himself not to love pleasure, not to avoid hardship, not to be infatuated with living, not to fear death, and in the case of goods or money not to place receiving above giving
wisdom.author: Musonius Rufus

wisdom.quote: It is important to expect nothing, to take every experience, including the negative ones, as merely steps on the path, and to proceed
wisdom.author: Ram Dass

wisdom.quote: Knowledge may help you win the game, but wisdom will allow you to see the games that are worth playing
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: The most valuable insights can’t be bought. They must be earned
wisdom.author: Shane Parrish

wisdom.quote: Quickly done can be quickly undone. To last an eternity requires an eternity of preparation
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracián

wisdom.quote: Do not go past the mark you aimed for; in victory, learn when to stop
wisdom.author: Robert Greene (The 48 Laws of Power)

wisdom.quote: To seek happiness is to invite misery
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: Nothing will satisfy you forever. Nothing will grant you permanent happiness
wisdom.author: James Pierce

wisdom.quote: Because happiness exists only in relation to misery, pleasure in relation to pain, the perceptive man does not try to separate them
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: Ingratitude is always a kind of weakness. I have never known men of ability to be ungrateful
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: The man who understands finds almost everything laughable, the man of reason practically nothing
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: Stress comes when you do multiple things at once with expectation. Peace comes when you do one thing at once with intention
wisdom.author: Sharath Kuruganty

wisdom.quote: What is called peace by many is merely the absence of disturbance. True peace cannot be disturbed; It resides beyond the reach of disturbance
wisdom.author: Wu Hsin

wisdom.quote: To search for happiness implies its absence. This implication is a fundamental flaw. Happiness is ever present. It may become obscured, such obscuration being temporary
wisdom.author: Wu Hsin

wisdom.quote: Expectation is the grandfather of disappointment. The world can never own a man who wants nothing
wisdom.author: Wu Hsin

wisdom.quote: No person has the power to have everything they want, but it is in their power not to want what they don’t have, and to cheerfully put to good use what they do have
wisdom.author: Seneca

wisdom.quote: If you can’t love, accept. If you can’t accept, understand. If you can’t understand, respect. If you can’t respect, ignore. If you can’t ignore, grow up
wisdom.author: Maxime Lagacé

wisdom.quote: Happiness is about learning how to ignore that which doesn’t really matter
wisdom.author: Thibaut

wisdom.quote: Be here now. Don’t anticipate. Don’t yearn for things of the past. Let the past go with forgiveness. And let the future go with no anticipation
wisdom.author: Ram Dass

wisdom.quote: Rejoice in the things that are present; all else is beyond thee
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: Happiness cannot consist in things governed by chance
wisdom.author: Boethius

wisdom.quote: Who has the greatest possessions? He who wants least
wisdom.author: Publius Syrus

wisdom.quote: The brave man is he who overcomes not only his enemies but his pleasures
wisdom.author: Democritus

wisdom.quote: A great man is one who has not lost the child’s heart
wisdom.author: Mencius

wisdom.quote: The most important knowledge is that which guides the way you lead your life
wisdom.author: Leo Tolstoy (A Calendar of Wisdom, Amazon book)

wisdom.quote: I respect faith, but doubt is what gets you an education
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The poorer we are inwardly, the more we try to enrich ourselves outwardly
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: This achieving the center, being grounded in one’s self, is about the highest state a human being can achieve
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: What is defeat? Nothing but education; nothing but the first step to something better
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Showing off is the fool’s idea of glory
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The height of cultivation runs to simplicity. Halfway cultivation runs to ornamentation
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Your mind is the result of a thousand yesterdays
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Be a calm beholder of what is happening around you
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I don’t know what is the meaning of death, but I am not afraid to die – and I go on, non-stop, going forward
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The more we value things, the less we value ourselves
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The best techniques are the simple ones executed right
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: It is not how much you have learned, but how much you have absorbed in what you have learned
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Life is wise, limitless. There is no border, no frontier
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Life is your teacher, and you are in a state of constant learning
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Not "what" to think but "how" to think
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Time means a lot to me because, you see, I, too, am also a learner and am often lost in the joy of forever developing and simplifying. If you love life, don’t waste time, for time is what life is made up of
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Empty your mind. You know how water fills a cup? It becomes that cup. You have to think about nothing. You have to become nothing
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: At this moment stop inwardly – when you do stop inwardly, psychologically, your mind becomes very peaceful, very clear. Then you can really look at "this"
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Yesterday’s dreams are often tomorrow’s realities
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Only the self-sufficient stand alone – most people follow the crowd and imitate
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Use no way as way. When there is a "Way", therein lies the limitation. And when there is a circumference, it traps. And if it traps, it rots. And if it rots, it’s lifeless
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Here now, forever more our lives must part. My path leads there and yours another way; I know not where tomorrow’s path may lead, nor what the future holds
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: There is no weapon more deadly than the will
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Long-term consistency trumps short-term intensity
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: In order to taste my cup of water you must first empty your cup. My friend, drop all of your preconceived fixed ideas and be neutral. Do you know why this cup is so useful? Because it is empty
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To live is to express, and to express you have to create. Creation is never merely repetition. To live is to express oneself freely in creation
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The possession of anything begins in the mind
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Our grand business is not to see what lies dimly at a distance, but to do what lies clearly at hand
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: An intelligent mind is one which is constantly learning, never concluding – styles and patterns have come to conclusion, therefore they have ceased to be intelligent
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Choiceless awareness – do not condemn, do not justify. Awareness works only if it’s allowed free play without interference
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: When man comes to a conscious vital realization of those great spiritual forces within himself and begins to use those forces in science, in business, and in life, his progress in the future will be unparalleled
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The happiness that is derived from ordinary life last longer; like coal, it burns gradually and slowly. The happiness that is derived from excitement is like a brilliant fire – soon it will go out
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: If anyone still believes in racial differences, I think he is too backward and narrow. Perhaps he still does not understand man’s equality and love
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Prosperity is apt to prevent us from examining our conduct; but adversity leads us to think properly of our state, and so is beneficial to us
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Pleasure is the flower that fades, remembrance is the lasting perfume
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: There is intelligence when you are not afraid
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A goal is not always meant to be reached. It often serves simply as something to aim at
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Keep your mind on the things you want and off those you don’t
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Empty your mind, be formless, shapeless, like water. If you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup. You put water into a bottle and it becomes the bottle. You put it in a teapot, it becomes the teapot. Water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Simplicity is the last step of art and the beginning of nature
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: You just wait. I’m going to be the biggest Chinese star in the world
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 1. Be like water; water has form and yet it has no form. It is the softest element on earth, yet it penetrates the hardest rock
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 2. It has no shape of its own, yet it can take any shape in which it is placed
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 3. In a cup, it becomes the shape of the cup. In a vase, it takes the shape of the vase and curls about the stems of flowers. Put it in a teapot, it becomes the teapot
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To hell with circumstances; I create opportunities
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Research your own experience; absorb what is useful, reject what is useless and add what is essentially your own
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I present a possible direction, nothing more. It is like a finger pointing away to the moon; don’t concentrate on the finger or you will miss all that heavenly glory
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Remember my friend that it is not what happens that counts, it is how you react to them
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Your mental attitude determines what you make of it, either a stepping stone or stumbling block
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: You cannot hurt that which is formless. The softest thing cannot be snapped and emptiness cannot be confined
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: That of not being tense but ready, not thinking but not dreaming, not being rigidly set but flexible. Aware and alert, ready for whatever may come
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Remember, success is a journey, not a destination. Have faith in your ability. You will do just fine
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: It is not daily increase but daily decrease – hack away the unessential! The closer to the source, the less wastage there is
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: What you habitually think largely determines what you will ultimately become
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: No one can hurt you unless you allow him to
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Empty yourself! Open up! After all, the usefulness of a cup is in its emptiness
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: There is another bit of Chinese philosophy that has a bearing on problems common to all human kind. We say, "The oak tree is mighty, yet it will be destroyed by a mighty wind because it resists the elements; the bamboo bends with the wind, and by bending, survives"
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Ever since I was a kid, the word "quality" has meant a lot to me
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: What I honestly value more than anything else is quality: doing one’s best in the manner of the responsibility and craftsmanship of a Number One
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Defeat is a state of mind; no one is ever defeated until defeat has been accepted as a reality
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The doer alone learns
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The essence: free movement of spirit
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Nothing exists except the here and now
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Those who gain, lose
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The true stillness is the stillness in movement
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A purpose is the eternal condition of success
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: You will never get any more out of life than you expect
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Every man today is the result of his thoughts of yesterday
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Do not precede others, always follow them
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The inner self is the true self
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The truth is outside of all fixed patterns
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A quick temper will make a fool of you soon enough
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Faith without work is death
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: As you think, so shall you become
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Faith backed by action is applied faith
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Thoughts backed by faith will overcome all obstacles
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Don’t strive to become, but be
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: False teachers of the Way of life use flowery words
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Meditation is the freeing of the mind from all motives
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Be flexible so you can change with change
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: When one is not "expressing" himself, he is not free
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee
Bruce Lee
wisdom.quote: It is later than you think! Know yourself!
Intelligence is the understanding of self
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Be "self-aware" rather than a repetitious robot
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The law of averages: put in more, come out with more
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Failure is what your mind acknowledges
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: No man is defeated unless he is discouraged
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Be a practical dreamer backed by action
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: If you want to do your duty properly, you should do just a little more than that
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I don’t believe in pure luck. You have to create your own luck. You have to be aware of the opportunities around you and take advantage of them
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: We are told that talent creates is own opportunities. But it sometimes seems that intense desire creates not only its own opportunities, but its own talents
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Loneliness is only an opportunity to cut adrift and find yourself. In solitude you are least alone. Make good use of it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: One must always strive to be better. The sky’s the limit
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Humility forms the basis of honor, just as the low ground forms the foundation of a high elevation
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Believe me that in every big thing or achievement there are always obstacles, big or small, and the reaction one shows to such obstacles is what counts, not the obstacle itself
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee
Bruce Lee
wisdom.quote: There is no such thing as defeat until you admit so yourself, but not until then!

wisdom.author: Bruce Lee
wisdom.quote: Are you a flowing entity, capable to flow with external circumstances, or are you resisting with your set choice pattern?
Art is never decoration or embellishment. Instead it is a constant process of maturing (in the sense of not having arrived!)
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: An intelligent mind is an inquiring mind. It is not satisfied with explanations, with conclusions; nor is it a mind that believes, because belief is again another form of conclusion
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I’ve always been buffeted by circumstances because I thought of myself as a human being affected by outside conditioning. Now I realize that I am the power that commands the feeling of my mind and from which circumstances grow
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Ideas are the beginning of all achievement – in every industry, in every profession
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The spiritual power of man’s will removes all obstacles
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: It is a fact that labor and thrift produce a competence, but fortune, in the sense of wealth, is the reward of the man who can think of something that hasn’t been thought of before
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Gather materials. Masticate the facts. Relax and drop the whole subject. Be ready to recognize and welcome the idea when it comes. Shape and develop your idea into usefulness
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Any idea that is constantly held in the mind and emotionalized, begins at once to clothe itself in the most convenient and appropriate physical form that is available
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: My will to do springs from the knowledge that I can do. I’m only being natural, for there is no fear or doubt inside my mind
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Recognize and use the spiritual power of the infinite. The intangible represents the real power of the universe. It is the seed of the tangible
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Basically, human traits are the same everywhere. I don’t want to sound like "As Confucius say" but under the sky, under the heavens, there is but one family
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: It is not a shame to be knocked down by other people. The important thing is to ask when you’re being knocked down, "Why am I being knocked down?" If a person can reflect in this way, then there is hope for this person
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: It’s the will that makes men – success takes perseverance
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To refuse to be cast down, that is the lesson
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee
Bruce Lee
wisdom.quote: To be humble to superiors is duty; to equals is courtesy; to inferiors is nobleness; and to all, safety!
Stupidity assumes two forms, it speaks or is silent. Mute stupidity is bearable
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee
Bruce Lee
wisdom.quote: Unquestionably man has his will – but woman has her way!
If I tell you I’m good, probably you will say I’m boasting. But if I tell you I’m not good, you’ll know I’m lying
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: If you make an ass out of yourself, there’ll always be someone ready to ride you
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Do not hold to what you have. It is like a ferry boat for people who want to get across waters. Once you have got across, never bear it on your back. You should head forward
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee
Bruce Lee
wisdom.quote: If you don’t aim at an object, how the heck on earth do you think you can get it?
The good life is a process, not a state of being. It is a direction, not a destination
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Realize the fact that you simply "live" and not "live for"
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: When tomorrow comes, you must free your ambitious mind and learn the art of dying
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Not conviction, not method, but perception is the way of truth. It is a state of effortless awareness, pliable awareness, choiceless awareness
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Mind is an ultimate reality which is aware of itself and is not the seat of our empirical consciousness – by "being" mind instead of "having" mind
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Living exists when life lives through us – unhampered in its flow, for he who is living is not conscious of living and, in this, is the life it lives
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Life lives; and in the living flow, no questions are raised. The reason is that life is a living now! So, in order to live life whole-heartedly, the answer is life simply is
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: What is real is seeing the truth instantaneously, because truth has no future
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Truth cannot be structured or confined. When there is no center and no circumference, then there is truth
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: If you want to truth to stand clear before you, never be for or against. The struggle between "for" and "against" is the mind’s worst disease
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Sorrows are our best educator. A man can see further through a tear than a telescope
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Can you neither condemn nor justify and yet be extraordinarily alive as you walk on? You can never invite the wind, but you must leave the window open
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Because one does not want to be disturbed, to be made uncertain, he establishes a pattern of conduct, of thought, a pattern of relationship to man, etc. Then he becomes a slave to the pattern and takes the pattern to be the real thing
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: You know how I like to think of myself? As a human being
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: We do not see "it" in its suchness because of our indoctrination, crooked and twisted
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Art, after all, is a means of acquiring "personal" liberty. Your way is not my way nor mine yours
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Self-will seems to be the only virtue that takes no account of man-made laws
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Nobility of character manifests itself at loopholes when it is not provided with large doors
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Intensity and/or enthusiasm is this god within us – one that instinctively becomes the art of the physical "becoming" and within this transition we no longer care to know what life means. We are indeed furnishing the "what is" by simply being
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I, Bruce Lee, am a man who never follows there formulas of the fear-mongers. So, no matter if your color is black or white, red or blue, I can still make friends with you without any barrier
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Who is there that can make muddy water clear? But if allowed to remain still, it will become clear of itself. Who is there that can secure a state of absolute repose? But keep calm and let time go on, and the state of repose will gradually arrest
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To change with change is the changeless state
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: There is a difference: the world, our reaction to it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Freedom lies in understanding yourself from moment to moment
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Happiness is good for the body, but sorrow strengthens to spirit
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: What’s amiss I’ll stop to mend, and endure what can’t be mended
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I dare not say that I have reached any state of achievement. I’m still learning, for learning is boundless
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The more we understand, the greater and deeper will be our contact with all that is around us
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Don’t be in a hurry to "fix" things; rather, enrich your understanding in the ever-going process of discovery and finding more the cause of your ignorance
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Take no thought of who is right or wrong or who is better than. Be not for or against
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A good teacher cannot be fixed in a routine. He must not impose his student to fit a lifeless pattern, a preformulation
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I no longer cover paradise. More important, I no longer fear hell. If you ask me what I will be in heaven, I will say this: Why should I think about something so far away when there are so many things in this life I have not finished learning about?
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The waters are in motion all the time, but the moon retains its serenity. The mind moves in response to the ten thousand situations but remains ever the same
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The round of summer and winter becomes a blessing the moment we give up the fantasy of eternal spring
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Right conduct is governed by reason and creativity
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Obey the principles without being bound by them
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 1. Remember, I am no teacher; I can merely be a signpost for a traveler who is lost. It is up to you to decide on the direction
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 2. All I can offer is an experience but never a conclusion, so even what I have said needs to be thoroughly examined by you
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 3. I might be able to help you to discover and examine your problem by awakening your awareness of their cause and effect, but I cannot teach you, for I am not a teacher, and I have no style
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 4. I don’t believe in system, nor in method. And without system, without method, what’s to teach?
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To me, defeat is anything is merely temporary, and its punishment is but an urge for me to greater effort to achieve my goal. Defeat simply tells me that something is wrong in my doing; it is a path leading to success and truth
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To doubt is to think, and thought is the only thing in the universe whose existence cannot be denied, because to deny is to think
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To be one thing and not to change is the climax of stillness. To have nothing in one that resists is the climax of emptiness. To remain detached from all outside things is the climax of fineness. To have in oneself no contraries is the climax of purity
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: An idea, by itself, it not erroneous but judgment makes it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: There can be no initiative if one has fear, and fear compels us to cling to tradition, gurus, etc
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The point to be made about ego is that man should use his ego and not be used by ego or blinded by it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Those who are materialistic still hold onto the ego as though it were a possession, rather than using it as a tool. Inwardly, psychologically, be a nobody
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A person cannot forget someone who is good to them
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: If every man would help his neighbor, no man would be without help
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: We can see through others only when we see through ourselves
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Life is simply what our feelings do to us
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I try to live freely from moment to moment, letting things happen and adjusting to them
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Let friendship creep gently to a height; if it rushes to it, it may soon run itself out of breath
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: When there is a particle of dust in your eye, the world becomes a narrow path – have your mind completely free from objects – and how much this life expands
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The meaning of life is that it is to be lived, and it is not to be traded and conceptualized and squeezed into a pattern of systems
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: He who wants to succeed should learn how to fight, to strive, and to suffer. You can acquire a lot in life, if you are prepared to give up a lot to get it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To many, the word "success" seems to be a paradise, but now that I’m in the midst of it, it is nothing but circumstances that seem to complicate my innate feeling toward simplicity and privacy
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Masters in all branches of art must first be masters in living, for the soul creates everything
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Life is an ever-flowing process and somewhere on the path some unpleasant things will pop up – it might leave a scar, but then life is flowing, and life running water, when it stops it grows stale
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A simple life is one of plainness, in which profit is discarded, cleverness abandoned, selfishness eliminated, and desires reduced
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Life is never stagnation. It is a constant movement, unrhythmic movement, as well as constant change. Things live by moving and gain strength as they go
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: It is the life of perfection which seems to be incomplete, and of fullness which seems to be empty. It is the life which is as bright as light, but does not dazzle. In short, it is a life of harmony, unity, contentment, tranquility, constancy, enlightenment, peace, and long life
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Life is something for which there is no answer; it must be understood from moment to moment
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: We all have time to either spend or waste, and it is our decision what to do with it. But once passed, it is gone forever
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Opportunities may come your way or they may not. Luck may come your way or it may not. But if they come your way – and you call that luck – you’d better be ready for it!
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Even though I, Bruce Lee, may die some day without fulfilling all of my ambitions, I will have no regrets. I did what I wanted to do and what I’ve done, I’ve done with sincerity and to the best of my ability
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Being able to find the correct conduct for a special situation is happiness – not a strict standard for every situation
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The measure of the moral worth of a man is his happiness. The better the man, the more happiness. Happiness is the synonym of well-being
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Truth comes when your mind and heart are purged of all sense of striving and you are no longer trying to become somebody; it is there when the mind is very quiet, listening timelessly to everything
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I’m not one of those guys that can brush people off. Besides, I feel that if I can just take a second to make someone happy, why not do it?
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I like light rain. It gives one such a sense of calmness and tranquility. I enjoy walking in the rain. But most of all, I like books. I read all types of books – fiction and nonfiction
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The inability to adapt brings destruction
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: True friends are like diamonds, precious and rare. False friends are like autumn leaves, found everywhere
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To be perfectly frank, I really do not believe in God. If there is a God, he is within
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I have no religion whatsoever. I believe that life is a process and that man is a self-made product. The spirit of the individual is determined by his dominating thought habits
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Awakening, self-realization, and seeing into one’s own being – these are synonymous
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Faith makes it possible to achieve that which man’s mind can conceive and believe
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Religions divide people, just as styles [in martial arts] divide people
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: If all the religions were one, the world would be united in brotherhood
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Some people fight with others because they believe in different religions. If, however, they only gave the matter a bit of thought, they would never fight for such a foolish cause
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Faith can be induced or created by affirmation or repeated instructions to the subconscious mind through the principle of autosuggestion. This is the only known method of voluntary development of the emotion of faith
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The source of trouble in religion is to attribute to the cause with doctrines, rules, and prejudices
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Live content with small means; seek elegance rather than luxury, and refinement rather than fashion. Be worthy, not respectable, wealthy, not rich; study hard, think quietly, talk gently, act frankly; bear all cheerfully, do all bravely, await occasions, hurry never. In a word, let the spiritual, unbidden and unconscious, grow up through the common
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Discard all thoughts of reward, all hopes of praise and fears of blame, all awareness of one’s bodily. And, finally closing the avenues of sense perception, let the spirit out, as it will
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The stillness in stillness is not the real stillness; only when there is stillness in movement does the universal rhythm manifest
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I feel I have this great creative and spiritual force within me that is greater than faith, greater than ambition, greater than confidence, greater than determination, greater than vision. It is all these combined. My brain becomes magnetized with this dominating force which I hold in my hand
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: It is a well-known fact that one comes, finally, to believe whatever one repeats to one’s self, whether the statement be true or false. If a man repeats a lie over and over, he will eventually accept the lie as truth
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I cannot and will not "scoff" at faith when reason seems to be such a barren thing
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Faith is a state of mind that can be conditioned through self-discipline. Faith will accomplish
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Love is a egotism of two
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Real living is living for others
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Marriage is a friendship, a partnership based solidly upon ordinary, everyday occurrences
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Love, and you shall be loved – all love is mathematically just, as much as the two sides of an algebraic equation
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I think when a couple marry, they either go into heaven or live in hell
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I believe a couple should develop a kind of friendship. Linda and I have this kind of friendship. We understand each other, like a pair of good friends
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Without respect, love cannot go long
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated it will flow back and soften and purify the heart
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I’m not one of those who believe in love at first sight, but I believe in taking a second look
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Absence in love is like water upon fire; a little quickens, but much extinguishes it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Marriage is caring for children, watching over them in sickness, training them in the way they must go, sharing worry about them and pride in them
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Many young couples live a very exciting life when they are in love. So, when they marry, and their lives are reduced to calmness and dullness, they will feel impatient and will drink the bitter cup of sad marriage
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Young love is a flame: very pretty, often very hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. The love of the older and disciplined heart is as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: My wife and I aren’t one and one. We are two halves that make a whole. You have to apply yourself to be a family – two halves fitted together are more efficient than either half would ever be alone!
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I did love like a madman, but have enough sense to not love as a fool
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Moving, be like water. Still, be like a mirror. Respond like an echo
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Let things be what they are, move like water, rest like a mirror, respond like an echo, pass quickly like the nonexistent, and be quiet as purity
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: You can never step in the same river twice, my friend. Like flowing water, life is perpetual movement. There is nothing fixed
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Whatever your problems happen to be in the future, remember well that they cannot remain stationary but must move together with your living spirit. Otherwise, you will drift into artificiality or attempt to solidify the ever-flowing. To avoid that, you must change and be flexible. Remember, the usefulness of a cup is in its emptiness
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Be pliable. When a man is living, he is soft and pliable; when he is dead, he becomes rigid. Pliability is life; rigidity is death, whether one speak’s of man’s body, his mind, or his spirit
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: We are always in a process of becoming and nothing is fixed. Have no rigid system in you, and you’ll be flexible to change with the ever changing
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The method for health promotion is based on water, as flowing water never grows stale. The idea is not to overdevelop or to overexert, but to normalize the function of the body
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Please observe the adaptability of water. If you squeeze it fast, the water will flow out quickly. If you squeeze it slowly, it will come out slowly
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: If nothing within you stays rigid, outward things will disclose themselves
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Open yourself and flow, my friend. Flow in the total openness of the living moment
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Take things as they are. Punch when you have to punch. Kick when you have to kick
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Use only that which works, and take it from any place you can find it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee
Bruce Lee
wisdom.quote: If you knew you had to fight for your life tomorrow, would you change your training today?
My style? You can call it the art of fighting without fighting
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The essence of fighting is the art of moving at the right time
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: See that there is no one to fight, only an illusion to see through. Be aware of illusions
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Behind every motion is the music of his soul made visible. Otherwise empty motion is like an empty word; no meaning. Postures without proper channeling of your emotions behind them are dead movements
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Seek freedom from the conformity of styles
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To me, the extraordinary aspect of martial arts lies in its simplicity. The easy way is also the right way, and martial arts is nothing at all special; the closer to the true way of martial arts, the less wastage of expression there is
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The great mistake is to anticipate the outcome of the engagement; you ought not to be thinking of whether it ends in victory or in defeat
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Let nature take its course, and your tools will strike at the right moment
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Forget about winning and losing, forget about pride and pain
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A fight is not won by one punch or kick. Either learn to endure or hire a bodyguard
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Growth is the constant discovery and understanding in one’s process of living
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: While we are still alive, we have to discover ourselves, understand ourselves, and express ourselves
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The growth aim is to lose more and more your "mind" and come more to your sense. To be more and more in touch with yourself and the world, instead of only in touch with the fantasies, prejudices, etc
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Man is constantly growing, and when he is bound by a set pattern of ideas, or "way" of doing things, that’s when he stops growing
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Without frustration you will not discover that you might be able to do something on your own. We grow through conflict
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The function and duty of a human being, a "quality" human being, that is, is the sincere and honest development of potential and self-actualization
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The fact is that we live only on such a small percentage of our potential: you do not allow yourself to be totally yourself, society does not allow you to be totally yourself
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I really dig exercise. When I’m jogging early in the morning, boy! It’s sure refreshing
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: There is no such word as "maturity". Rather: maturing. Because when there is a maturity, there is a conclusion and a cessation. That’s "the end". That’s when the coffin is closed
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Jogging is not only a form of exercise to me, it is also a form of relaxation. It is my own hour every morning when I can be alone with my thoughts
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I’m not a smoker because I don’t think putting smoke into your body is quite the thing to do. As for alcohol, I think it tastes awful. Don’t know why anyone should want to drink the stuff
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I don’t drink nor smoke and those events are many times senseless
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I am improving and making new discoveries every day. If you don’t you are already crystallized and that’s it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Only eat what your body requires, and don’t become carried away with foods that don’t benefit you
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The enemy of development is this pain phobia – the unwillingness to do a tiny bit of suffering
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Self-education makes great men
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: All types of knowledge, ultimately mean self knowledge
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Education consists in cultivation of intelligence (not cunning, passing exams, etc.)
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Education: to discover but not merely to imitate
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Learning techniques without inward experiencing can only lead to superficiality
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Instead of buying your children all the things you never had, you should teach them all the things you were never taught. Material wears out but knowledge stays
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I am constantly discovering, expanding, finding the cause of my ignorance, in martial art and especially in life. In short, to be real…
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Learning is important but do not become its slave. Above all, do not harbor anything external and superfluous, the mind is the primary
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Like everyone else, you want to learn the way to win. But never to accept the way to lose. To accept defeat – to learn to die – is be liberated from it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 1. I never believe in large organizations, with their domestic and foreign branches, affiliations, etc
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 2. To reach the masses, some sort of a system is required; as a result, the members are conditioned according to that system
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 3. I believe in teaching just a few, as it requires constant alert observations on each individual in order to establish a true, direct relationship
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A child must be taught early that money is only a means, a type of usefulness, an implement. Like all instruments, it has certain purposes, but it will not do everything. One must learn how to use it, what it will do, but above all what it will not do
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Look for ways to raise the pupil’s mind above duality, to the absolute awareness which transcends it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: But then, how important is school? I barely made passing grades while attending the University of Washington
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Bear in mind that I seek neither your approval nor to influence you. So do not make up your mind as to "this is this" or "that is that". I will be more than satisfied if you begin to learn to investigate everything yourself from now on
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: What we are after is the root and not the branches. The root is real knowledge; the branches are surface knowledge
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Real knowledge breeds "body feel" and personal expression; surface knowledge breeds mechanical conditioning and imposing limitation and squelches creativity
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee
Bruce Lee
wisdom.quote: What is the point of education if you in yourself are not intelligent? If you are not creative?
Knowledge is of the past; learning is in the present, a constant movement, in relationship with the outward things, without the past
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To understand, surely, there must be a state of choiceless awareness in which there is no sense of comparison or condemnation, no waiting for further development on the thing we are talking about in order to agree or disagree – don’t start from a conclusion above all
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 1. Above all, a teacher does not depend on a method and drill systematic routines; instead, he studies each individual student and awakens him to explore himself, both internally and externally, and ultimately integrate himself with his being
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 2. Such teaching, which is really no teaching, requires a sensitive mind with great flexibility and is difficult to come by nowadays
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A teacher, a good teacher that is, functions as a pointer to truth, but not a giver of truth. He employs a minimum of form to lead his student to the formless. Furthermore, he points out the importance of being able to enter a mold without being imprisoned by it, or to follow the principles without being bound by them
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A teacher is never a giver of truth; he is a guide, a pointer to the truth that each student must find for himself
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A good teacher protects his pupils from his own influence. It is easy to teach one to be skillful, but it is difficult to teach him his own attitude. Each moment during teaching requires a full alert and sensitive mind that is constantly adjusting and constantly changing
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Give recognition where it is due. Complements definitely stimulate more effort and desire to improve. Be generous with honest praising
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Learning is never cumulative, it is a movement of knowing which has no beginning and no end
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Fluidity is the way to an empty mind. You must free your ambitious mind and learn the art of dying
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The knowledge and skill you have achieved are after all meant to be "forgotten" so you can float in emptiness without obstruction and comfortably
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: 1. Motivation of the trainee
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: 2. Maintaining their complete attention
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: 3. Promoting mental activity (thinking) – discussion, question, lecture
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: 4. Creating a clear picture of material to be learned; outlining the material
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: 5. Developing comprehension of the significance, the implications, and the practical application of the material being presented (clear goals)
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: 6. Repetition of the five preceding steps until learning has taken place
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Only actions give to life its strength, as only moderation gives it its charm
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Preserve yourself by following the natural bends of things and don’t interfere
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Stand at the neutral point between negative and positive, no longer directing one’s mind to anything
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: There is "what is" only when there is no comparison at all, and to live with what is, is to be peaceful
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 1. Serene, detached from all results, ready to fight or run, to win or lose, and always ready to laugh at all things, take whatever comes
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 2. Your child is ill you say, or you cannot pay the rent? Very well, accept these facts and face them
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 3. Are they not trouble enough in themselves without adding the aggravation of worry to them?
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: When one wishes to expand, one must first contract. When one wishes to be strong, one must first be weak. When one wishes to take, one must first give. Everything in this world has the alternative of existence and nonexistence (positive and negative)
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: There will be calmness when one is free from external objects and is not perturbed
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The world is full of people who are determined to be somebody or give trouble. They want to get ahead to stand out. Such ambition has no use for a man of Tao, who rejects all forms of self-assertiveness and competition
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The law of non-interference with nature is a basic principle of Taoism [stating] that one should be in harmony with, not rebellion against, the fundamental laws of the universe
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 1. The Chinese conceived the entire universe as activated by two principles, the Yang and the Yin, the positive and the negative, and they considered that nothing that exists, either animate or so-called inanimate, does so except by virtue of the ceaseless interplay of these two forces
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 2. Matter and energy, Yang and Yin, heaven and earth, are conceived of as essentially one or as two coexistent poles of one indivisible whole
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The mark of genius is the capacity to see and to express what is simple, simply! The really great Zen artist states the utmost in the minimum of lines or effort
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Remember never to assert your self against nature; never be in frontal opposition to any problems, but to control it by swinging with it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: All in all, the goal of my planning and doing is to find the true meaning of life – peace of mind. In order to achieve this peace of mind, the teaching of detachment of Taoism and Zen proved to be valuable
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Only sober moderation lasts, and that persists through all time. Only the midpart of anything is preserved because the pendulum of life must have balance, and the midpart is the balance
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Completeness, the now, is an absence of the conscious mind to strive to divide that which is indivisible
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: In Buddhism there is no place for using effort. Just be ordinary and nothing special. Eat your food, move your bowels, pass water, and when you’re tired go and lie down. The ignorant will laugh at me, but the wise will understand
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: In ordinary life wu-wei is expressed in "producing and rearing things without taking possession of them" and "doing work but not taking pride in it" – thus the natural "way" stands in complement to all artificial ways such as regulation, ceremonies, etc. This is the reason why the Taoists don’t like formalities and artificialities
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The superior man lets himself be guided; he does not go ahead blindly, but learns from the situation what is demanded of him and then follows
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Do not have an attitude, open yourself and focus yourself and express yourself. Reject external form that fails to express internal reality
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: I don’t like to wear stuffy clothes and be at places where everyone is trying to impress each other
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: One who is possessed by worry not only lacks the poise to solve his own problems, but by his nervousness and irritability creates additional problems for those around him
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: If he knows how to meet fate with an attitude of acceptance, he is sure to find the right guidance
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: It is not his task to try to lead – that would only make him lose the Way – but to let himself be led
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Do not seek "it", for it will come when least expected. Let go. Don’t seek or run away
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Shut down all forms of distraction. Eliminate all opportunities for rivalry
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Concentration is the root of all the higher abilities in man
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Thoughts are things, in the sense that thought can be translated into its physical equivalent
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Sharpen the psychic power of seeing in order to act immediately in accordance with what it sees
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Drop and dissolve inner blockage. A conditioned mind is never a free mind. Wipe away and dissolve all its experience and be "born afresh"
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The more and more you are aware, the more and more you shed from day to day what you have learned so that your mind is always fresh, uncontaminated by previous conditioning
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: There is nothing that will enable you to pursue your course in greater peace than the patient bearing of insult. Patience is not passive, on the contrary it is concentrated strength
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: "A man is literally what he thinks". This might be a shocking statement, but everything is a state of mind
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The subconscious mind favors thoughts inspired by emotional feelings. It also gives preference to dominating thoughts
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The past is no more, the future is not yet. "Now" includes the balance of being here, experiencing, involvement, phenomenon, awareness
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To understand and live now, there must be dying to everything of yesterday. Die continually to every gained experience – be in a state of choiceless awareness of what is
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: When you are awake, you must be fully awake and conscious about everything. This is a wonderful exercise
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Suffering itself does less afflict the senses than the anticipation of suffering
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: A concentrated mind is not an attentive mind, but a mind that is in a state of awareness can concentrate. Awareness is never exclusive, it includes everything
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Concentration is a narrowing down of the mind – but we are concerned with the total process of living, and to concentrate exclusively on any particular aspect of life, belittles life
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: All thought is partial, is can never be total. Thought is the response of memory, and memory is always partial, because memory is the result of experience; so thought is the reaction of a mind which is conditioned by experience
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The mind must be wide open in order to function freely in thought. For a limited mind cannot think freely
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To bring the mind into sharp focus and to make it alert so that it can immediately intuit truth, which is everywhere, the mind must be emancipated from old habits, prejudices, restrictive thought process, and even ordinary thought itself
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To be on the alert means to be deadly serious; to be deadly serious means to be sincere to oneself, and it is sincerity that finally leads to the Way
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Every man is what he is because of the dominating thoughts which he permits to occupy his mind
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Sincere thought means thought of concentration (quiet awareness). The thought of a distracted mind cannot be sincere
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Mans’s mind and his behavior are one, his inner thought and outer expression cannot contradict each other. Therefore a man should set up his right principle, and this right mind (principle) will influence his action
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Don’t think – feel. Feeling exists here and now when not interrupted and dissected by ideas or concepts
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Just watch choicelessly and in the watching lies the wonder. It is not an ideal, an end to be desired. The watching is a state of "being" already, not a state of "becoming"
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Anxiety is the gap between the "now" and the "then". SO if you are in the "now", you can’t be anxious, because your excitement flows immediately into ongoing spontaneous activity
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: One great cause of failure is lack on concentration
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The moment we stop analyzing and let go, we can start really seeing, feeling – as one whole
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: There is no need to exert oneself in special cultivation outside the daily round of living
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: To understand your fear is the beginning of really seeing
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: It’s not what you give, it’s the way you give it
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Do think of the past in terms of those memories of events and accomplishments which were pleasant, rewarding, and satisfying
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: The present? Well, think of it in terms of challenges and opportunities, and the rewards available for the application of your talents and energies
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: As for the future, that is a time and a place where every worthy ambition you posses is within your grasp
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: In a time when everything goes well, my mind is pampered with enjoyment, possessiveness, etc. Only in times of adversity, privation, or mishap, does my mind function and think properly of my state. This close examination of self strengthens my mind and leads me to understand and be understood
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 1. Here is natural instinct, and there is control. You are to combine the two in harmony. If you have one to the extreme you will be very unscientific; if you have another to the extreme, you become a mechanical man, no longer human being
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Part 2. So it is a successful combination of both. It is not pure naturalness, or pure unnaturalness. The ideal is unnatural naturalness or natural unnaturalness
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: When my tutor assisted me in choosing my courses, he advised me to take up philosophy because of my inquisitiveness. He said, "philosophy will tell you what man lives for"
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Philosophy is itself the disease for which it pretends to be the cure: the wise man does not pursue wisdom but lives his life, and therein precisely does his wisdom lie
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee

wisdom.quote: Just as the maintaining of good health may require the taking of unpleasant medicine, so the condition of being able to do the things we enjoy often requires the performance of a few we don’t
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee
