wisdom.quote: Great spirits have always encountered opposition from mediocre minds. The mediocre mind is incapable of understanding the man who refuses to bow blindly to conventional prejudices and chooses instead to express his opinions courageously and honestly.
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.quote: Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: Anarchism is founded on the observation that since few men are wise enough to rule themselves, even fewer are wise enough to rule others.
wisdom.author: Edward Abbey

wisdom.quote: Do not look for happiness outside yourself. The awakened seek happiness inside.
wisdom.author: Peter Deunov

wisdom.quote: I criticize by creation, not by finding fault.
wisdom.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

wisdom.quote: And I despise your books, I despise wisdom and the blessings of this world. It is all worthless, fleeting, illusory, and deceptive, like a mirage. You may be proud, wise, and fine, but death will wipe you off the face of the earth as though you were no more than mice burrowing under the floor, and your posterity, your history, your immortal geniuses will burn or freeze together with the earthly globe.
wisdom.author: Anton Chekhov

wisdom.quote: Life is like a sandwich!Birth as one slice,and death as the other.What you put in-between the slices is up to you.Is your sandwich tasty or sour?Allan Rufus.org
wisdom.author: Allan Rufus

wisdom.quote: Whenever a theory appears to you as the only possible one, take this as a sign that you have neither understood the theory nor the problem which it was intended to solve.
wisdom.author: Karl Popper

wisdom.quote: Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
wisdom.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

wisdom.quote: One must find the source within one's own Self, one must possess it. Everything else was seeking -- a detour, an error.
wisdom.author: Hermann Hesse

wisdom.quote: A fool's paradise is a wise man's hell.
wisdom.author: Thomas Fuller

wisdom.quote: There will come a time in your life when you lose something that matters to you. You'll fight for it and you won't win. But what really matters isn't the war you're waging, it's that you don't lose the person you are in the midst of the battle.
wisdom.author: J. Sterling

wisdom.quote: The world’s greatest achievers have been those who have always stayed focussed on their goals and have been consistent in their efforts.
wisdom.author: Dr Roopleen

wisdom.quote: He who binds to himself a joyDoes the winged life destroy;But he who kisses the joy as it fliesLives in eternity's sun rise.
wisdom.author: William Blake

wisdom.quote: You'll never reach perfection because there's always room for improvement. Yet get along the way to perfection, you'll learn to get better.
wisdom.author: Hlovate

wisdom.quote: Some people insist that 'mediocre' is better than 'best.' They delight in clipping wings because they themselves can't fly. They despise brains because they have none.
wisdom.author: Robert A. Heinlein

wisdom.quote: The teacher who is indeed wise does not bid you to enter the house of his wisdom but rather leads you to the threshold of your mind.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: They can't tell so much about you if you got your eyes closed.
wisdom.author: Ken Kesey

wisdom.quote: Ignorance is hardly unusual, Miss Davar. The longer I live, the more I come to realize that it is the natural state of the human mind. There are many who will strive to defend its sanctity and then expect you to be impressed with their efforts.
wisdom.author: Brandon Sanderson

wisdom.quote: For this feeling of wonder shows that you are a philosopher, since wonder is the only beginning of philosophy.
wisdom.author: Plato

wisdom.quote: Time ripens all things; no man is born wise.
wisdom.author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

wisdom.quote: Before you become too entranced with gorgeous gadgets and mesmerizing video displays, let me remind you that information is not knowledge, knowledge is not wisdom, and wisdom is not foresight. Each grows out of the other, and we need them all.
wisdom.author: Arthur C. Clarke

wisdom.quote: Don't go on discussing what a good person should be. Just be one.
wisdom.author: Marcus Aurelius

wisdom.quote: I'VE LEARNED THAT YOU CAN'T CONTROL WHAT OTHER PEOPLE ARE GOING TO THINK ABOUT YOU.THE BEST YOU CAN DO IN LIFE IS NOT PISS YOURSELFOFF.
wisdom.author: Megan McCafferty

wisdom.quote: Things are not always what they seem; the first appearance deceives many; the intelligence of a few perceives what has been carefully hidden.
wisdom.author: Phaedrus

wisdom.quote: The beginning of wisdom is the definition of terms.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: The ability to discipline yourself to delay gratification in the short term in order to enjoy greater rewards in the long term, is the indispensable prerequisite for success.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: Is it so far from madness to wisdom?" - Daenerys Targaryen
wisdom.author: George R.R. Martin

wisdom.quote: Humor can get in under the door while seriousness is still fumbling at the handle.
wisdom.author: G.K. Chesterton

wisdom.quote: We need not take refuge in supernatural gods to explain our saints and sages and heroes and statesmen, as if to explain our disbelief that mere unaided human beings could be that good or wise.
wisdom.author: Abraham Maslow

wisdom.quote: The mind is a wonderful servant, but a terrible master.
wisdom.author: Robin Sharma

wisdom.quote: You're thinking about something, and it makes you forget to talk.
wisdom.author: Lewis Carroll

wisdom.quote: There were many terrible things in my life and most of them never happened.
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: There are many goals but one path - the path of compassion.
wisdom.author: Amit Ray

wisdom.quote: He who speaks without an attentive ear is mute.
wisdom.author: Stephen King

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is one of the few things that looks bigger the further away it is.
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett

wisdom.quote: Always choose the future over the past. What do we do now?
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: I visited many places, Some of them quite Exotic and far away, But I always returned to myself.
wisdom.author: Dejan Stojanovic

wisdom.quote: A person's rightful due is to be treated as an object of love, not as an object for use.
wisdom.author: Pope John Paul II

wisdom.quote: In examining disease, we gain wisdom about anatomy and physiology and biology. In examining the person with disease, we gain wisdom about life.
wisdom.author: Oliver W. Sacks

wisdom.quote: For with much wisdom comes much sorrow; the more knowledge the more grief.
wisdom.author: Anonymous

wisdom.quote: He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know.
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: In the heartfelt mercy of our God, the dawn from on high will visit us, to shine on those sitting in darkness, in the shadow of death, to guide our feet to the way of peace.
wisdom.author: Anonymous

wisdom.quote: Suppose that we are wise enough to learn and know—and yet not wise enough to control our learning and knowledge, so that we use it to destroy ourselves? Even if that is so, knowledge remains better than ignorance. It is better to know—even if the knowledge endures only for the moment that comes before destruction—than to gain eternal life at the price of a dull and swinish lack of comprehension of a universe that swirls unseen before us in all its wonder. That was the choice of Achilles, and it is mine, too.
wisdom.author: Isaac Asimov

wisdom.quote: The Master said, "A true teacher is one who, keeping the past alive, is also able to understand the present."(Analects 2.11)
wisdom.author: Confucius

wisdom.quote: We need houses as we need clothes, architecture stimulates fashion. It’s like hunger and thirst — you need them both.
wisdom.author: Karl Lagerfeld

wisdom.quote: This world is your best teacher. There is a lesson in everything. There is a lesson in each experience. Learn it and become wise. Every failure is a stepping stone to success. Every difficulty or disappointment is a trial of your faith. Every unpleasant incident or temptation is a test of your inner strength. Therefore nil desperandum. March forward hero!
wisdom.author: Sivananda

wisdom.quote: Men have two greatest fears: the first fear is the fear of being needed, and the second fear is the fear of not being needed.
wisdom.author: C. JoyBell C.

wisdom.quote: Don't be afraid of the shadows, that only means there's a light nearby.
wisdom.author: Evanescence

wisdom.quote: REMEMBER YOUR GREATNESSBefore you were born,And were still too tiny forThe human eye to see,You won the race for lifeFrom among 250 million competitors.And yet,How fast you have forgottenYour strength,When your very existenceIs proof of your greatness.You were born a winner,A warrior,One who defied the oddsBy surviving the most gruesomeBattle of them all.And now that you are a giant,Why do you even doubt victoryAgainst smaller numbers,And wider margins?The only walls that exist,Are those you have placed in your mind.And whatever obstacles you conceive,Exist only because you have forgottenWhat you have alreadyAchieved.Poetry by Suzy Kassem
wisdom.author: Suzy Kassem

wisdom.quote: IthakaAs you set out for Ithakahope the voyage is a long one,full of adventure, full of discovery.Laistrygonians and Cyclops,angry Poseidon—don’t be afraid of them:you’ll never find things like that on your wayas long as you keep your thoughts raised high,as long as a rare excitementstirs your spirit and your body.Laistrygonians and Cyclops,wild Poseidon—you won’t encounter themunless you bring them along inside your soul,unless your soul sets them up in front of you. Hope the voyage is a long one.May there be many a summer morning when,with what pleasure, what joy,you come into harbors seen for the first time;may you stop at Phoenician trading stationsto buy fine things,mother of pearl and coral, amber and ebony,sensual perfume of every kind—as many sensual perfumes as you can;and may you visit many Egyptian citiesto gather stores of knowledge from their scholars. Keep Ithaka always in your mind.Arriving there is what you are destined for.But do not hurry the journey at all.Better if it lasts for years,so you are old by the time you reach the island,wealthy with all you have gained on the way,not expecting Ithaka to make you rich. Ithaka gave you the marvelous journey.Without her you would not have set out.She has nothing left to give you now. And if you find her poor, Ithaka won’t have fooled you.Wise as you will have become, so full of experience,you will have understood by then what these Ithakas mean.
wisdom.author: C.P. Cavafy

wisdom.quote: There are women who make things better... simply by showing up. There are women who make things happen. There are women who make their way. There are women who make a difference. And women who make us smile. There are women of wit and wisdom who- through strength and courage- make it through. There are women who change the world everyday... Women like you.
wisdom.author: Ashley Rice

wisdom.quote: Our ability to adapt is amazing. Our ability to change isn't quite as spectacular.
wisdom.author: Lisa Lutz

wisdom.quote: No man can reveal to you aught but that which already lies half asleep in the dawning of your knowledge.The teacher who walks in the shadow of the temple, among his followers, gives not of his wisdom but rather of his faith and his lovingness.If he is indeed wise he does not bid you enter the house of his wisdom, but rather leads you to the threshold of your own mind.
wisdom.author: Khalil Gibran

wisdom.quote: Love of music, of sunsets and sea; a liking for the same kind of people; political opinions that are not radically divergent; a similar stance as we look at the stars and think of the marvelous strangeness of the universe - these are what build a marriage. And it is never to be taken for granted.
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'Engle

wisdom.quote: The happiness of the drop is to die in the river.
wisdom.author: Imam Al-Ghazali

wisdom.quote: Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of the wise; seek what they sought.
wisdom.author: Matsuo Basho

wisdom.quote: The moment a little boy is concerned with which is a jay and which is a sparrow, he can no longer see the birds or hear them sing.
wisdom.author: Eric Berne

wisdom.quote: Time is not the great teacher. Experience is. A man may live a whole life, but if he never leaves his home to experience that life, he dies knowing nothing. A mere child who has suffered and lived can be the wiser of the two.
wisdom.author: Lynsay Sands

wisdom.quote: Life is like a game of chess.To win you have to make a move.Knowing which move to make comes with IN-SIGHTand knowledge, and by learning the lessons that areacculated along the way.We become each and every piece within the game called life!
wisdom.author: Allan Rufus

wisdom.quote: To hide feelings when you are near crying is the secret of dignity.
wisdom.author: Dejan Stojanovic

wisdom.quote: Anger exceeding limits causes fear and excessive kindness eliminates respect.
wisdom.author: Euripides

wisdom.quote: It’s always hard to lose somebody. It leaves a hole in you heart that never grows back.
wisdom.author: Kevin Brooks

wisdom.quote: But that's how memory works," Bitterblue said quietly. "Things disappear without your permission, then come back again without your permission." And sometimes they came back incomplete and warped.
wisdom.author: Kristin Cashore

wisdom.quote: Every intelligent individual wants to know what makes him tick, and yet is at once fascinated and frustrated by the fact that oneself is the most difficult of all things to know.
wisdom.author: Alan Watts

wisdom.quote: Learned we may be with another man's learning: we can only be wise with wisdom of our own.
wisdom.author: Michel de Montaigne

wisdom.quote: Look for the good in every person and every situation. You'll almost always find it.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: You are an explorer, and you represent our species, and the greatest good you can do is to bring back a new idea, because our world is endangered by the absence of good ideas. Our world is in crisis because of the absence of consciousness.
wisdom.author: Terence McKenna

wisdom.quote: To invent your own life's meaning is not easy, but it's still allowed, and I think you'll be happier for the trouble.
wisdom.author: Bill Watterson

wisdom.quote: I suppose it’s not a social norm, and not a manly thing to do — to feel, discuss feelings. So that’s what I’m giving the finger to. Social norms and stuff…what good are social norms, really? I think all they do is project a limited and harmful image of people. It thus impedes a broader social acceptance of what someone, or a group of people, might actually be like.
wisdom.author: Jess C Scott

wisdom.quote: I will not deny but that the best apology against false accusers is silence and sufferance, and honest deeds set against dishonest words.
wisdom.author: John Milton

wisdom.quote: The wise are not wise because they make no mistakes. They are wise because they correct their mistakes as soon as they recognize them.
wisdom.author: Orson Scott Card

wisdom.quote: You can have many great ideas in your head, but what makes the difference is the action. Without action upon an idea, there will be no manifestation, no results, and no reward
wisdom.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

wisdom.quote: Be wiser than other people if you can; but do not tell them so.
wisdom.author: Dale Carnegie

wisdom.quote: If I had to live my life again, I'd make the same mistakes, only sooner.
wisdom.author: Tallulah Bankhead

wisdom.quote: When they say the sky's the limit to me that's really true
wisdom.author: Michael  Jackson

wisdom.quote: The worst thing: to give yourself away in exchange for not enough love.
wisdom.author: Joyce Carol Oates

wisdom.quote: Give a man a fish, and you'll feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and he'll buy a funny hat. Talk to a hungry man about fish, and you're a consultant.
wisdom.author: Scott Adams

wisdom.quote: Sanity calms, but madness is more interesting.
wisdom.author: John Russell

wisdom.quote: A desire not to butt into other people's business is at least eighty percent of all human wisdom.
wisdom.author: Robert A. Heinlein

wisdom.quote: When you're in a Slump,you're not in for much fun.Un-slumping yourselfis not easily done.
wisdom.author: Dr. Seuss

wisdom.quote: If Christ were here there is one thing he would not be—a Christian.
wisdom.author: Mark Twain

wisdom.quote: Mathematics expresses values that reflect the cosmos, including orderliness, balance, harmony, logic, and abstract beauty.
wisdom.author: Deepak Chopra

wisdom.quote: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances, Be more active, Show up more often.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: It can be difficult to leave a long-term relationship, even when our inner-wisdom tells us it's time to let go. At this point, we can choose let go and endure the intense pain of leaving behind the familiar to make way for a new chapter in our life. Or we can stay and suffer a low-grade pain that slowly eats away at our heart and soul, like an emotional cancer. Until we wake up, one day and realize, we are buried so deep in the dysfunction of the relationship that we scarcely remember who we were and what we wanted and needed to be.
wisdom.author: Jaeda DeWalt

wisdom.quote: He who is certain he knows the ending of things when he is only beginning them is either extremely wise or extremely foolish; no matter which is true, he is certainly an unhappy man, for he has put a knife in the heart of wonder.
wisdom.author: Tad Williams

wisdom.quote: The act of taking the first step is what separates the winners from the losers.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: ليس كل ما يخطر للمرء يقوله ، لا سيما إذا كان صحيحا
wisdom.author: محمد عفيفي

wisdom.quote: All truly wise thoughts have been thought already thousands of times; but to make them truly ours, we must think them over again honestly, until they take root in our personal experience.
wisdom.author: Goethe

wisdom.quote: Many things that are true feel like a cheat. Kingdoms get the princes they deserve, farmers’ daughters die for no reason, and sometimes witches merit saving. Quite often, actually. You’d be surprised.
wisdom.author: Patrick Ness

wisdom.quote: Realize that everything connects to everything else.
wisdom.author: Leonardo Da Vinci

wisdom.quote: Meditation is a way for nourishing and blossoming the divinity within you.
wisdom.author: Amit Ray

wisdom.quote: The only real limitation on your abilities is the level of your desires. If you want it badly enough, there are no limits on what you can achieve.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: The way I define happiness is being the creator of your experience, choosing to take pleasure in what you have, right now, regardless of the circumstances, while being the best you that you can be.
wisdom.author: Leo Babauta

wisdom.quote: The world is 3 days: As for yesterday, it has vanished along with all that was in it. As for tomorrow, you may never see it. As for today, it is yours, so work on it.
wisdom.author: Hasan Al-Basri

wisdom.quote: Aren't you, like me, hoping that some person, thing, or event will come along to give you that final feeling of inner well-being you desire? Don't you often hope: 'May this book, idea, course, trip, job, country or relationship fulfill my deepest desire.' But as long as you are waiting for that mysterious moment you will go on running helter-skelter, always anxious and restless, always lustful and angry, never fully satisfied. You know that this is the compulsiveness that keeps us going and busy, but at the same time makes us wonder whether we are getting anywhere in the long run. This is the way to spiritual exhaustion and burn-out. This is the way to spiritual death.
wisdom.author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

wisdom.quote: But goodness alone is never enough. A hard, cold wisdom is required for goodness to accomplish good. Goodness without wisdom always accomplishes evil.
wisdom.author: Robert A. Heinlein

wisdom.quote: I have always felt that doubt was the beginning of wisdom, and the fear of God was the end of wisdom.
wisdom.author: Clarence Darrow

wisdom.quote: A path is made by walking on it.
wisdom.author: Chuang Tzu

wisdom.quote: Why should we place Christ at the top and summit of the human race? Was he kinder, more forgiving, more self-sacrificing than Buddha? Was he wiser, did he meet death with more perfect calmness, than Socrates? Was he more patient, more charitable, than Epictetus? Was he a greater philosopher, a deeper thinker, than Epicurus? In what respect was he the superior of Zoroaster? Was he gentler than Lao-tsze, more universal than Confucius? Were his ideas of human rights and duties superior to those of Zeno? Did he express grander truths than Cicero? Was his mind subtler than Spinoza’s? Was his brain equal to Kepler’s or Newton’s? Was he grander in death – a sublimer martyr than Bruno? Was he in intelligence, in the force and beauty of expression, in breadth and scope of thought, in wealth of illustration, in aptness of comparison, in knowledge of the human brain and heart, of all passions, hopes and fears, the equal of Shakespeare, the greatest of the human race?
wisdom.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

wisdom.quote: It is not so much the major events as the small day-to-day decisions that map the course of our living. . . Our lives are, in reality, the sum total of our seemingly unimportant decisions and of our capacity to live by those decisions.
wisdom.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

wisdom.quote: Veganism is not about giving anything up or losing anything; it is about gaining the peace within yourself that comes from embracing nonviolence and refusing to participate in the exploitation of the vulnerable
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: Even as a solid rock is unshaken by the wind, so are the wise unshaken by praise or blame.
wisdom.author: Dhammapada

wisdom.quote: You don't have to make something that people call art. Living is an artistic activity, there is an art to getting through the day.
wisdom.author: viggo mortensen

wisdom.quote: Many have died; you also will die. The drum of death is being beaten. The world has fallen in love with a dream. Only sayings of the wise will remain.
wisdom.author: Kabir

wisdom.quote: He hated when his own advice applied to himself.
wisdom.author: Rick Riordan

wisdom.quote: People who say that yesterday was better than today are ultimately devaluing their own existence.
wisdom.author: Karl Lagerfeld

wisdom.quote: I don’t think it would have all got me quite so down if just once in a while—just once in a while—there was at least some polite little perfunctory implication that knowledge should lead to wisdom, and that if it doesn't, it's just a disgusting waste of time! But there never is! You never even hear any hints dropped on a campus that wisdom is supposed to be the goal of knowledge. You hardly ever even hear the word 'wisdom' mentioned!
wisdom.author: J.D. Salinger

wisdom.quote: A man convinced against his will Is of the same opinion still
wisdom.author: Dale Carnegie

wisdom.quote: You look up when you wish to be exalted. And I look down because I am exalted.
wisdom.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

wisdom.quote: Chase away sorrow by living
wisdom.author: Melissa Marr

wisdom.quote: If we never experience the chill of a dark winter, it is very unlikely that we will ever cherish the warmth of a bright summer’s day. Nothing stimulates our appetite for the simple joys of life more than the starvation caused by sadness or desperation. In order to complete our amazing life journey successfully, it is vital that we turn each and every dark tear into a pearl of wisdom, and find the blessing in every curse.
wisdom.author: Anthon St. Maarten

wisdom.quote: Adventure is not outside man; it is within.
wisdom.author: George Eliot

wisdom.quote: Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense.
wisdom.author: Gertrude Stein

wisdom.quote: Gamitin ang puso para alagaan ang taong malapit sayo. Gamitin ang utakpara alagaan ang sarili mo.
wisdom.author: bob ong

wisdom.quote: Capabilities are clearly manifested only when they have been realized.
wisdom.author: Simone de Beauvoir

wisdom.quote: Anything that you learn becomes your wealth, a wealth that cannot be taken away from you; whether you learn it in a building called school or in the school of life. To learn something new is a timeless pleasure and a valuable treasure. And not all things that you learn are taught to you, but many things that you learn you realize you have taught yourself.
wisdom.author: C. JoyBell C.

wisdom.quote: My father taught me that you can you read a hundred books on wisdom and write a hundred books on wisdom, but unless you apply what you learned then its only words on a page. Life is not lived with intentions, but action.
wisdom.author: Shannon Alder

wisdom.quote: Anyone who cannot cope with mathematics is not fully human. At best, he is a tolerable subhuman who has learned to wear his shoes, bathe, and not make messes in the house.
wisdom.author: Robert Heinlein

wisdom.quote: I only know that I know nothing
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: Where there is anger there is always pain underneath.
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: COMING FORTH INTO THE LIGHTI was born the dayI thought:What is?What was?AndWhat if?I was transformed the dayMy ego shattered,And all the superficial, materialThings that matteredTo me before,Suddenly ceasedTo matter.I really came into beingThe day I no longer cared aboutWhat the world thought of me,Only on my thoughts forChanging the world.
wisdom.author: Suzy Kassem

wisdom.quote: errare humanum est, sed perseverare diabolicum: 'to err is human, but to persist (in the mistake) is diabolical.
wisdom.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

wisdom.quote: He who doesn't understand history is doomed to repeat it.
wisdom.author: Pittacus Lore

wisdom.quote: Caminante, no hay puentes, se hace puentes al andar. (Voyager, there are no bridges, one builds them as one walks.)
wisdom.author: Gloria Anzaldúa

wisdom.quote: Where is the wisdom we have lost in knowledge?Where is the knowledge we have lost in information?
wisdom.author: T.S. Eliot

wisdom.quote: They will envy you for your success, your wealth, for your intelligence, for your looks, for your status - but rarely for your wisdom.
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

wisdom.quote: Granny was an old-fashioned witch. She didn’t do good for people, she did right by them.
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett

wisdom.quote: A wise man always has something to say, whereas a fool always needs to say something.
wisdom.author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

wisdom.quote: Each person you meetis an aspect of yourself,clamoring for love.
wisdom.author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

wisdom.quote: They think that intelligence is about noticing things are relevant (detecting patterns); in a complex world, intelligence consists in ignoring things that are irrelevant (avoiding false patterns)
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

wisdom.quote: Excellence/Perfection is not a destination; it is a continuous journey that never ends.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: The most important thing is this: to sacrifice what you are now for what you can become tomorrow.
wisdom.author: Shannon Alder

wisdom.quote: The more you know, the less you need.
wisdom.author: Yvon Chouinard

wisdom.quote: I lied and said I was busy.I was busy;but not in a way most people understand.I was busy taking deeper breaths.I was busy silencing irrational thoughts.I was busy calming a racing heart.I was busy telling myself I am okay.Sometimes, this is my busy -and I will not apologize for it.
wisdom.author: Brittin Oakman

wisdom.quote: All teachings are mere references. The true experience is living your own life. Then, even the holiest of words are only words.
wisdom.author: Deng Ming-Dao

wisdom.quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: Earthlings went on being friendly, when they should have been thinking instead.
wisdom.author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

wisdom.quote: Being alive is sign of strength!
wisdom.author: Hiro Mashima

wisdom.quote: All art is but dirtying the paper delicately.
wisdom.author: John Ruskin

wisdom.quote: Writing about the unholy is one way of writing about what is sacred.
wisdom.author: Clive Barker

wisdom.quote: Healthy citizens are the greatest asset any country can have.
wisdom.author: Winston S. Churchill

wisdom.quote: To be evenminded is the greatest virtue.Wisdom is to speakthe truth and actin keeping with its nature.
wisdom.author: Heraclitus

wisdom.quote: Liberty without Learning is always in peril and Learning without Liberty is always in vain.
wisdom.author: John F. Kennedy

wisdom.quote: He who dares not offend cannot be honest.
wisdom.author: Thomas Paine

wisdom.quote: And the fox said to the little prince: men have forgotten this truth, but you must not forget it. You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed.
wisdom.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

wisdom.quote: Cleverness is not wisdom.
wisdom.author: Euripides

wisdom.quote: I don't fancy colors of the face, I'm always attracted to colors of the brain.
wisdom.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

wisdom.quote: If you want to annoy a poet, explain his poetry.
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

wisdom.quote: Lucy: You learn more when you lose Charlie Brown: Well then I must be the smartest person in world!!!
wisdom.author: Charles M. Schulz

wisdom.quote: Where are you? HereWhat time is it? NowWhat are you? This moment.
wisdom.author: Dan Millman

wisdom.quote: When writing, there are some scenes that are emotionally overwhelming. They completely overcome the author, and only when they do this can they cause a similar reaction in the reader.Through this, the author gets to experience multiple lives. If a character's life flashes before their eyes, it flashes before the author's eyes too, and he or she remembers it as his or her own.With reading, we get to live other lives vicariously, and this is doubly so with writing. It is like a lucid dream, where we guide the outcome. In this, we don't merely write *about* a character -- we momentarily *become* them, and walk as they walk, think as they think, and do as they do. When we return to our own life, we might return a little shaken, likely a little stronger, hopefully a little wiser.What is certain is that we return better, because experiencing the lives of others makes us understand their aims and dreams, their fears and foils, the challenges and difficulties, and joys and triumphs, that they face. It helps us grow and empathise, and see all the little pictures that make up the bigger one we see from the omniscience of the narrator.
wisdom.author: Dean F. Wilson

wisdom.quote: Have love for your inner Self and everything else is done for you.
wisdom.author: Amit Ray

wisdom.quote: youth is easily deceived because it is quick to hope.
wisdom.author: Aristotle

wisdom.quote: Wherever I go, I meet myself.
wisdom.author: Dejan Stojanovic

wisdom.quote: It is rare for people to be asked the question which puts them squarely in front of themselves
wisdom.author: Arthur Miller

wisdom.quote: Goodness without wisdom always accomplishes evil.
wisdom.author: Robert Heinlein

wisdom.quote: To force oneself to believe and to accept a thing without understanding is political, and not spiritual or intellectual.
wisdom.author: Siddhārtha Gautama

wisdom.quote: If everyone helps to hold up the sky, then one person does not become tired.
wisdom.author: Askhari Johnson Hodari

wisdom.quote: The more humble and obedient to God a man is, the more wise and at peace he will be in all that he does.
wisdom.author: Thomas à Kempis

wisdom.quote: Better to shun the bait than struggle in the snare.
wisdom.author: William Blake

wisdom.quote: Wit seduces by signaling intelligence without nerdiness.
wisdom.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

wisdom.quote: If an apology is followed by an excuse or a reason, it means they are going to commit same mistake again they just apologized for.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: What happens to people living in a society where everyone in power is lying, stealing, cheating and killing, and in our hearts we all know this, but the consequences of facing all these lies are so monstrous, we keep on hoping that maybe the corporate government administration and media are on the level with us this time.Americans remind me of survivors of domestic abuse.This is always the hope that this is the very, very, very last time one's ribs get re-broken again.
wisdom.author: Inga Muscio

wisdom.quote: From the mouths of the innocents flows truth.
wisdom.author: Rae Carson

wisdom.quote: A photograph shouldn't be just a picture, it should be a philosophy.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: He who acts, spoils; he who grasps, lets slip.
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: There's no solution to life, there's going to be problems no matter what.
wisdom.author: Chris Colfer

wisdom.quote: The best teachers have showed me that things have to be done bit by bit. Nothing that means anything happens quickly--we only think it does. The motion of drawing back a bow and sending an arrow straight into a target takes only a split second, but it is a skill many years in the making. So it is with a life, anyone's life. I may list things that might be described as my accomplishments in these few pages, but they are only shadows of the larger truth, fragments separated from the whole cycle of becoming. And if I can tell an old-time story now about a man who is walking about, waudjoset ndatlokugan, a forest lodge man, alesakamigwi udlagwedewugan, it is because I spent many years walking about myself, listening to voices that came not just from the people but from animals and trees and stones.
wisdom.author: Joseph Bruchac

wisdom.quote: Hats have power. Hats can change you into someone else.
wisdom.author: Catherynne M. Valente

wisdom.quote: قهوتك يجب أن تكون كما تحب! "معظم الناس الذين يريدون أن يحققوا شيئا في حياتهم يركزون على نقاط ضعفهم،ويحاولون طوال حياتهم جاهدين تقويتها متناسين في نفس الوقت نقاط قوتهم , وتكون النتيجة أن تقوى نقاط ضعفهم لتوازي نقاط قوتهم التي تبقى على حالها، ليصبح الإنسان شخصا عاديًا . " ياسر حارب*
wisdom.author: ياسر حارب

wisdom.quote: Okay, this is the wisdom. First, time spent on reconnaissanse is never wasted. Second, almost anything can be improved with the addition of bacon. And finally, there is no problem on Earth that can't be ameliorated by a hot bath and a cup of tea.
wisdom.author: Jasper Fforde

wisdom.quote: Silence does not always mark wisdom.
wisdom.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

wisdom.quote: But that was life: Nobody got a guided tour to their own theme park. You had to hop on the rides as they presented themselves, never knowing whether you would like the one you were in line for...or if the bastard was going to make you throw up your corn dog and your cotton candy all over the place.
wisdom.author: J.R. Ward

wisdom.quote: Use the wings of the flying Universe, Dream with open eyes; See in darkness.
wisdom.author: Dejan Stojanovic

wisdom.quote: In his face there came to be a brooding peace that is seen most often in the faces of the very sorrowful or the very wise. But still he wandered through the streets of the town, always silent and alone.
wisdom.author: Carson McCullers

wisdom.quote: Because some things are never meant to be anything more than a moment. And that was one of them.
wisdom.author: Kevin Brooks

wisdom.quote: It’s never overreacting to ask for what you want and need.
wisdom.author: Amy Poehler

wisdom.quote: There is another alphabet, whispering from every leaf, singing from every river, shimmering from every sky.
wisdom.author: Dejan Stojanovic

wisdom.quote: A student, filled with emotion and crying, implored, "Why is there so much suffering?"Suzuki Roshi replied, "No reason.
wisdom.author: Shunryu Suzuki

wisdom.quote: re-examine all you have been told in school or church or in any book, and dismiss whatever insults your own soul; and your very flesh shall be a great poem, and have the richest fluency, not only in its words, but in the silent lines of its lips and face, and between the lashes of your eyes, and in every motion and joint of your body.[From the preface to Leaves Grass]
wisdom.author: Walt Whitman

wisdom.quote: A point of view can be a dangerous luxury when substituted for insight and understanding.
wisdom.author: Marshall McLuhan

wisdom.quote: When God takes out the trash, don't go digging back through it. Trust Him.
wisdom.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

wisdom.quote: What one thinks is right is not always the same as what others think is right; no one can be always right.
wisdom.author: Roy T. Bennett

wisdom.quote: The true delight is in the finding out rather than in the knowing.
wisdom.author: Isaac Asimov

wisdom.quote: But then one regrets the loss even of one's worst habits. Perhaps one regrets them the most. They are such an essential part of one's personality.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.quote: Mum liked to say that some things happen for a reason, that sometimes obstacles were there to stop you from doing something stupid.
wisdom.author: Maggie Stiefvater

wisdom.quote: I believe much trouble and blood would be saved if we opened our hearts more.
wisdom.author: Chief Joseph

wisdom.quote: How you spend your time is more important than how you spend your money. Money mistakes can be corrected, but time is gone forever.
wisdom.author: David Norris

wisdom.quote: I feel with some passion that what we truly are is private, and almost infinitely complex, and ambiguous, and both external and internal, and double- or triple- or multiply natured, and largely mysterious even to ourselves; and furthermore that what we are is only part of us, because identity, unlike "identity", must include what we do. And I think that to find oneself and every aspect of this complexity reduced in the public mind to one property that apparently subsumes all the rest ("gay", "black", "Muslim", whatever) is to be the victim of a piece of extraordinary intellectual vulgarity.
wisdom.author: Philip Pullman

wisdom.quote: Habit rules the unreflecting herd.
wisdom.author: William Wordsworth

wisdom.quote: In meditation we discover our inherent restlessness. Sometimes we get up and leave. Sometimes we sit there but our bodies wiggle and squirm and our minds go far away. This can be so uncomfortable that we feel’s it’s impossible to stay. Yet this feeling can teach us not just about ourselves but what it is to be human…we really don’t want to stay with the nakedness of our present experience. It goes against the grain to stay present. These are the times when only gentleness and a sense of humor can give us the strength to settle down…so whenever we wander off, we gently encourage ourselves to "stay" and settle down. Are we experiencing restlessness? Stay! Are fear and loathing out of control? Stay! Aching knees and throbbing back? Stay! What’s for lunch? Stay! I can’t stand this another minute! Stay!
wisdom.author: Pema Chödrön

wisdom.quote: Memories were short and history unkind. It was the way of the world.
wisdom.author: Deborah Harkness

wisdom.quote: The lessons of life amount not to wisdom, but to scar tissue and callus.
wisdom.author: Wallace Stegner

wisdom.quote: Praise not the day until evening has come, a woman until she is burnt, a sword until it is tried, a maiden until she is married, ice until it has been crossed, beer until it has been drunk.
wisdom.author: Michael Crichton

wisdom.quote: A person is wise if he listens to millions of advice and doesn't implement any of it.
wisdom.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

wisdom.quote: Whole life is a search for beauty. But, when the beauty is found inside, the search ends and a beautiful journey begins.
wisdom.author: Harshit Walia

wisdom.quote: If you want to fly on the sky, you need to leave the earth. If you want to move forward, you need to let go the past that drags you down.
wisdom.author: Amit Ray

wisdom.quote: Blíndur er bóklaus ma∂ur. Blind is a man without a book.
wisdom.author: Hannah Kent

wisdom.quote: well, sometimes to get what you want the most, you have to do what you want the least.
wisdom.author: Jodi Picoult

wisdom.quote: It is a very sad thing that nowadays there is so little useless information.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.quote: Maybe you could be mine / or maybe we’ll be entwined / aimless in this sexless foreplay.
wisdom.author: Jess C Scott

wisdom.quote: Every immigrant who comes here should be required within five years to learn English or leave the country.
wisdom.author: Theodore Roosevelt

wisdom.quote: It is easier to be wise for others than for ourselves.
wisdom.author: Francois De La Rochefoucauld

wisdom.quote: Travel brings wisdom only to the wise. It renders the ignorant more ignorant than ever.
wisdom.author: Joe Abercrombie

wisdom.quote: أولادكم ليسوا لكمأولادكم أبناء الحياة المشتاقة إلى نفسها, بكم يأتون إلى العالم, ولكن ليس منكم.ومع أنهم يعيشون معكم, فهم ليسوا ملكاً لكم.أنتم تستطيعون أن تمنحوهم محبتكم, ولكنكم لا تقدرون أن تغرسوا فيهم بذور أفكاركم, لأن لهم أفكارأً خاصةً بهم.وفي طاقتكم أن تصنعوا المساكم لأجسادكم.ولكن نفوسهم لا تقطن في مساكنكم.فهي تقطن في مسكن الغد, الذي لا تستطيعون أن تزوروه حتى ولا في أحلامكم.وإن لكم أن تجاهدوا لكي تصيروا مثلهم.ولكنكم عبثاً تحاولون أن تجعلوهم مثلكم.لأن الحياة لا ترجع إلى الوراء, ولا تلذ لها الإقامة في منزل الأمس.أنتم الأقواس وأولادكم سهام حية قد رمت بها الحياة عن أقواسكم.فإن رامي السهام ينظر العلامة المنصوبة على طريق اللانهاية, فيلويكم بقدرته لكي تكون سهامه سريعة بعيدة المدى.لذلك, فليكن التواؤكم بين يدي رامي السهام الحكيم لأجل المسرة والغبطة.لأنه, كما يحب السهم الذي يطير من قوسه, هكذا يحب القوس الذي يثبت بين يديه.
wisdom.author: جبران خليل جبران

wisdom.quote: Don’t let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.
wisdom.author: Dr Roopleen

wisdom.quote: There are some experiences in life they haven't invented the right words for.
wisdom.author: Lisa Kleypas

wisdom.quote: I have studied many philosophers and many cats. The wisdom of cats is infinitely superior.
wisdom.author: Hippolyte A. Taine

wisdom.quote: The fact that man knows right from wrong proves his intellectual superiority to the other creatures; but the fact that he can do wrong proves his moral inferiority to any creatures that cannot.
wisdom.author: Mark Twain

wisdom.quote: Focus on making yourself better, not on thinking that you are better.
wisdom.author: Bohdi Sanders

wisdom.quote: How could I have been so ignorant? she thinks. So stupid, so unseeing, so given over to carelessness. But without such ignorance, such carelessness, how could we live? If you knew what was going to happen, if you knew everything that was going to happen next—if you knew in advance the consequences of your own actions—you'd be doomed. You'd be as ruined as God. You'd be a stone. You'd never eat or drink or laugh or get out of bed in the morning. You'd never love anyone, ever again. You'd never dare to.
wisdom.author: Margaret Atwood

wisdom.quote: Yet what keeps me from dissolving right now into a complete fairy-tale shimmer is this solid truth, a truth which has veritably built my bones over the last few years--I was not rescued by a prince; I was the administrator of my own rescue.
wisdom.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

wisdom.quote: When you've learned to laugh at the things that should be laughed at, and not to laugh at those that shouldn't, you've got wisdom and understanding.
wisdom.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

wisdom.quote: My father always used to say, "Don't raise your voice. Improve your argument." Good sense does not always lie with the loudest shouters, nor can we say that a large, unruly crowd is always the best arbiter of what is right.
wisdom.author: Desmond Tutu

wisdom.quote: A bird is safe in its nest - but that is not what its wings are made for.
wisdom.author: Amit Ray

wisdom.quote: Dieting is the only game where you win when you lose!
wisdom.author: Karl Lagerfeld

wisdom.quote: إلى البكائين على مافات٫ المتحيّرين وراء تحقيق المعجزات٫ الدائرين حول محور من أنفسهم يصارعون المنى وتصارعهم دون الانتهاء إلى قرار.. ألى هؤلاء نوجّه كلمة ( وليم جيمس ) : "ان بيننا وبين الله رابطة لاتنفصم٫ فإذا نحن أخضعنا أنفسنا لإشرافه-سبحانه وتعالى- تحققت أمنياتنا وآمالنا كلها
wisdom.author: محمد الغزالي

wisdom.quote: Please, touch me, I pray.
wisdom.author: Jess C Scott

wisdom.quote: Conceit spoils the finest genius.
wisdom.author: Louisa May Alcott

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is the reward for surviving our own stupidity.
wisdom.author: Brian Rathbone

wisdom.quote: Wisdom comes through suffering.Trouble, with its memories of pain,Drips in our hearts as we try to sleep,So men against their willLearn to practice moderation.Favours come to us from gods.
wisdom.author: Aeschylus

wisdom.quote: You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone.
wisdom.author: Amit Ray

wisdom.quote: I am the shore and the ocean, awaiting myself on both sides.
wisdom.author: Dejan Stojanovic

wisdom.quote: Can you look without the voice in your head commenting, drawing conclusions, comparing, or trying to figure something out?
wisdom.author: Eckhart Tolle

wisdom.quote: The moon will guide you through the night with her brightness, but she will always dwell in the darkness, in order to be seen.
wisdom.author: Shannon L. Alder

wisdom.quote: No,’ Nico said. ‘Getting a second life is one thing. Making it a better life, that’s the trick.’ As soon as he said it, Nico realized he could’ve been talking about himself. He decided not to bring that up.
wisdom.author: Rick Riordan

wisdom.quote: I always cheer up immensely if an attack is particularly wounding because I think, well, if they attack one personally, it means they have not a single political argument left.
wisdom.author: Margaret Thatcher

wisdom.quote: You can't dwell on what might have been...and it's not fair to condemn him for something he hasn't done.
wisdom.author: Wendelin Van Draanen

wisdom.quote: To know a species, look at its fears. To know yourself, look at your fears. Fear in itself is not important, but fear stands there and points you in the direction of things that are important. Don't be afraid of your fears, they're not there to scare you; they're there to let you know that something is worth it.
wisdom.author: C. JoyBell C.

wisdom.quote: We're all fools," said Clemens, "all the time. It's just we're a different kind each day. We think, I'm not a fool today. I've learned my lesson. I was a fool yesterday but not this morning. Then tomorrow we find out that, yes, we were a fool today too. I think the only way we can grow and get on in this world is to accept the fact we're not perfect and live accordingly.
wisdom.author: Ray Bradbury

wisdom.quote: I look back now and realize that the gift of a true friend is that she sees you not the way you see yourself or the way others see you. A true friend sees you for who you are and who you can become.
wisdom.author: Robin Jones Gunn

wisdom.quote: People are always complaining that life's not fair, but that simply isn't true. Life is extraordinarily fair. It's just not centered on you.
wisdom.author: Lynn Marie Sager

wisdom.quote: Discipline allows magic. To be a writer is to be the very best of assassins. You do not sit down and write every day to force the Muse to show up. You get into the habit of writing every day so that when she shows up, you have the maximum chance of catching her, bashing her on the head, and squeezing every last drop out of that bitch.
wisdom.author: Lili St. Crow

wisdom.quote: It’s always about timing. If it’s too soon, no one understands. If it’s too late, everyone’s forgotten.
wisdom.author: Anna Wintour

wisdom.quote: That woman doesn't have the sense God gave a retarded flea.
wisdom.author: Nora Roberts

wisdom.quote: Crying does not indicate that you are weak. Since birth, it has always been a sign that you are alive.
wisdom.author: Charlotte Brontë

wisdom.quote: Every person has a right to risk their own life for the preservation of it.
wisdom.author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

wisdom.quote: In the land of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.
wisdom.author: Desiderius Erasmus

wisdom.quote: Quiet people always know more than they seem. Although very normal, their inner world is by default fronted mysterious and therefore assumed weird. Never underestimate the social awareness and sense of reality in a quiet person; they are some of the most observant, absorbent persons of all.
wisdom.author: Criss Jami

wisdom.quote: Dear Child, Sometimes on your travel through hell, you meet people that think they are in heaven because of their cleverness and ability to get away with things. Travel past them because they don't understand who they have become and never will. These type of people feel justified in revenge and will never learn mercy or forgiveness because they live by comparison. They are the people that don't care about anyone, other than who is making them feel confident. They don’t understand that their deity is not rejoicing with them because of their actions, rather he is trying to free them from their insecurities, by softening their heart. They rather put out your light than find their own. They don't have the ability to see beyond the false sense of happiness they get from destroying others. You know what happiness is and it isn’t this. Don’t see their success as their deliverance. It is a mask of vindication which has no audience, other than their own kind. They have joined countless others that call themselves "survivors". They believe that they are entitled to win because life didn’t go as planned for them. You are not like them. You were not meant to stay in hell and follow their belief system. You were bound for greatness. You were born to help them by leading. Rise up and be the light home. You were given the gift to see the truth. They will have an army of people that are like them and you are going to feel alone. However, your family in heaven stands beside you now. They are your strength and as countless as the stars. It is time to let go!Love, Your Guardian Angel
wisdom.author: Shannon L. Alder

wisdom.quote: In our reasonings concerning matter of fact, there are all imaginable degrees of assurance, from the highest certainty to the lowest species of moral evidence. A wise man, therefore, proportions his belief to the evidence.
wisdom.author: David Hume

wisdom.quote: I have been finding treasures in places I did not want to search. I have been hearing wisdom from tongues I did not want to listen. I have been finding beauty where I did not want to look. And I have learned so much from journeys I did not want to take. Forgive me, O Gracious One; for I have been closing my ears and eyes for too long. I have learned that miracles are only called miracles because they are often witnessed by only those who can can see through all of life's illusions. I am ready to see what really exists on other side, what exists behind the blinds, and taste all the ugly fruit instead of all that looks right, plump and ripe.
wisdom.author: Suzy Kassem

wisdom.quote: Fear can’t be reasoned with. Neither can hate. They’re like love. They’re almost identical emotions. That’s why Ares and Aphrodite like each other. Their twin sons – Fear and Panic – were spawned from both war and love.
wisdom.author: Rick Riordan

wisdom.quote: Peace is not happenstance. It is a living fire that must be fed constantly. It must be tended with vigilance, else it dies out.
wisdom.author: Libba Bray

wisdom.quote: I have come to the conclusion never again to think of marrying, and for this reason, I can never be satisfied with anyone who would be blockhead enough to have me.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: If a man could have half of his wishes, he would double his troubles.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.quote: We spend January 1st walking through our lives, room by room, drawing up a list of work to be done, cracks to be patched. Maybe this year, to balance the list, we ought to walk through the rooms of our lives...not looking for flaws, but for potential.
wisdom.author: Ellen Goodman

wisdom.quote: I would rather be able to appreciate things I cannot have than to have things I am not able to appreciate.
wisdom.author: Elbert Hubbard

wisdom.quote: A wind that blows aimlessly is no good to anyone.
wisdom.author: Rick Riordan

wisdom.quote: We do not need to eat animals, wear animals, or use animals for entertainment purposes, and our only defense of these uses is our pleasure, amusement, and convenience.
wisdom.author: Gary L. Francione

wisdom.quote: A man in love is incomplete until he has married. Then he's finished.
wisdom.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

wisdom.quote: May your feet ever walk in the light of two suns... and may the moonshadow never fall on you...
wisdom.author: Robert Fanney

wisdom.quote: The wise man knows that it is better to sit on the banks of a remote mountain stream than to be emperor of the whole world.
wisdom.author: Zhuangzi

wisdom.quote: Imagine others complexly.
wisdom.author: John Green

wisdom.quote: Ethical veganism results in a profound revolution within the individual; a complete rejection of the paradigm of oppression and violence that she has been taught from childhood to accept as the natural order. It changes her life and the lives of those with whom she shares this vision of nonviolence. Ethical veganism is anything but passive; on the contrary, it is the active refusal to cooperate with injustice
wisdom.author: GaryLFrancione

wisdom.quote: I like places like this," he announced.I like old places too," Josh said, "but what's to like about a place like this?"The king spread his arms wide. "What do you see?"Josh made a face. "Junk. Rusted tractor, broken plow, old bike."Ahh...but I see a tractor that was once used to till these fields. I see the plow it once pulled. I see a bicycle carefully placed out of harm's way under a table."Josh slowly turned again, looking at the items once more.And i see these things and I wonder at the life of the person who carefully stored the precious tractor and plow in the barn out of the weather, and placed their bike under a homemade table."Why do you wonder?" Josh asked. "Why is it even important?"Because someone has to remember," Gilgamesh snapped, suddenly irritated. "Some one has to remember the human who rode the bike and drove the tractor, the person who tilled the fields, who was born and lived and died, who loved and laughed and cried, the person who shivered in the cold and sweated in the sun." He walked around the barn again, touching each item, until his palm were red with rust." It is only when no one remembers, that you are truely lost. That is the true death.
wisdom.author: Michael Scott

wisdom.quote: No matter what you do, someone always knew you would.
wisdom.author: Ami McKay

wisdom.quote: ...unfortunately, it's true: time does heal. It will do so whether you like it or not, and there's nothing anyone can do about it. If you're not careful, time will take away everything that ever hurt you, everything you have ever lost, and replace it with knowledge. Time is a machine: it will convert your pain into experience. Raw data will be compiled, will be translated into a more comprehensible language. The individual events of your life will be transmuted into another substance called memory and in the mechanism something will be lost and you will never be able to reverse it, you will never again have the original moment back in its uncategorized, preprocessed state. It will force you to move on and you will not have a choice in the matter.
wisdom.author: Charles Yu

wisdom.quote: If you don't feel it, flee from it. Go where you are celebrated, not merely tolerated.
wisdom.author: Paul F. Davis

wisdom.quote: They'll say you are bador perhaps you are mador at least you should stay undercover.Your mind must be bareif you would dareto think you can love more than one lover.
wisdom.author: David Rovics

wisdom.quote: I was tired of seeing the Graces always depicted as beautiful young things. I think wisdom comes with age and life and pain. And knowing what matters.
wisdom.author: Louise Penny

wisdom.quote: Whoever cannot seek the unforeseen sees nothing for the known way is an impasse.
wisdom.author: Heraclitus

wisdom.quote: Maybe it just means that love can be stronger than fear.
wisdom.author: L.J. Smith

wisdom.quote: If I had a shiny gun I could have a world of fun Speeding bullets through the brains Of the folks that cause me pains :)
wisdom.author: Dorothy Parker

wisdom.quote: Non-judgment quiets the internal dialogue, and this opens once again the doorway to creativity.
wisdom.author: Deepak Chopra

wisdom.quote: Love is wise; hatred is foolish. In this world, which is getting more and more closely interconnected, we have to learn to tolerate each other, we have to learn to put up with the fact that some people say things that we don't like. We can only live together in that way. But if we are to live together, and not die together, we must learn a kind of charity and a kind of tolerance, which is absolutely vital to the continuation of human life on this planet.
wisdom.author: Bertrand Russell

wisdom.quote: Consider non your superior, whatever their rank or station in life. Treat all fairly or they will seek revenge. Be careful with your money. Hold fast to your belief and others will listen." he continued at a slower pace, " of the affairs of love ... my only advice is to be honest. thats your most powerfull too to unlock a heart or gain forgiveness. that is all i have to say"Garrow to Roran p 64
wisdom.author: Christopher Paolini

wisdom.quote: We are here and it is now. Further than that, all human knowledge is moonshine.
wisdom.author: H.L. Mencken

wisdom.quote: The way you give your name to others is a measure of how much you like and respect yourself.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: Ô, Wanderess, WanderessWhen did you feel your most euphoric kiss? Was I the source of your greatest bliss?
wisdom.author: Roman Payne

wisdom.quote: We understand more than we know.
wisdom.author: Margaret Atwood

wisdom.quote: Imagine no limitations; decide what's right and desirable before you decide what's possible.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: Love is not a relationship, love is a state of being; it has nothing to do with anybody else. One is not "in love", one is love. And of course when one is love, one is in love – but that is an outcome, a by-product, that is not the source. The source is that one is love.
wisdom.author: Osho

wisdom.quote: It seems wisest to assume the worst from the beginning...and let anything better come as a surprise.
wisdom.author: Jules Verne

wisdom.quote: You must purge yourself before finding faults in others.When you see a mistake in somebody else, try to find if you are making the same mistake.This is the way to take judgment and to turn it into improvement.Do not look at others' bodies with envy or with superiority.All people are born with different constitutions.Never compare with others.Each one's capacities are a function of his or her internal strength.Know your capacities and continually improve upon them.
wisdom.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

wisdom.quote: Knowledge is merely brilliance in organization of ideas and not wisdom. The truly wise person goes beyond knowledge.
wisdom.author: Confucius

wisdom.quote: Do you understand what I'm saying?"shouted Moist. "You can't just go around killing people!"Why Not? You Do." The golem lowered his arm."What?" snapped Moist. "I do not! Who told you that?"I Worked It Out. You Have Killed Two Point Three Three Eight People," said the golem calmly."I have never laid a finger on anyone in my life, Mr Pump. I may be–– all the things you know I am, but I am not a killer! I have never so much as drawn a sword!"No, You Have Not. But You Have Stolen, Embezzled, Defrauded And Swindled Without Discrimination, Mr Lipvig. You Have Ruined Businesses And Destroyed Jobs. When Banks Fail, It Is Seldom Bankers Who Starve. Your Actions Have Taken Money From Those Who Had Little Enough To Begin With. In A Myriad Small Ways You Have Hastened The Deaths Of Many. You Do Not Know Them. You Did Not See Them Bleed. But You Snatched Bread From Their Mouths And Tore Clothes From Their Backs. For Sport, Mr Lipvig. For Sport. For The Joy Of The Game.
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett

wisdom.quote: All our wisdom is stored in the trees.
wisdom.author: Santosh Kalwar

wisdom.quote: A great tree develops over time and can tell stories not only those of happiness, but also those that contain pain from what it has seen over the years, and as a result is the wise ancient tree that it is today. As the seasons change, the tree naturally goes through changes as well: where the leaves turn yellow and orange in the fall, falling by the Winter, returning in the Spring, and with full set of new leafs by the Summer. Love is no different in that there will be times when we are fully naked in the Winter, and left to wonder about Spring when it seemed so easy to love, yet the wise tree knows that no winter will last forever no matter how cold it may be.
wisdom.author: Forrest Curran

wisdom.quote: God is the supreme uncreated light of which Wisdom is born, but there was never a time when God's Wisdom did not exist.
wisdom.author: Merritt Y. Hughes

wisdom.quote: It does not matter where you go and what you study, what matters most is what you share with yourself and the world.
wisdom.author: Santosh Kalwar

wisdom.quote: It was not curiosity that killed the goose who laid the golden egg, but an insatiable greed that devoured common sense.
wisdom.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

wisdom.quote: و ميز كلامك قبل الكلام… فإن لكل كلام جوابفرب كلام يمص الحشى … و فيه من المزح ما يستطاب
wisdom.author: محمد بن إدريس الشافعي

wisdom.quote: Sex is a powerful intent to create: the creation of pleasure, creation of love, and ultimately the creation of life. It connects and syncs two beings emotionally, physically, and mentally and is one of the strongest expressions of love that exists in this World.
wisdom.author: Forrest Curran

wisdom.quote: Selfishness and greed, individual or national, cause most of our troubles.
wisdom.author: Harry S. Truman

wisdom.quote: Ordinary people merely think how they shall 'spend' their time; a man of talent tries to 'use' it.
wisdom.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

wisdom.quote: Yes, the brutalities of progress are called revolutions. When they are over, this is recognised: that the human race has been harshly treated, but that it has advanced.
wisdom.author: Victor Hugo

wisdom.quote: Good morning," said the little prince.Good morning," said the merchant.This was a merchant who sold pills that had been invented to quench thirst. You need only swallow one pill a week, and you would feel no need for anything to drink.Why are you selling those?" asked the little prince.Because they save a tremendous amount of time," said the merchant. "Computations have been made by experts. With these pills, you save fifty-three minutes in every week."And what do I do with those fifty-three minutes?"Anything you like..."As for me," said the little prince to himself, "if I had fifty-three minutes to spend as I liked, I should walk at my leisure toward a spring of fresh water.
wisdom.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

wisdom.quote: To acquire knowledge, one must study;but to acquire wisdom, one must observe.
wisdom.author: Marilyn vos Savant

wisdom.quote: Obstacles are those frightening things you see when you take you eyes off your goal.
wisdom.author: Henry James

wisdom.quote: To know that we know what we know, and to know that we do not know what we do not know, that is true knowledge.
wisdom.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

wisdom.quote: ما في المقامِ لذي عقلٍ وذي أدبمِنْ رَاحَة ٍ فَدعِ الأَوْطَانَ واغْتَرِبِسافر تجد عوضاً عمَّن تفارقهُوَانْصِبْ فَإنَّ لَذِيذَ الْعَيْشِ فِي النَّصَبِإني رأيتُ وقوفَ الماء يفسدهُإِنْ سَال طَابَ وَإنْ لَمْ يَجْرِ لَمْ يَطِبِوالأسدُ لولا فراقُ الأرض ما افترستوالسَّهمُ لولا فراقُ القوسِ لم يصبوالشمس لو وقفت في الفلكِ دائمة لَمَلَّهَا النَّاسُ مِنْ عُجْمٍ وَمِنَ عَرَبِو البدر لولا أفول منه ما نظرتإليه في كل حين عين مرتقبوالتَّبْرَ كالتُّرْبَ مُلْقَى في أَمَاكِنِه والعودُ في أرضه نوعً من الحطبفإن تغرَّب هذا عزَّ مطلبهُ وإنْ تَغَرَّبَ ذَاكَ عَزَّ كالذَّهَبِِ
wisdom.author: الإمام الشافعى

wisdom.quote: God isn't the son of Memory; He's the son of Immediate Experience. You can't worship a spirit in spirit, unless you do it now. Wallowing in the past may be good literature. As wisdom, it's hopeless. Time Regained is Paradise Lost, and Time Lost is Paradise Regained. Let the dead bury their dead. If you want to live at every moment as it presents itself, you've got to die to every other moment.
wisdom.author: Aldous Huxley

wisdom.quote: I believe it is the mark of a great leader to question the decisions that came before him.
wisdom.author: Marissa Meyer

wisdom.quote: Be wise today so you don't cry tomorrow.
wisdom.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

wisdom.quote: Never question another man's motive. His wisdom, yes, but not his motives.
wisdom.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

wisdom.quote: I call that man awake who, with conscious knowledge and understanding, can perceive the deep unreasoning powers in his soul, his whole innermost strength, desire and weakness, and knows how to reckon with himself.
wisdom.author: Hermann Hesse

wisdom.quote: I believe that maturity is not an outgrowing, but a growing up: that an adult is not a dead child, but a child who survived. I believe that all the best faculties of a mature human being exist in the child. . . . that one of the most deeply human, and humane, of these faculties is the power of imagination.
wisdom.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

wisdom.quote: To assess the quality of thoughts of people, don't listen to their words, but watch their actions.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: I am so wise I had my mouth sewn shut.
wisdom.author: John Berryman

wisdom.quote: There are times when wisdom cannot be found in the chambers of parliament or the halls of academia but at the unpretentious setting of the kitchen table.
wisdom.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

wisdom.quote: No one lives long enough to learn everything they need to learn starting from scratch. To be successful, we absolutely, positively have to find people who have already paid the price to learn the things that we need to learn to achieve our goals.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: There is no one way to salvation, whatever the manner in which a man may proceed. All forms and variations are governed by the eternal intelligence of the Universe that enables a man to approach perfection. It may be in the arts of music and painting or it may be in commerce, law, or medicine. It may be in the study of war or the study of peace. Each is as important as any other. Spiritual enlightenment through religious meditation such as Zen or in any other way is as viable and functional as any "Way."... A person should study as they see fit.
wisdom.author: Miyamoto Musashi

wisdom.quote: Wise men profit more by fools than fools by wise men.
wisdom.author: Marcus Porcius Cato

wisdom.quote: I don't trust men everybody likes. Being nice isn't the same as being good.
wisdom.author: Sarah Rees Brennan

wisdom.quote: Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
wisdom.author: Dion Boucicault

wisdom.quote: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony.
wisdom.author: Orison Swett Marden

wisdom.quote: Nothing and no one is perfect. It just takes a good eye to find those hidden imperfections.
wisdom.author: Daphne Delacroix

wisdom.quote: Let mental culture go on advancing, let the natural sciences progress in even greater extent and depth, and the human mind widen itself as much as it desires: beyond the elevation and moral culture of Christianity, as it shines forth in the Gospels, it will not go.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: He who is more mindful of one, loses the love and the faith of both.
wisdom.author: Khalil Gibran

wisdom.quote: Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
wisdom.author: Confucius

wisdom.quote: All that sadness. All that anger. It is the smoke that gets into your eyes. If you do not blow it away, how can you hope to see?
wisdom.author: Anthony Horowitz

wisdom.quote: Our power lies in our small daily choices, one after another, to create eternal ripples of a life well lived.
wisdom.author: Mollie Marti

wisdom.quote: It is not our right to punish one for thinking as he does, no matter how much we disagree.
wisdom.author: Oliver Bowden

wisdom.quote: Lady Wisdom will be your close friend; and Brother Knowledge will be your pleasant companion.
wisdom.author: Anonymous

wisdom.quote: No problem can be solved from the same level of consciousness that created it.
wisdom.author: Albert Einstein

wisdom.quote: I drink cup of sunlight every morning to brighten myself.
wisdom.author: Debasish Mridha

wisdom.quote: The greatest wisdom consists in knowing one's own follies.
wisdom.author: Madeleine De Souvre Sable

wisdom.quote: Who is wise? He that learns from everyone. Who is powerful? He that governs his passions. Who is rich? He that is content. Who is that? Nobody.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin

wisdom.quote: Errors do not cease to be errors simply because they’re ratified into law.
wisdom.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

wisdom.quote: Yeah. I mean, acknowledging is easy. Something happened or it didn't. But understanding... that's where things get sticky.
wisdom.author: Sarah Dessen

wisdom.quote: It takes too much energy to be against something unless it's really important.
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'Engle

wisdom.quote: Aw I don't wanta go to no such thing, I just wanta drink in alleys.'...But you'll miss all that, just for some old wine.'There's wisdom in wine, goddam it!' I yelled. 'Have a shot!
wisdom.author: Jack Kerouac

wisdom.quote: Experience teaches us that it is much easier to prevent an enemy from posting themselves than it is to dislodge them after they have got possession.
wisdom.author: George Washington

wisdom.quote: There is no such uncertainty as a sure thing.
wisdom.author: Robert Burns

wisdom.quote: People ought to fight to keep their law as to defend the citys walls.
wisdom.author: Heraclitus

wisdom.quote: Disciplining yourself to do what you know is right and importance, although difficult, is the highroad to pride, self-esteem, and personal satisfaction.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: Today the greatest single source of wealth is between your ears.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: The image isn't reality. Even though we're used to thinking that way alot of the time. We show a kid a picture of a dog and say 'This is a doggie' - but it's not. It's just an image.
wisdom.author: L.J. Smith

wisdom.quote: To make no mistakes is not in the power of man; but from their errors and mistakes the wise and good learn wisdom for the future.
wisdom.author: Plutarch

wisdom.quote: I'm not sure why I've decided to do this. I'm not any stronger than I was, and nothing else has changed. But all the same, this time I'm not going to run away. It's okay to feel weak sometimes. It's okay to be afraid. The important thing is that we face our fears. That's what makes us strong."-Yuki
wisdom.author: Natsuki Takaya

wisdom.quote: I had given up some youth for knowledge, but my gain was more valuable than the loss
wisdom.author: Maya Angelou

wisdom.quote: The noble man is chiefly concerned with wisdom and friendship; of these, the former is a mortal good, the latter and immortal one.
wisdom.author: Epicurus

wisdom.quote: Don't you notice that there are particular moments when you are naturally inspired to introspection? Work with them gently, for these are the moments when you can go through a powerful experience, and your whole worldview can change quickly.
wisdom.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

wisdom.quote: You can never know everything. Part of what you know is always wrong. Perhaps the most important part. A portion of wisdom lies in knowing that. A portion of knowledge lies in going on anyway.
wisdom.author: Robert  Jordan

wisdom.quote: When something seems wrong in your life, the only way to have resolution with it is to let it go. Trying to make it right keeps it wrong.
wisdom.author: Beth Johnson

wisdom.quote: For the senses wander, and when one lets the mind follow them, it carries wisdom away like a windblown ship on the waters.
wisdom.author: Anonymous

wisdom.quote: Only a mind free of impediment is capable of grasping the chaotic beauty of the world. This is our greatest asset.
wisdom.author: Oliver Bowden

wisdom.quote: Few things a doctor does are more important than relieving pain. . . pain is soul destroying. No patient should have to endure intense pain unnecessarily. The quality of mercy is essential to the practice of medicine; here, of all places, it should not be strained.
wisdom.author: Marcia Angell

wisdom.quote: One hand I extend into myself, the other toward others.
wisdom.author: Dejan Stojanovic

wisdom.quote: While differing widely in the various little bits we know, in our infinite ignorance we are all equal.
wisdom.author: Karl R. Popper

wisdom.quote: The operation of the Church is entirely set up for the sinner; which creates much misunderstanding among the smug."(August 9, 1955)
wisdom.author: Flannery O'Connor

wisdom.quote: Never underestimate your power to change yourself; never overestimate your power to change others.
wisdom.author: Wayne W. Dyer

wisdom.quote: Jewels can be replaced, cousin. Independence, once lost, cannot.
wisdom.author: R.L. LaFevers

wisdom.quote: Intelligence is more important than strength, that is why earth is ruled by men and not by animals.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: Throughout our emotional odyssey in the unembellished narrative of our life, we may sense many alluring voices that are enticing us into a beguiling, seamless story. Our inner monologue, however, might start raising consequential questions about the scintillation of that story, about our vulnerability during the tempting process and the danger of losing our real self. The question may be asked, whether the lure might enlighten, weaken or destroy our living. While our interior monologue mostly listens to the wisdom of our experience and the guidance of our memory, it may happen that it prefers not to listen. In that event, however, unreason and passion will be calling all the shots. ( "Woman in progress" )
wisdom.author: Erik Pevernagie

wisdom.quote: Penetrate deep into the word "Om". Gradually the word will disappear and only the silence will remain. The word is a support. The meaning is within you. Om brings out that meaning which is hidden in your soul.
wisdom.author: Amit Ray

wisdom.quote: She wished she could visit Mariam's grave, to sit with her awhile, leave a flower or two. But she sees now that it doesn't matter. Mariam is never very far.... Mariam is in her own heart, where she shines with the bursting radiance of a thousand suns.
wisdom.author: Khaled Hosseini

wisdom.quote: Life moves very fast. It rushes from Heaven to Hell in a matter of seconds.
wisdom.author: Paulo Coelho

wisdom.quote: Failure is instructive. The person who really thinks learns quite as much from his failures as from his successes.
wisdom.author: John Dewey

wisdom.quote: More people would learn from their mistakes if they weren't so busy denying them
wisdom.author: Harold J. Smith

wisdom.quote: Affliction is often that thing which prepares an ordinary person for some sort of an extraordinary destiny.
wisdom.author: C.S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: If you wish to achieve worthwhile things in your personal and career life, you must become a worthwhile person in your own self-development.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: And, at such a time, for a few of us there will always be a tugging at the heart—knowing a precious moment had gone and we not there. We can ask and ask but we can’t have again what once seemed ours for ever—the way things looked, that church alone in the fields, a bed on belfry floor, a remembered voice, a loved face. They’ve gone and you can only wait for the pain to pass.
wisdom.author: J.L. Carr

wisdom.quote: Wisdom is the oneness of mind that guides and permeates all things.
wisdom.author: Heraclitus

wisdom.quote: With age comes wisdom, but sometimes age comes alone.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.quote: There are four things that lead to wisdom. You ready for them?'She nodded, wondering when the police work would begin."They are four sentences we learn to say, and mean." Gamache held up his hand as a fist and raised a finger with each point. "I don't know. I need help. I'm sorry. I was wrong'.
wisdom.author: Louise Penny

wisdom.quote: Socrates: Have you noticed on our journey how often the citizens of this new land remind each other it is a free country? Plato: I have, and think it odd they do this.Socrates: How so, Plato?Plato: It is like reminding a baker he is a baker, or a sculptor he is asculptor.Socrates: You mean to say if someone is convinced of their trade, they haveno need to be reminded.Plato: That is correct.Socrates: I agree. If these citizens were convinced of their freedom, they would not need reminders.
wisdom.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

wisdom.quote: A birth-date is a reminder to celebrate the life as well as to update the life.
wisdom.author: Amit Kalantri

wisdom.quote: The more credit you give away, the more will come back to you. The more you help others, the more they will want to help you.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: If you envy successful people, you create a negative force field of attraction that repels you from ever doing the things that you need to do to be successful. If you admire successful people, you create a positive force field of attraction that draws you toward becoming more and more like the kinds of people that you want to be like.
wisdom.author: Brian Tracy

wisdom.quote: It seems that a profound, impartial, and absolutely just opinion of our fellow-creatures is utterly unknown. Either we are men, or we are women. Either we are cold, or we are sentimental. Either we are young, or growing old. In any case life is but a procession of shadows, and God knows why it is that we embrace them so eagerly, and see them depart with such anguish, being shadows. And why, if this -- and much more than this is true -- why are we yet surprised in the window corner by a sudden vision that the young man in the chair is of all things in the world the most real, the most solid, the best known to us--why indeed? For the moment after we know nothing about him.Such is the manner of our seeing. Such the conditions of our love.
wisdom.author: Virginia Woolf

wisdom.quote: The rule of the universe is that others can do for us what we cannot do for ourselves, and one can paddle every canoe except one's own.
wisdom.author: C.S. Lewis
