wisdom.author: R. Buckminster Fuller, Operating Manual for Spaceship Earth, 1963

wisdom.quote: I know nothing about sex because I was always married.
wisdom.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

wisdom.quote: It is kind of strange watching your personal history become costume.
wisdom.author: gadgetgirl, gadgetgirl, 07-25-07

wisdom.quote: A wise man's question contains half the answer.
wisdom.author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

wisdom.quote: It has always been the prerogative of children and half-wits to point out that the emperor has no clothes. But the half-wit remains a half-wit, and the emperor remains an emperor.
wisdom.author: Neil Gaiman, Sandman

wisdom.quote: What power would Hell have if those imprisoned there were not able to dream of Heaven?
wisdom.author: Neil Gaiman, Sandman, a Hope In Hell

wisdom.quote: If you put tomfoolery into a computer, nothing comes out of it but tomfoolery. But this tomfoolery, having passed through a very expensive machine, is somehow ennobled and no-one dares criticize it.
wisdom.author: Pierre Gallois

wisdom.quote: I could prove God statistically.
wisdom.author: George Gallup

wisdom.quote: Don't you wish there was a knob on the TV to turn up the intelligence? There's one marked 'Brightness,' but it doesn't work.
wisdom.author: Gallagher

wisdom.quote: Young people have an almost biological destiny to be hopeful.
wisdom.author: Marshall Ganz, quoted by Sara Rimer in New York Times

wisdom.quote: Where facts are few, experts are many.
wisdom.author: Donald R. Gannon

wisdom.quote: My grandfather once told me that there are two kinds of people: those who work and those who take the credit. He told me to try to be in the first group; there was less competition there.
wisdom.author: Indira Gandhi

wisdom.quote: My grandfather once told me that there were two kinds of people: those who do the work and those who take the credit. He told me to try to be in the first group; there was much less competition.
wisdom.author: Indira Gandhi

wisdom.quote: We must learn to be still in the midst of activity and to be vibrantly alive in repose.
wisdom.author: Indira Gandhi

wisdom.quote: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
wisdom.author: Indira Gandhi, quoted by Christian Science Monitor, May 17, 1982

wisdom.quote: We would rather starve than sell our national honor.
wisdom.author: Indira Gandhi, Remark in election meeting in Nagpur, India 1967

wisdom.quote: Among the individuals, as well as among nations, respecting the other people's rights leads to peace. (Entre los individuos, como entre las naciones, el respeto al derecho ajeno es la Paz.)
wisdom.author: Benito Juarez Garcia, Former (late 1800's) President of Mexico.

wisdom.quote: Economics is extremely useful as a form of employment for economists.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: Faced with the choice between changing one's mind and proving that there is no need to do so, almost everyone gets busy on the proof.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: If all else fails, immortality can always be assured by spectacular error.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: It is a far, far better thing to have a firm anchor in nonsense than to put out on the troubled sea of thought.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: It is almost as important to know what is not serious as to know what is.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: Meetings are indispensable when you don't want to do anything.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: Nothing is so admirable in politics as a short memory.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: Politics is not the art of the possible. It consists in choosing between the disastrous and the unpalatable.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: The conventional view serves to protect us from the painful job of thinking.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: The happiest time of anyone's life is just after the first divorce.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: The modern conservative is engaged in one of man's oldest exercises in moral philosophy; that is, the search for a superior moral justification for selfishness.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: The only function of economic forecasting is to make astrology look respectable.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: Under capitalism, man exploits man. Under communism, it's just the opposite.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: Where humor is concerned there are no standards - no one can say what is good or bad, although you can be sure that everyone will.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: You will find that the State is the kind of organization which, though it does big things badly, does small things badly, too.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.quote: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.
wisdom.author: Galileo Galilei

wisdom.quote: I do not feel obliged to believe that the same God who has endowed us with sense, reason, and intellect has intended us to forgo their use.
wisdom.author: Galileo Galilei

wisdom.quote: I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him.
wisdom.author: Galileo Galilei

wisdom.quote: Mathematics is the language in which God has written the universe.
wisdom.author: Galileo Galilei

wisdom.quote: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him find it within himself.
wisdom.author: Galileo Galilei

wisdom.quote: Long experience has taught me this about the status of mankind with regard to matters requiring thought: the less people know and understand about them, the more positively they attempt to argue concerning them, while on the other hand to know and understand a multitude of things renders men cautious in passing judgement upon anything new.
wisdom.author: Galileo Galilei, The Assayer

wisdom.quote: That's the funny thing about havin' a kid. They come with their own set of problems; make everything else you were worried about seem kinda silly.
wisdom.author: Greg Garcia, Raising Hope, Dead Tooth, 09-28-10

wisdom.quote: What's the difference between a boyfriend and a husband? About 30 pounds.
wisdom.author: Cindy Gardner

wisdom.quote: Always aim at complete harmony of thought and word and deed. Always aim at purifying your thoughts and everything will be well.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: As long as you derive inner help and comfort from anything, keep it.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: Hate the sin, love the sinner.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: Honest differences are often a healthy sign of progress.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: Honest disagreement is often a good sign of progress.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: I believe in equality for everyone, except reporters and photographers.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: I cannot teach you violence, as I do not myself believe in it. I can only teach you not to bow your heads before any one even at the cost of your life.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: I object to violence because when it appears to do good, the good is only temporary; the evil it does is permanent.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: I want freedom for the full expression of my personality.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: In matters of conscience, the law of the majority has no place.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: In the attitude of silence the soul finds the path in a clearer light, and what is elusive and deceptive resolves itself into crystal clearness. Our life is a long and arduous quest after Truth.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: Indolence is a delightful but distressing state; we must be doing something to be happy.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: It is better to be violent, if there is violence in our hearts, than to put on the cloak of nonviolence to cover impotence.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: One needs to be slow to form convictions, but once formed they must be defended against the heaviest odds.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: Opera is when a guy gets stabbed in the back and, instead of bleeding, he sings.
wisdom.author: Ed Gardner

wisdom.quote: To me, there is no greater act of courage than being the one who kisses first.
wisdom.author: Janeane Garofalo

wisdom.quote: A pound of pluck is worth a ton of luck.
wisdom.author: James A. Garfield

wisdom.quote: Be fit for more than the thing you are now doing. Let everyone know that you have a reserve in yourself; that you have more power than you are now using. If you are not too large for the place you occupy, you are too small for it.
wisdom.author: James A. Garfield

wisdom.quote: History is philosophy teaching by example, and also warning; its two eyes are geography and chronology.
wisdom.author: James A. Garfield

wisdom.quote: Next in importance to freedom and justice is popular education, without which neither freedom nor justice can be permanently maintained.
wisdom.author: James A. Garfield, July 12, 1880

wisdom.quote: We are continually faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as insoluble problems.
wisdom.author: John W. Gardner

wisdom.quote: When Alexander the Great visited Diogenes and asked whether he could do anything for the famed teacher, Diogenes replied: 'Only stand out of my light.' Perhaps some day we shall know how to heighten creativity. Until then, one of the best things we can do for creative men and women is to stand out of their light.
wisdom.author: John W. Gardner

wisdom.quote: History never looks like history when you are living through it.
wisdom.author: John W. Gardner, quoted by Bill Moyers

wisdom.quote: Be a first rate version of yourself, not a second rate version of someone else.
wisdom.author: Judy Garland, to her daughter, Liza Minelli

wisdom.quote: There is still a difference between something and nothing, but it is purely geometrical and there is nothing behind the geometry.
wisdom.author: Martin Gardner, "The Mathematical Magic Show"

wisdom.quote: Motherly love is the fuel that enables a normal human being to do the impossible.
wisdom.author: Marion C. Garretty

wisdom.quote: When I despair, I remember that all through history the ways of truth and love have always won. There have been tyrants, and murderers, and for a time they can seem invincible, but in the end they always fall. Think of it--always.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: You must be the change you want to see in the world.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi

wisdom.quote: What difference does it make to the dead, the orphans and the homeless, whether the mad destruction is wrought under the name of totalitarianism or the holy name of liberty or democracy?
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi, "Non-Violence in Peace and War"

wisdom.quote: Victory attained by violence is tantamount to a defeat, for it is momentary.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi, 'Satyagraha Leaflet No. 13,' May 3, 1919

wisdom.quote: An eye for an eye makes the whole world blind.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi, (attributed)

wisdom.quote: Freedom is not worth having if it does not connote freedom to err. It passes my comprehension how human beings, be they ever so experienced and able, can delight in depriving other human beings of that precious right.
wisdom.author: Mahatma Gandhi, 1931

wisdom.quote: Like an ability or a muscle, hearing your inner wisdom is strengthened by doing it.
wisdom.author: Robbie Gass

wisdom.quote: I am in earnest; I will not equivocate; I will not excuse; I will not retreat a single inch; and I will be heard.
wisdom.author: William Lloyd Garrison

wisdom.quote: With reasonable men I will reason; with humane men I will plea; but to tyrants I will give no quarter, nor waste arguments where they will certainly be lost.
wisdom.author: William Lloyd Garrison

wisdom.quote: Nothing is gained, everything is lost, by subordinating principle to expediency.
wisdom.author: William Lloyd Garrison, The Purpose of Education, Maroon Tiger, January-February 1947

wisdom.quote: It's pretty clear now that what looked like it might have been some kind of counterculture is, in reality, just the plain old chaos of undifferentiated weirdness.
wisdom.author: Jerry Garcia

wisdom.quote: Somebody has to do something, and it's just incredibly pathetic that it has to be us.
wisdom.author: Jerry Garcia, (of the Grateful Dead)

wisdom.quote: At first cock-crow the ghosts must go Back to their quiet graves below.
wisdom.author: Theodosia Garrison

wisdom.quote: To judge the real importance of an individual, we should think of the effect his death would produce.
wisdom.author: Peter de Gaston Levis

wisdom.quote: Imagination is the one weapon in the war against reality.
wisdom.author: Jules de Gaultier

wisdom.quote: Love is that splendid triggering of human vitality... the supreme activity which nature affords anyone for going out of himself toward someone else.
wisdom.author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

wisdom.quote: Order is not pressure which is imposed on society from without, but an equilibrium which is set up from within.
wisdom.author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

wisdom.quote: We distinguish the excellent man from the common man by saying that the former is the one who makes great demands upon himself, and the latter who makes no demands on himself.
wisdom.author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

wisdom.quote: One does not hunt in order to kill; on the contrary, one kills in order to have hunted...If one were to present the sportsman with the death of the animal as a gift he would refuse it. What he is after is having to win it, to conquer the surly brute through his own effort and skill with all the extras that this carries with it: the immersion in the countryside, the healthfulness of the exercise, the distraction from his job.
wisdom.author: Jose Ortega y Gasset, Meditations on Hunting

wisdom.quote: If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars.
wisdom.author: J. Paul Getty

wisdom.quote: The meek shall inherit the Earth, but not its mineral rights.
wisdom.author: J. Paul Getty

wisdom.quote: A complex system that works is invariably found to have evolved from a simple system that works.
wisdom.author: John Gaule

wisdom.quote: All that is human must retrograde if it does not advance.
wisdom.author: Edward Gibbon

wisdom.quote: History is indeed little more than the register of the crimes, follies and misfortunes of mankind.
wisdom.author: Edward Gibbon

wisdom.quote: History is indeed little more than the register of the crimes, follies, and misfortunes of mankind.
wisdom.author: Edward Gibbon

wisdom.quote: Unprovided with original learning, unformed in the habits of thinking, unskilled in the arts of composition, I resolved to write a book.
wisdom.author: Edward Gibbon

wisdom.quote: We improve ourselves by victories over ourself. There must be contests, and you must win.
wisdom.author: Edward Gibbon

wisdom.quote: If you have any doubts that we live in a society controlled by men, try reading down the index of contributors to a volume of quotations, looking for women's names.
wisdom.author: Elaine Gill

wisdom.quote: Mathematics is the queen of the sciences.
wisdom.author: Carl Friedrich Gauss, from Sartorius von Waltershausen, "Gauss zum Gedachtniss" [1856]

wisdom.quote: If something anticipated arrives too late it finds us numb, wrung out from waiting, and we feel - nothing at all. The best things arrive on time.
wisdom.author: Dorothy Gilman, A New Kind of Country, 1978

wisdom.quote: Cowards are cruel, but the brave Love mercy, and delight to save.
wisdom.author: John Gay

wisdom.quote: Truth is the daughter of time.
wisdom.author: Aulus Gellius

wisdom.quote: One doesn't have a sense of humor. It has you.
wisdom.author: Larry Gelbart

wisdom.quote: Far better to think historically, to remember the lessons of the past. Thus, far better to conceive of power as consisting in part of the knowledge of when not to use all the power you have. Far better to be one who knows that if you reserve the power not to use all your power, you will lead others far more successfully and well.
wisdom.author: A. Bartlett Giamatti, President of Yale University

wisdom.quote: Wars teach us not to love our enemies, but to hate our allies.
wisdom.author: W. L. George

wisdom.quote: I know who I am. No one else knows who I am. If I was a giraffe, and someone said I was a snake, I'd think, no, actually I'm a giraffe.
wisdom.author: Richard Gere, to The Guardian (UK), June 2002

wisdom.quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
wisdom.author: Bill Gates

wisdom.quote: The great thing about a computer notebook is that no matter how much you stuff into it, it doesn't get bigger or heavier.
wisdom.author: Bill Gates, Business @ The Speed of Thought

wisdom.quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
wisdom.author: Bill Gates, Business @ The Speed of Thought

wisdom.quote: Just in terms of allocation of time resources, religion is not very efficient. There's a lot more I could be doing on a Sunday morning.
wisdom.author: Bill Gates, Time Magazine, January 13, 1996

wisdom.quote: Don't be afraid to take a big step if one is indicated. You can't cross a chasm in two small jumps.
wisdom.author: David Lloyd George

wisdom.quote: Let no man imagine that he has no influence. Whoever he may be, and wherever he may be placed, the man who thinks becomes a light and a power.
wisdom.author: Henry George

wisdom.quote: Man is the only animal whose desires increase as they are fed; the only animal that is never satisfied.
wisdom.author: Henry George

wisdom.quote: Letting your customers set your standards is a dangerous game, because the race to the bottom is pretty easy to win. Setting your own standards--and living up to them--is a better way to profit. Not to mention a better way to make your day worth all the effort you put into it.
wisdom.author: Seth Godin, Seth Godin's Blog, 07-28-06

wisdom.quote: People don't believe what you tell them. They rarely believe what you show them. They often believe what their friends tell them. They always believe what they tell themselves.
wisdom.author: Seth Godin, Seth Godin's Blog, 07-29-06

wisdom.quote: I always wanted to be somebody. If I made it, it's half because I was game enough to take a lot of punishment along the way and half because there were a lot of people who cared enough to help me.
wisdom.author: Althea Gibson

wisdom.quote: Girls are always running through my mind. They don't dare walk.
wisdom.author: Andy Gibb

wisdom.quote: A doctor saves lives -- It's up to people to create lives that are worth saving.
wisdom.author: Philip Gold, Doctors: Jokes, Quotes and Anecdotes 2005 Calendar

wisdom.quote: If you feel that you have boy feet planted on the ground, then the university has failed you.
wisdom.author: Robert Goheen

wisdom.quote: Not a shred of evidence exists in favor of the idea that life is serious.
wisdom.author: Brendan Gill

wisdom.quote: Anonymity is the truest expression of altruism.
wisdom.author: Eric Gibson, in The Wall Street Journal

wisdom.quote: Perplexity is the beginning of knowledge.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran, The Voice of the Master

wisdom.quote: If government could create jobs and raise children, socialism would have worked.
wisdom.author: George Gilder

wisdom.quote: Art is either plagiarism or revolution.
wisdom.author: Paul Gauguin

wisdom.quote: I shut my eyes in order to see.
wisdom.author: Paul Gauguin

wisdom.quote: Life being what it is, one dreams of revenge.
wisdom.author: Paul Gauguin

wisdom.quote: Most exciting ideas are not important. Most important ideas are not exciting. Not every problem has a solution. Every solution has side effects.
wisdom.author: Daniel E Geer Jr., Speech at Unix Users Convention

wisdom.quote: All phone calls are obscene.
wisdom.author: Karen Elizabeth Gordon

wisdom.quote: Either I've been missing something or nothing has been going on.
wisdom.author: Karen Elizabeth Gordon

wisdom.quote: The mind revels in conjecture. Where information is lacking, it will gladly fill in the gaps.
wisdom.author: James Geary, The World in a Phrase: A Brief History of the Aphorism

wisdom.quote: Children are like wet cement.  Whatever falls on them makes an impression.
wisdom.author: Haim Ginott

wisdom.quote: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
wisdom.author: Jean Giraudoux

wisdom.quote: The secret of success is sincerity. Once you can fake that you've got it made.
wisdom.author: Jean Giraudoux

wisdom.quote: Justice delayed, is justice denied.
wisdom.author: William Gladstone

wisdom.quote: Modesty in an actor is as fake as passion in a call girl.
wisdom.author: Jackie Gleason

wisdom.quote: A lot of people say, 'Well, I like a challenge.' I don't like challenges. Life is tough enough without any challenges.
wisdom.author: Jackie Gleason, Interview, August 1986

wisdom.quote: The people can always be brought to the bidding of their leaders. All you have to do is tell them that they are in danger of being attacked and denounce the pacifists for lack of patriotism and exposing the country to danger.
wisdom.author: Hermann Goering

wisdom.quote: It is no use to blame the looking glass if your face is awry.
wisdom.author: Nikolai Gogol, 1836

wisdom.quote: The true trophy hunter is a self-disciplined perfectionist seeking a single animal, the ancient patriarch well past his prime that is often an outcast from his own kind... If successful, he will enshrine the trophy in a place of honor. This is a more noble and fitting end than dying on some lost and lonely ledge where the scavengers will pick his bones, and his magnificent horns will weather away and be lost forever.
wisdom.author: Elgin Gates, Trophy Hunter in Asia

wisdom.quote: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
wisdom.author: Vincent van Gogh

wisdom.quote: I am not an adventurer by choice but by fate.
wisdom.author: Vincent van Gogh

wisdom.quote: One may have a blazing hearth in one's soul and yet no one ever come to sit by it. Passersby see only a wisp of smoke from the chimney and continue on the way.
wisdom.author: Vincent Van Gogh

wisdom.quote: The thing has already taken form in my mind before I start it. The first attempts are absolutely unbearable. I say this because I want you to know that if you see something worthwhile in what I am doing, it is not by accident but because of real direction and purpose.
wisdom.author: Vincent van Gogh

wisdom.quote: It's all right to have butterflies in your stomach. Just get them to fly in formation.
wisdom.author: Dr. Rob Gilbert

wisdom.quote: The squeaking wheel doesn't always get the grease. Sometimes it gets replaced.
wisdom.author: Vic Gold

wisdom.quote: Diplomacy is to do and say, the nastiest thing in the nicest way.
wisdom.author: Isaac Goldberg

wisdom.quote: Grammar school never taught me anything about grammar.
wisdom.author: Isaac Goldberg

wisdom.quote: Anyone who can handle a needle convincingly can make us see a thread which is not there.
wisdom.author: E. H. Gombrich

wisdom.quote: It's not that some people have willpower and some don't. It's that some people are ready to change and others are not.
wisdom.author: James Gordon, M.D.

wisdom.quote: Life isn't fair. It's just fairer than death, that's all.
wisdom.author: William Goldman, "The Princess Bride"

wisdom.quote: Life is pain, anyone who says differently is selling something.
wisdom.author: William Goldman, The Princess Bride

wisdom.quote: This is my favorite book in all the world, though I have never read it.
wisdom.author: William Goldman, The Princess Bride

wisdom.quote: Courage is very important. Like a muscle, it is strengthened by use.
wisdom.author: Ruth Gordon

wisdom.quote: Only exceptional rational men can afford to be absurd.
wisdom.author: Allan Goldfein

wisdom.quote: Only exceptionally rational men can afford to be absurd.
wisdom.author: Allan Goldfein

wisdom.quote: Once in a while you have to take a break and visit yourself.
wisdom.author: Audrey Giorgi

wisdom.quote: To be alone is to be different, to be different is to be alone.
wisdom.author: Suzanne Gordon, Lonely in America, 1976

wisdom.quote: A government that is big enough to give you all you want is big enough to take it all away.
wisdom.author: Barry Goldwater

wisdom.quote: Let me remind you that extremism in the defense of liberty is no vice. And let me also remind you that moderation in the pursuit of justice is no virtue.
wisdom.author: Barry Goldwater, acceptance speech as Republican candidate for President, 1964

wisdom.quote: Extremism in the defense of liberty is no vice. Moderation in the pursuit of justice is no virtue.
wisdom.author: Barry Goldwater, Speech accepting nomination for president, July 16, 1964

wisdom.quote: Old age means realizing you will never own all the dogs you wanted to.
wisdom.author: Joe Gores

wisdom.quote: Crime is naught but misdirected energy.
wisdom.author: Emma Goldman, Anarchism (1910)

wisdom.quote: The free expression of the hopes and aspirations of a people is the greatest and only safety in a sane society.
wisdom.author: Emma Goldman, Living My Life, 1931

wisdom.quote: I can't think of any sorrow in the world that a hot bath wouldn't help, just a little bit.
wisdom.author: Susan Glaspell, The Visioning, 1911

wisdom.quote: A man of character in peace is a man of courage in war.
wisdom.author: Sir James Glover

wisdom.quote: Good teaching is one-fourth preparation and three-fourths theater.
wisdom.author: Gail Godwin

wisdom.quote: Faith in the ability of a leader is of slight service unless it be united with faith in his justice.
wisdom.author: George Goethals

wisdom.quote: If Columbus had an advisory committee he would probably still be at the dock.
wisdom.author: Arthur Goldberg

wisdom.quote: Make your life a mission - not an intermission.
wisdom.author: Arnold Glasgow

wisdom.quote: Though it sounds absurd, it is true to say I felt younger at sixty than I felt at twenty.
wisdom.author: Ellen Glasgow, The Woman Within, 1954

wisdom.quote: The problem with any unwritten law is that you don't know where to go to erase it.
wisdom.author: Glaser and Way

wisdom.quote: Love is not blind - it sees more, not less. But because it sees more, it is willing to see less.
wisdom.author: Rabbi Julius Gordon

wisdom.quote: Enjoyment is not a goal, it is a feeling that accompanies important ongoing activity.
wisdom.author: Paul Goodman

wisdom.quote: Art is a collaboration between God and the artist, and the less the artist does the better.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: Be faithful to that which exists nowhere but in yourself - and thus make yourself indispensable.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: Believe those who are seeking the truth. Doubt those who find it.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: Dare to be yourself.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than loved for what you are not.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: It is only in adventure that some people succeed in knowing themselves - in finding themselves.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: Obtain from yourself all that makes complaining useless. No longer implore from others what you yourself can obtain.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: One doesn't discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: So long as we live among men, let us cherish humanity.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: The most decisive actions of our life - I mean those that are most likely to decide the whole course of our future - are, more often than not, unconsidered.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: There are admirable potentialities in every human being. Believe in your strength and your youth. Learn to repeat endlessly to yourself, 'It all depends on me.'
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: Work and struggle and never accept an evil that you can change.
wisdom.author: Andre Gide

wisdom.quote: To design is to communicate clearly by whatever means you can control or master.
wisdom.author: Milton Glaser

wisdom.quote: If you wish in this world to advance, your merits you're bound to enhance; You must stir it and stump it, and blow your own trumpet, or trust me, you haven't a chance.
wisdom.author: W. S. Gilbert

wisdom.quote: Merely corroborative detail, intended to give artistic verisimilitude to an otherwise bald and unconvincing narrative.
wisdom.author: W. S. Gilbert

wisdom.quote: No one can have a higher opinion of him than I have, and I think he's a dirty little beast.
wisdom.author: W. S. Gilbert

wisdom.quote: Things are seldom what they seem, skim milk masquerades as cream.
wisdom.author: W. S. Gilbert

wisdom.quote: When everyone is somebody, then no one's anybody.
wisdom.author: W. S. Gilbert

wisdom.quote: You've no idea what a poor opinion I have of myself-and how little I deserve it.
wisdom.author: W. S. Gilbert

wisdom.quote: My object all sublime I shall achieve in time...
wisdom.author: W. S. Gilbert, The Mikado, 1885

wisdom.quote: America's one of the finest countries anyone ever stole.
wisdom.author: Bobcat Goldthwaite

wisdom.quote: He has every attribute of a dog except loyalty.
wisdom.author: Thomas P. Gore

wisdom.quote: The idea of all-out nuclear war is unsettling.
wisdom.author: Walter Goodman

wisdom.quote: Don't let us make imaginary evils, when you know we have so many real ones to encounter.
wisdom.author: Oliver Goldsmith

wisdom.quote: Hope, like the gleaming taper's light, Adorns and cheers our way; And still, as darker grows the night, Emits a brighter ray.
wisdom.author: Oliver Goldsmith

wisdom.quote: Ill fares the land, to hast'ning ill a prey, Where wealth accumulates, and men decay; Princes and Lords may flourish, or may fade: A breath can make them, as a breath has made; but a bold peasantry, their country's pride, When once destroyed can never be supplied.
wisdom.author: Oliver Goldsmith

wisdom.quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
wisdom.author: Harry Golden

wisdom.quote: Every man loves two women;the one is the creation of his imagination and the other is not yet born.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: Generosity is giving more than you can, and pride is taking less than you need.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: God made Truth with many doors to welcome every believer who knocks on them.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: I have learnt silence from the talkative, toleration from the intolerant, and kindness from the unkind; yet strange, I am ungrateful to these teachers.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: If indeed you must be candid, be candid beautifully.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: If you cannot work with love but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: If you reveal your secrets to the wind you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: In the sweetness of friendship; let there be laughter and the sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: It is well to give when asked, but it is better to give unasked, through understanding.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: Say not, 'I have found the truth,' but rather, 'I have found a truth.'
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: The deeper sorrow carves into your being the more joy you can contain.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: The lights of stars that were extinguished ages ago still reaches us. So it is with great men who died centuries ago, but still reach us with the radiations of their personalities.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: The optimist sees the rose and not its thorns; the pessimist stares at the thorns, oblivious of the rose.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to do.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran

wisdom.quote: In battling evil, excess is good; for he who is moderate in announcing the truth is presenting half-truth. He conceals the other half out of fear of the people's wrath.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran, 'Narcotics and Dissecting Knives,' Thoughts and Meditations, 1960

wisdom.quote: It is well to give when asked but it is better to give unasked, through understanding.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran, 'On Giving,' The Prophet, 1923

wisdom.quote: Yes, there is a Nirvanah; it is leading your sheep to a green pasture, and in putting your child to sleep, and in writing the last line of your poem.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran, Essay on Robert Frost, quoted in N. Y.. Times: Obit-Editorial, April 1982

wisdom.quote: And in the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter and the sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
wisdom.author: Kahlil Gibran, The Prophet

wisdom.quote: Someone who expresses a view that is contrary to the view of the overwhelming majority should be allowed to stand undisturbed as a monument to our commitment to free speech.
wisdom.author: Albert Gore, Jr.

wisdom.quote: The 'Net is a waste of time, and that's exactly what's right about it.
wisdom.author: William Gibson

wisdom.quote: The future is here. It's just not widely distributed yet.
wisdom.author: William Gibson

wisdom.quote: An affirmation is a strong, positive statement that something is already so.
wisdom.author: Shakti Gawain

wisdom.quote: Every time you don't follow your inner guidance, you feel a loss of energy, loss of power, a sense of spiritual deadness.
wisdom.author: Shakti Gawain

wisdom.quote: I am convinced that life in a physical body is meant to be an ecstatic experience.
wisdom.author: Shakti Gawain

wisdom.quote: Our bodies communicate to us clearly and specifically, if we are willing to listen to them.
wisdom.author: Shakti Gawain

wisdom.quote: The universe will reward you for taking risks on its behalf.
wisdom.author: Shakti Gawain

wisdom.quote: We will discover the nature of our particular genius when we stop trying to conform to our own or to other peoples' models, learn to be ourselves, and allow our natural channel to open.
wisdom.author: Shakti Gawain

wisdom.quote: What I am actually saying is that we need to be willing to let our intuition guide us, and then be willing to follow that guidance directly and fearlessly.
wisdom.author: Shakti Gawain

wisdom.quote: When I'm trusting and being myself... everything in my life reflects this by falling into place easily, often miraculously.
wisdom.author: Shakti Gawain

wisdom.quote: Remember that happiness is a way of travel - not a destination.
wisdom.author: Roy M. Goodman

wisdom.quote: Throw out an alarming alarm clock. If the ring is loud and strident, you're waking up to instant stress. You shouldn't be bullied out of bed, just reminded that it's time to start your day.
wisdom.author: Sharon Gold

wisdom.quote: She hadn't chosen him over all the others. The truth was that she hadn't even thought about anyone else.
wisdom.author: Paolo Giordano, The Solitude of Prime Numbers

wisdom.quote: All opening moves were the same, like in chess. You don't have to come up with anything new, there's no point, because you're both after the same thing anyway. The game soon finds its own way and it's only at that point that you need a strategy.
wisdom.author: Paolo Giordano, The Solitude of Prime Numbers: A Novel

wisdom.quote: Choices are made in brief seconds and paid for in the time that remains.
wisdom.author: Paolo Giordano, The Solitude of Prime Numbers: A Novel

wisdom.quote: Feeling special is the worst kind of cage a person can build for himself.
wisdom.author: Paolo Giordano, The Solitude of Prime Numbers: A Novel

wisdom.quote: He felt a furious sense of powerlessness, because he played no part in Alice's life, but by god she did in his, like a daughter whose name he hadn't been able to choose.
wisdom.author: Paolo Giordano, The Solitude of Prime Numbers: A Novel

wisdom.quote: The love of those we don't love in return settles on the surface and from there quickly evaporates.
wisdom.author: Paolo Giordano, The Solitude of Prime Numbers: A Novel

wisdom.quote: You can fall ill with just a memory.
wisdom.author: Paolo Giordano, The Solitude of Prime Numbers: A Novel

wisdom.quote: I never lie because I don't fear anyone. You only lie when you're afraid.
wisdom.author: John Gotti

wisdom.quote: It's better to live one day as a lion than a hundred years as a lamb.
wisdom.author: John Gotti

wisdom.quote: Even sheep should have brains enough not to follow the wolf.
wisdom.author: Joseph Goodfield

wisdom.quote: Most of the basic truths of life sound absurd at first hearing.
wisdom.author: Elizabeth Goudge

wisdom.quote: It is difficult to say what is impossible, for the dream of yesterday is the hope of today and the reality of tomorrow.
wisdom.author: Robert H. Goddard

wisdom.quote: Creationist critics often charge that evolution cannot be tested, and therefore cannot be viewed as a properly scientific subject at all. This claim is rhetorical nonsense.
wisdom.author: Stephen Jay Gould

wisdom.quote: Human consciousness arose but a minute before midnight on the geological clock. Yet we mayflies try to bend an ancient world to our purposes, ignorant perhaps of the messages buried in its long history. Let us hope that we are still in the early morning of our April day.
wisdom.author: Stephen Jay Gould

wisdom.quote: In science, 'fact' can only mean 'confirmed to such a degree that it would be perverse to withhold provisional assent.' I suppose that apples might start to rise tomorrow, but the possibility does not merit equal time in physics classrooms.
wisdom.author: Stephen Jay Gould

wisdom.quote: The most erroneous stories are those we think we know best - and therefore never scrutinize or question.
wisdom.author: Stephen Jay Gould

wisdom.quote: The most important scientific revolutions all include, as their only common feature, the dethronement of human arrogance from one pedestal after another of previous convictions about our centrality in the cosmos.
wisdom.author: Stephen Jay Gould

wisdom.quote: It would be interesting to find out what goes on in that moment when someone looks at you and comes to all sorts of conclusions.
wisdom.author: Malcolm Gladwell

wisdom.quote: If we are to learn to improve the quality of the decisions we make, we need to accept the mysterious nature of our snap judgments.
wisdom.author: Malcolm Gladwell, Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking, 2005

wisdom.quote: It is quite possible for people who have never met us and who have spent only twenty minutes thinking about us to come to a better understanding of who we are than people who have known us for years.
wisdom.author: Malcolm Gladwell, Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking, 2005

wisdom.quote: It is the new and different that is always most vulnerable to market research
wisdom.author: Malcolm Gladwell, Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking, 2005

wisdom.quote: The face is not a secondary billboard for our internal feelings. It is an equal partner in the emotional process.
wisdom.author: Malcolm Gladwell, Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking, 2005

wisdom.quote: There can be as much value in the blink of an eye as in months of rational analysis.
wisdom.author: Malcolm Gladwell, Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking, 2005

wisdom.quote: Truly successful decision making relies on a balance between deliberate and instinctive thinking.
wisdom.author: Malcolm Gladwell, Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking, 2005

wisdom.quote: We have, as human beings, a storytelling problem. We're a bit too quick to come up with explanations for things we don't really have an explanation for.
wisdom.author: Malcolm Gladwell, Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking, 2005

wisdom.quote: We learn by example and by direct experience because there are real limits to the adequacy of verbal instruction.
wisdom.author: Malcolm Gladwell, Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking, 2005

wisdom.quote: You can learn as much - or more - from one glance at a private space as you can from hours of exposure to a public face.
wisdom.author: Malcolm Gladwell, Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking, 2005

wisdom.quote: I can hire one half of the working class to kill the other half.
wisdom.author: Jay Gould

wisdom.quote: God must become an activity in our consciousness.
wisdom.author: Joel S. Goldsmith

wisdom.quote: I am where I am because I believe in all possibilities.
wisdom.author: Whoopi Goldberg

wisdom.quote: I don't have pet peeves, I have whole kennels of irritation.
wisdom.author: Whoopi Goldberg

wisdom.quote: That's the thing about Mother Nature, she really doesn't care what economic bracket you're in.
wisdom.author: Whoopi Goldberg

wisdom.quote: We're here for a reason. I believe a bit of the reason is to throw little torches out to lead people through the dark.
wisdom.author: Whoopi Goldberg

wisdom.quote: When you are kind to someone in trouble, you hope they'll remember and be kind to someone else. And it'll become like a wildfire.
wisdom.author: Whoopi Goldberg

wisdom.quote: You've got to vote for someone. It's a shame, but it's got to be done.
wisdom.author: Whoopi Goldberg

wisdom.quote: All that really belongs to us is time; even he who has nothing else has that.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracian

wisdom.quote: Attempt easy tasks as if they were difficult, and difficult as if they were easy; in the one case that confidence may not fall asleep, in the other that it may not be dismayed.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracian

wisdom.quote: Do pleasant things yourself, but unpleasant things through others.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracian

wisdom.quote: Great ability develops and reveals itself increasingly with every new assignment.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracian

wisdom.quote: It is better to sleep on things beforehand than lie awake about them afterward.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracian

wisdom.quote: Know how to ask. There is nothing more difficult for some people, nor for others, easier.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracian

wisdom.quote: Never do anything when you are in a temper, for you will do everything wrong.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracian

wisdom.quote: Put yourself on view. This brings your talents to light.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracian

wisdom.quote: The great art of giving consists in this: the gift should cost very little and yet be greatly coveted, so that it may be the more highly appreciated.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracian

wisdom.quote: The sole advantage of power is that you can do more good.
wisdom.author: Baltasar Gracian, The Art of Worldly Wisdom, 1647

wisdom.quote: The happy do not believe in miracles.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: The intelligent man finds almost everything ridiculous, the sensible man hardly anything.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: There is nothing more dreadful than imagination without taste.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: There is nothing worse than aggressive stupidity.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: To be pleased with one's limits is a wretched state.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: Treat a man as he appears to be, and you make him worse. But treat a man as if he were what he potentially could be, and you make him what he should be.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: We are never deceived; we deceive ourselves.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: We must always change, renew, rejuvenate ourselves; otherwise we harden.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: Whatever you can do or dream, begin it.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: When ideas fail, words come in very handy.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: Whenever I hear people talking about "liberal ideas," I am always astounded that men should love to fool themselves with empty sounds. An idea should never be liberal; it must be vigorous, positive, and without loose ends so that it may fulfill its divine mission and be productive. The proper place for liberality is in the realm of the emotions.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

wisdom.quote: There is no better deliverance from the world than through art; and a man can form no surer bond with it than through art.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Elective Affinities

wisdom.quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
wisdom.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Faust

wisdom.quote: Anyone who tries to improve the lives of animals invariably comes in for criticism from those who believe such efforts are misplaced in a world of suffering humanity.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: Change happens by listening and then starting a dialogue with the people who are doing something you don't believe is right.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: Chimpanzees have given me so much. The long hours spent with them in the forest have enriched my life beyond measure. What I have learned from them has shaped my understanding of human behavior, of our place in nature.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: Every individual matters. Every individual has a role to play. Every individual makes a difference.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: I wanted to talk to the animals like Dr. Doolittle.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: If you look through all the different cultures. Right from the earliest, earliest days with the animistic religions, we have sought to have some kind of explanation for our life, for our being, that is outside of our humanity.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: If you really want something, and really work hard, and take advantage of opportunities, and never give up, you will find a way.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: Lasting change is a series of compromises. And compromise is all right, as long your values don't change.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: My mission is to create a world where we can live in harmony with nature.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: Only if we understand can we care. Only if we care will we help. Only if we help shall they be saved.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: People say to me so often, 'Jane how can you be so peaceful when everywhere around you people want books signed, people are asking these questions and yet you seem peaceful,' and I always answer that it is the peace of the forest that I carry inside.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: The greatest danger to our future is apathy.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: The least I can do is speak out for those who cannot speak for themselves.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: The more we learn of the true nature of non-human animals, especially those with complex brains and corresponding complex social behavior, the more ethical concerns are raised regarding their use in the service of man -- whether this be in entertainment, as "pets," for food, in research laboratories, or any of the other uses to which we subject them.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: There are an awful lot of scientists today who believe that before very long we shall have unraveled all the secrets of the universe. There will be no puzzles anymore. To me it'd be really, really tragic because I think one of the most exciting things is this feeling of mystery, feeling of awe, the feeling of looking at a little live thing and being amazed by it and how its emerged through these hundreds of years of evolution and there it is and it is perfect and why.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall

wisdom.quote: I think the best evenings are when we have messages, things that make us think, but we can also laugh and enjoy each other's company.
wisdom.author: Jane Goodall, Lecture in Salt Lake City, Utah, 03-04-08

wisdom.quote: All in all, I am not surprised that the people who want to unravel the social contract start with young adults. Those who are urged to feel afraid, very afraid, have both the greatest sense of independence and the most finely honed skepticism about government.
wisdom.author: Ellen Goodman

wisdom.quote: I have never been especially impressed by the heroics of people who are convinced they are about to change the world. I am more awed by those who struggle to make one small difference after another.
wisdom.author: Ellen Goodman

wisdom.quote: In journalism, there has always been a tension between getting it first and getting it right.
wisdom.author: Ellen Goodman

wisdom.quote: Normal is getting dressed in clothes that you buy for work and driving through traffic in a car that you are still paying for - in order to get to the job you need to pay for the clothes and the car, and the house you leave vacant all day so you can afford to live in it.
wisdom.author: Ellen Goodman

wisdom.quote: The central struggle of parenthood is to let our hopes for our children outweigh our fears.
wisdom.author: Ellen Goodman

wisdom.quote: Traditions are the guideposts driven deep in our subconscious minds. The most powerful ones are those we can't even describe, aren't even aware of.
wisdom.author: Ellen Goodman

wisdom.quote: We are told that people stay in love because of chemistry or because they remain intrigued with each other, because of many kindnesses, because of luck... But part of it has got to be forgiveness and gratefulness.
wisdom.author: Ellen Goodman

wisdom.quote: You can teach someone who cares to write columns, but you can�t teach someone who writes columns to care.
wisdom.author: Ellen Goodman

wisdom.quote: A Hospital is no place to be sick.
wisdom.author: Samuel Goldwyn

wisdom.quote: Anyone who goes to a psychiatrist ought to have his head examined.
wisdom.author: Samuel Goldwyn

wisdom.quote: I don't think anyone should write their autobiography until after they're dead.
wisdom.author: Samuel Goldwyn

wisdom.quote: I don't want any yes-men around me. I want everybody to tell me the truth even if it costs them their jobs.
wisdom.author: Samuel Goldwyn

wisdom.quote: I had a monumental idea this morning, but I didn't like it.
wisdom.author: Samuel Goldwyn

wisdom.quote: I never put on a pair of shoes until I've worn them at least five years.
wisdom.author: Samuel Goldwyn

wisdom.quote: I read part of it all the way through.
wisdom.author: Samuel Goldwyn

wisdom.quote: If I could drop dead right now, I'd be the happiest man alive.
wisdom.author: Samuel Goldwyn

wisdom.quote: Let's have some new cliches.
wisdom.author: Samuel Goldwyn

wisdom.quote: Spare no expense to save money on this one.
wisdom.author: Samuel Goldwyn

wisdom.quote: I'd give my right arm to be ambidextrous.
wisdom.author: Graffito

wisdom.quote: Is there life before death?
wisdom.author: Graffito, in Belfast

wisdom.quote: I shot an arrow into the air, and it stuck.
wisdom.author: Graffito, in Los Angeles

wisdom.quote: To love what you do and feel that it matters - how could anything be more fun?
wisdom.author: Katharine Graham

wisdom.quote: For [a product] to surprise me, it must be satisfying expectations I didn't know I had. No focus group is going to discover those. Only a great designer can.
wisdom.author: Paul Graham, Made in USA

wisdom.quote: Dressing up is inevitably a substitute for good ideas. It is no coincidence that technically inept business types are known as "suits."
wisdom.author: Paul Graham, September 2004

wisdom.quote: Nerds don't just happen to dress informally. They do it too consistently. Consciously or not, they dress informally as a prophylactic measure against stupidity.
wisdom.author: Paul Graham, September 2004

wisdom.quote: Food is the most primitive form of comfort.
wisdom.author: Sheila Graham

wisdom.quote: You can have anything you want if you want it desperately enough. You must want it with an inner exuberance that erupts through the skin and joins the energy that created the world.
wisdom.author: Sheila Graham

wisdom.quote: What you will do matters. All you need is to do it.
wisdom.author: Judy Grahn, Another Mother Tongue: Gay Words, Gay Worlds, 1984

wisdom.quote: It never pays to deal with the flyweights of the world. They take far too much pleasure in thwarting you at every turn.
wisdom.author: Sue Grafton, 'H' Is for Homicide, 1991

wisdom.quote: Everyone wants to be Cary Grant. Even I want to be Cary Grant.
wisdom.author: Cary Grant

wisdom.quote: I improve on misquotation.
wisdom.author: Cary Grant

wisdom.quote: My father used to say, 'Let them see you and not the suit. That should be secondary.'
wisdom.author: Cary Grant

wisdom.quote: When you hire people that are smarter than you are, you prove you are smarter than they are.
wisdom.author: R. H. Grant

wisdom.quote: Dance is the hidden language of the soul.
wisdom.author: Martha Graham

wisdom.quote: The body is a sacred garment.
wisdom.author: Martha Graham

wisdom.quote: The body is shaped, disciplined, honored, and in time, trusted.
wisdom.author: Martha Graham

wisdom.quote: The body says what words cannot.
wisdom.author: Martha Graham

wisdom.quote: There is a vitality, a life force, an energy, a quickening, that is translated through you into action, and because there is only one of you in all time, this expression is unique. And if you block it, it will never exist through any other medium and will be lost.
wisdom.author: Martha Graham

wisdom.quote: Shared laughter creates a bond of friendships. When people laugh together, they cease to be young and old, teacher and pupils, worker and boss. They become a single group of human beings.
wisdom.author: W. Lee Grant

wisdom.quote: Every English poet should master the rules of grammar before he attempts to bend or break them.
wisdom.author: Robert Graves

wisdom.quote: The remarkable thing about Shakespeare is that he really is very good, in spite of all the people who say he is very good.
wisdom.author: Robert Graves

wisdom.quote: A bore is a man who deprives you of solitude without providing you with company.
wisdom.author: Gian Vincenzo Gravina

wisdom.quote: There is one person in charge of every office in America and that person is Charles Darwin.
wisdom.author: Charlie Grandy, The Office, Get the Girl, March 2012

wisdom.quote: The act of nutrition is not a purely physiological event... The family meal is a formality that cultivates in us... a capacity for sharing, generosity, thoughtfulness, a talent for civilized conversation.
wisdom.author: Francine Du Plessix Gray

wisdom.quote: In life we don�t get what we want, we get in life what we are. If we want more we have to be able to be more, in order to be more you have to face rejection.
wisdom.author: Farrah Gray

wisdom.quote: Her greatness lay in doing what everybody could do but doesn't. She was unexpected. She was untitled. (She was) an improbable warrior that was leading an unlikely army of waitresses and street sweepers and shopkeepers and auto mechanics.
wisdom.author: Jennifer Granholm, Michigan Governor at Rosa Park's funeral, CNN.com, 11-02-05

wisdom.quote: Yet ah! why should they know their fate, Since sorrow never comes too late, And happiness too swiftly flies? Thought would destroy their paradise. No more; where ignorance is bliss, 'Tis folly to be wise.
wisdom.author: Thomas Gray, "On a Distant Prospect of Eton College" 1742

wisdom.quote: The art of war is simple enough. Find out where your enemy is. Get at him as soon as you can. Strike him as hard as you can, and keep moving on.
wisdom.author: Ulysses S. Grant

wisdom.quote: It is men who wait to be selected, and not those who seek, from whom we may expect the most efficient service.
wisdom.author: Ulysses S. Grant, Personal Memoirs of U.S. Grant, Chapter 46

wisdom.quote: I live in the present due to the constraints of the Space-Time Continuum.
wisdom.author: Hank Green

wisdom.quote: I honestly don't know how you live without having a cat inside your house. It's like having a little living piece of art that is also very warm and soft.
wisdom.author: Hank Green, Vlogbrothers, Cat GIF Critique, 04-26-13

wisdom.quote: I deal with stress in two ways because there are two kinds of stress. There's stress that you can take care of and there's stress that you can't. The first one, I take care of it as fast as possible, because putting it off always makes it worse. Things that I can't fix? I think about the fact that I can't fix them. I think about why I can't fix them and I come to terms with the fact that this is a problem that I'm not going to overcome and that the world is not a wish granting factory.
wisdom.author: Hank Green, Vlogbrothers, Raw Onion, Twerking, and Speech Jam, 08-30-13

wisdom.quote: Hoaxes are nothing new. News media isn't hard to fool. It's fun to fool and people like to mess with people. It all goes to show you that we're not all that hard to fool. I think we should just accept that and trust people anyway.
wisdom.author: Hank Green, Vlogbrothers, The Top 10 Greatest Hoaxes of All Time, 10-22-09

wisdom.quote: Commandment Number One of any truly civilized society is this: Let people be different.
wisdom.author: David Grayson

wisdom.quote: It is not giving children more that spoils them; it is giving them more to avoid confrontation.
wisdom.author: John Gray, "Children Are From Heaven"

wisdom.quote: It's noble to want to confess, but if the results are just damage and pain, that's not noble. It's selfish.
wisdom.author: Carol Green, House M.D., Adverse Events, 2008

wisdom.quote: Health is not simply the absence of sickness.
wisdom.author: Hannah Green

wisdom.quote: The advantage of a classical education is that it enables you to despise the wealth that it prevents you from achieving.
wisdom.author: Russell Green

wisdom.quote: If you write a post and put it on a blog, that's a historical document. If you change your template, then that entry looks completely different. It's the same words, but not the same meaning. This all depends on what historical questions that people will be asking and we can't know what they will want.
wisdom.author: Josh Greenberg, Digital Preservation and Blogs, SXSW 2006

wisdom.quote: Web standards keep you out of the dustbin of history.
wisdom.author: Josh Greenberg, Digital Preservation and Blogs, SXSW 2006

wisdom.quote: Happiness just wasn't part of the job description back then. You tried to find a helpmate to keep the cold wind and dogs at bay. Happiness just wasn't part of the equation. Survival was.
wisdom.author: Robin Green, Northern Exposure, Burning Down the House, 1992

wisdom.quote: I started concentrating so hard on my vision that I lost sight.
wisdom.author: Robin Green, Northern Exposure, Burning Down the House, 1992

wisdom.quote: Repetition is the death of art.
wisdom.author: Robin Green, Northern Exposure, Burning Down the House, 1992

wisdom.quote: I have come to believe that giving and receiving are really the same. Giving and receiving - not giving and taking.
wisdom.author: Joyce Grenfell

wisdom.quote: My momma always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
wisdom.author: Winston Groom, Forrest Gump

wisdom.quote: Throughout life, one does not miss any chance to hold onto the things that are really precious, if one is truly wise.
wisdom.author: Ed Greenwood

wisdom.quote: I never believed in Santa Claus because I knew no white dude would come into my neighborhood after dark.
wisdom.author: Dick Gregory

wisdom.quote: Riches do not delight us so much with their possession, as torment us with their loss.
wisdom.author: Dick Gregory

wisdom.quote: I expect to pass through this world but once; any good thing therefore that I can do, or any kindness that I can show to any fellow creature, let me do it now; let me not defer or neglect it, for I shall not pass this way again.
wisdom.author: Ettiene De Grellet

wisdom.quote: Count Hermann Keyserling once said truly that the greatest American superstition was belief in facts.
wisdom.author: John Gunther

wisdom.quote: We�d forgive most things if we knew the facts.
wisdom.author: Graham Greene, The Heart of the Matter

wisdom.quote: It is impossible to go through life without trust: That is to be imprisoned in the worst cell of all, oneself.
wisdom.author: Graham Greene, The Ministry of Fear

wisdom.quote: Real joy comes not from ease or riches or from the praise of men, but from doing something worthwhile.
wisdom.author: Sir Wilfred Grenfell

wisdom.quote: Do it now. It is not safe to leave a generous feeling to the cooling influences of the world.
wisdom.author: Thomas Guthrie

wisdom.quote: Unless a life is activated by sustained purpose it can become a depressingly haphazard affair.
wisdom.author: Richard Guggenheimer

wisdom.quote: There is a solitude, or perhaps a solemnity, in the few hours that precede the dawn of day which is unlike that of any others in the twenty-four, and which I cannot explain or account for. Thoughts come to me at this time that I never have at any other.
wisdom.author: George Bird Grinnell

wisdom.quote: I ask no favors for my sex.... All I ask of our brethren is that they will take their feet from off our necks.
wisdom.author: Sarah Moore Grimk�

wisdom.quote: The key part of your brand is a quality product. Creating exceptional content is the number one thing.
wisdom.author: Rufus Griscom, Building Buzz for Your Web Project, SXSW 2006

wisdom.quote: Books won't stay banned. They won't burn. Ideas won't go to jail. in the long run of history, the censor and the inquisitor have always lost. The only sure weapon against bad ideas is better ideas. The source of better ideas is wisdom. The surest path to wisdom is a liberal education.
wisdom.author: Whitney Griswold, Address to students at Phillips Academy, 1952

wisdom.quote: A dog is the greatest gift a parent can give a child. OK, a good education, then a dog.
wisdom.author: John Grogan, An Interview with John Grogan, 2008

wisdom.quote: A person can learn a lot from a dog, even a loopy one like ours. Marley taught me about living each day with unbridled exuberance and joy, about seizing the moment and following your heart. He taught me to appreciate the simple things - a walk in the woods, a fresh snowfall, a nap in a shaft of winter sunlight. And as he grew old and achy, he taught me about optimism in the face of adversity. Mostly, he taught me about friendship and selflessness and, above all else, unwavering loyalty.
wisdom.author: John Grogan, Marley and Me, 2005

wisdom.quote: We could have bought a small yacht with what we spent on our dog an dall the things he destroyed. Then again, how many yachts wait by the door all day for your return?
wisdom.author: John Grogan, Marley and Me, 2005

wisdom.quote: I have long been of the opinion that if work were such a splendid thing the rich would have kept more of it for themselves.
wisdom.author: Bruce Grocott

wisdom.quote: I appreciate people who are civil, whether they mean it or not. I think: Be civil. Do not cherish your opinion over my feelings. There's a vanity to candor that isn't really worth it. Be kind.
wisdom.author: Richard Greenberg, NY Times Magazine, 03-26-2006

wisdom.quote: I dream, therefore I become.
wisdom.author: Cheryl Ren�e Grossman

wisdom.quote: We don't know who we are until we see what we can do.
wisdom.author: Martha Grimes

wisdom.quote: People are willing to trade money for something that they can touch, not ones and zereos.
wisdom.author: John Gruber, How to Blog for Money by Learning from Comics, SXSW 2006

wisdom.quote: You have to keep plugging away. We are all growing. There is no shortcut. You have to put time into it to build an audience
wisdom.author: John Gruber, How to Blog for Money by Learning from Comics, SXSW 2006

wisdom.quote: Autobiography is an unrivaled vehicle for telling the truth about other people.
wisdom.author: Philip Guedalla

wisdom.quote: Doubt 'til thou canst doubt no more...doubt is thought and thought is life. Systems which end doubt are devices for drugging thought.
wisdom.author: Albert Guerard

wisdom.quote: Human beings have an inalienable right to invent themselves.
wisdom.author: Germaine Greer, O Magazine, September 2002

wisdom.quote: You've got your phenomenon on one hand. Concrete and knowable. On the other hand you've got the incomprehensible. You call it God, but to me, God or no, it remains just that, the unknowable.
wisdom.author: Robin Green and Mitchell Burgess, Northern Exposure, A Wing and a Prayer, 1994

wisdom.quote: For people to judge a man's worth and his very manhood according to the way he feels about sport, and not to recognize it for the piddly, inconsequential goings on that it really is...
wisdom.author: Robin Green and Mitchell Burgess, Northern Exposure, Birds of a Feather, 1993

wisdom.quote: The fact that when we die we are nothing more than worm meat---I just don't think about it.
wisdom.author: Robin Green and Mitchell Burgess, Northern Exposure, Grosse Pointe 48230, 1993

wisdom.quote: My masculinity isn't hinged on whether or not I knit.
wisdom.author: Robin Green and Mitchell Burgess, Northern Exposure, Hello, I Love You, 1994

wisdom.quote: Time is just something that we assign. You know, past, present, it's just all arbitrary. Most Native Americans, they don't think of time as linear; in time, out of time, I never have enough time, circular time, the Stevens wheel. All moments are happening all the time.
wisdom.author: Robin Green and Mitchell Burgess, Northern Exposure, Hello, I Love You, 1994

wisdom.quote: Modesty is a shining light; it prepares the mind to receive knowledge, and the heart for truth.
wisdom.author: Madam Guizot

wisdom.quote: You can pretend to be serious; you can't pretend to be witty.
wisdom.author: Sacha Guitry

wisdom.quote: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be.
wisdom.author: Wayne Gretzky

wisdom.quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you never take.
wisdom.author: Wayne Gretzky

wisdom.quote: The revolution is not an apple that falls when it is ripe. You have to make it fall.
wisdom.author: Che Guevara

wisdom.quote: We cannot be sure of having something to live for unless we are willing to die for it
wisdom.author: Che Guevara

wisdom.quote: Whenever death may surprise us, let it be welcome if our battle cry has reached even one receptive ear and another hand reaches out to take up our arms.
wisdom.author: Che Guevara

wisdom.quote: I know you are here to kill me. Shoot, coward, you are only going to kill a man.
wisdom.author: Che Guevara, to his assassin

wisdom.quote: You can't have a light without a dark to stick it in.
wisdom.author: Arlo Guthrie

wisdom.quote: Accidents ruled every cornor of the universe except the chambers of the human heart.
wisdom.author: David Guterson, Snow Falling On Cedars

wisdom.quote: He loved humankind dearly and with all his heart, but he disliked most human beings.
wisdom.author: David Guterson, Snow Falling on Cedars

wisdom.quote: We must conquer war, or war will conquer us.
wisdom.author: Ely Gulbertson

wisdom.quote: I decided not to let my past rule my future so I decided to change my present in order to open up my future.
wisdom.author: Dr. Ana M Guzman

wisdom.quote: If something is too hard to do, then it's not worth doing. You just stick that guitar in the closet next to your shortwave radio, your karate outfit and your unicycle and we'll go inside and watch TV.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: It takes two to lie. One to lie and one to listen.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Oh, loneliness and cheeseburgers are a dangerous mix.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Romance is dead. It was acquired in a hostile takeover by Hallmark and Disney, homogenized, and sold off piece by piece.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Television! Teacher, mother, secret lover.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: There's an empty spot I've always had inside me. I tried to fill it with family, religion, community service, but those were dead ends! I think this chair is the answer.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: To alcohol! The cause of, and solution to, all of life's problems.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Vampires are make-believe, like elves, gremlins, and eskimos.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Weaseling out of things is important to learn. It's what separates us from the animals ... except the weasel.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: What good is money if it can't inspire terror in your fellow man?
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: What if we chose the wrong religion? Each week we just make God madder and madder.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: When will I learn? The answer to life's problems aren't at the bottom of a bottle, they're on TV!
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: When you participate in sporting events, it's not whether you win or lose; it's how drunk you get.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: You don't like your job, you don't strike. You go in every day and do it really half-assed. That's the American way.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: You know, the courts may not be working any more, but as long as everyone is videotaping everyone else, justice will be done.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: You know, the one with all the well meaning rules that don't work out in real life, uh, Christianity.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: You should listen to your heart, and not the voices in your head.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: You tried your best and you failed miserably. The lesson is, never try.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: I'm of the mind that even people who have limitations, if they have a curiosity, they will find a way to explore it.
wisdom.author: Tish Grier, love and hope and sex and dreams, 04-12-2006

wisdom.quote: It's always been about the experience of life and of not being passive. If something so excites my curiosty, I want to go there, be a part of whatever it is that's either pushing me or pulling me toward it. That desire for experience has made me very rich in life experience.
wisdom.author: Tish Grier, love and hope and sex and dreams, 04-12-2006

wisdom.quote: Maybe it's easier to like someone else's life, and live vicariously through it, than take some responsiblity to change our lives into lives we might like.
wisdom.author: Tish Grier, love and hope and sex and dreams, 04-12-2006

wisdom.quote: Where is the path to Grown-Up Land? How do I get there? Or will I just get old, not understanding that I'm no longer young?
wisdom.author: Tish Grier, love and hope and sex and dreams, 05-01-07

wisdom.quote: Anger is brittle fire that consumes and breaks whatever it engulfs.
wisdom.author: Tish Grier, love and hope and sex and dreams, 09-25-06

wisdom.quote: There is no joy in a life that is all information. There is no 'juice' to that kind of life. No sweetness, no color. Like trading a beautiful golden-ripe orange for a stalk of whithered broccoli.
wisdom.author: Tish Grier, love and sex and dreams, 04-15-06

wisdom.quote: There are people who, instead of listening to what is being said to them, are already listening to what they are going to say themselves.
wisdom.author: Albert Guinon

wisdom.quote: When everyone is against you, it means that you are absolutely wrong-- or absolutely right.
wisdom.author: Albert Guinon

wisdom.quote: Love is a snowmobile racing across the tundra and then suddenly it flips over, pinning you underneath. At night, the ice weasels come.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, "Life in Hell"

wisdom.quote: Ah, sweet pity. Where would my love life be without it?
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: All normal people love meat. If I went to a barbeque and there was no meat, I would say 'Yo Goober! Where's the meat!?' I'm trying to impress people here, Lisa. You don't win friends with salad.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: All right, brain, you don't like me, and I don't like you, but let's just get me through this, and I can get back to killing you with beer.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Aren't we forgeting the true meaning of Christmas? You know, the birth of Santa.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Christmas is a time when people of all religions come together to worship Jesus Christ.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Donuts. Is there anything they can't do?
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Facts are meaningless. You could use facts to prove anything that's even remotely true!
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Good things don't end in 'eum,' they end in 'mania'...or 'teria'.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: How could you?! Haven't you learned anything from that guy who gives those sermons at church? Captain Whatshisname? We live in a society of laws! Why do you think I took you to all those Police Academy movies? For fun? Well, I didn't hear anybody laughing, did you? Except at that guy who made sound effects. Makes sound effects and laughs. Where was I? Oh yeah! Stay out of my booze.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: How is education supposed to make me feel smarter? Besides, every time I learn something new, it pushes some old stuff out of my brain. Remember when I took that home winemaking course, and I forgot how to drive?
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: I can't believe it! Reading and writing actually paid off!
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: I hope this has taught you kids a lesson: kids never learn.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: I thought I had an appetite for destruction, but all I wanted was a club sandwich.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: I want to share something with you: The three little sentences that will get you through life. Number 1: Cover for me. Number 2: Oh, good idea, Boss! Number 3: It was like that when I got here.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: I'll keep it short and sweet -- Family. Religion. Friendship. These are the three demons you must slay if you wish to succeed in business.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: I'm a level 5 vegan, I don't eat anything that casts a shadow.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: I'm better than dirt. Well, most kinds of dirt, not that fancy store-bought dirt... I can't compete with that stuff.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: I'm not a bad guy! I work hard, and I love my kids. So why should I spend half my Sunday hearing about how I'm going to Hell?
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: If it doesn't have Siamese twins in a jar, it is not a fair.
wisdom.author: Matt Groening, The Simpsons

wisdom.quote: Any woman who thinks the way to a man's heart is through his stomach is aiming about 10 inches too high.
wisdom.author: Adrienne E. Gusoff

wisdom.quote: Girls just want to have funds.
wisdom.author: Adrienne E. Gusoff

wisdom.quote: I have often depended on the blindness of strangers.
wisdom.author: Adrienne E. Gusoff

wisdom.quote: Living hell is the best revenge.
wisdom.author: Adrienne E. Gusoff

wisdom.quote: The less their ability, the more their conceit.
wisdom.author: Ahad HaAm

wisdom.quote: I have read your book and much like it.
wisdom.author: Moses Hadas

wisdom.quote: Thank you for sending me a copy of your book. I'll waste no time reading it.
wisdom.author: Moses Hadas

wisdom.quote: This book fills a much-needed gap.
wisdom.author: Moses Hadas

wisdom.quote: Best wide-angle lens? Two steps backward. Look for the 'ah-ha'.
wisdom.author: Ernst Haas, Comment in workshop, 1985

wisdom.quote: The camera doesn't make a bit of difference. All of them can record what you are seeing. But, you have to SEE.
wisdom.author: Ernst Haas, Comment in workshop, 1985

wisdom.quote: This art of resting the mind and the power of dismissing from it all care and worry is probably one of the secrets of energy in our great men.
wisdom.author: Captain J. A. Hadfield

wisdom.quote: As I grow older , I regret to say that a detestable habit of thinking seems to be getting a hold of me.
wisdom.author: H. Rider Haggard, King Solomon's Mines

wisdom.quote: Please write again soon. Though my own life is filled with activity, letters encourage momentary escape into others lives and I come back to my own with greater contentment.
wisdom.author: Elizabeth Forsythe Hailey, 'A Woman of Independent Means'

wisdom.quote: Time is a cruel thief to rob us of our former selves. We lose as much to life as we do to death.
wisdom.author: Elizabeth Forsythe Hailey, 'A Woman of Independent Means'

wisdom.quote: May your service of love a beautiful thing; want nothing else, fear nothing else and let love be free to become what love truly is.
wisdom.author: Hadewijch of Antwerp

wisdom.quote: Lack of money is no obstacle. Lack of an idea is an obstacle.
wisdom.author: Ken Hakuta

wisdom.quote: Put duties aside at least an hour before bed and perform soothing, quiet activities that will help you relax.
wisdom.author: Dianne Hales

wisdom.quote: If you have accomplished all that you planned for yourself, you have not planned enough.
wisdom.author: Edward Everett Hale

wisdom.quote: Never bear more than one trouble at a time. Some people bear three kinds - all they have had, all they have now, and all they expect to have.
