Mankind must evolve for all human conflict a method which rejects revenge, aggression, and retaliation. The foundation of such a method is love.
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr., December 11, 1964

wisdom.quote: The church was not merely a thermometer that recorded the ideas and principles of popular opinion; it was a thermostat that transformed the mores of society.
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr., Letter from Birmingham Jail, April 1963

wisdom.quote: Now, I say to you today my friends, even though we face the difficulties of today and tomorrow, I still have a dream. It is a dream deeply rooted in the American dream. I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: - 'We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal.'
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr., Speech at Civil Rights March on Washington, August 28, 1963

wisdom.quote: I submit to you that if a man hasn't discovered something he will die for, he isn't fit to live.
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr., Speech in Detroit, June 23, 1963

wisdom.quote: ...And I've looked over, and I've seen the promised land. I may not get there with you, but I want you to know tonight that we as a people will get to the promised land. So I'm happy tonight. I'm not worried about anything. I'm not fearing any man.
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr., Speech in Memphis, April 3, 1968, the day before King was assassinated

wisdom.quote: Nothing in all the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr., Strength to Love, 1963

wisdom.quote: Our scientific power has outrun our spiritual power. We have guided missiles and misguided men.
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr., Strength to Love, 1963

wisdom.quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr., Strength to Love, 1963

wisdom.quote: Wisdom born of experience should tell us that war is obsolete. There may have been a time when war served as a negative good by preventing the spread and growth of an evil force... If we assume that life is worth living, if we assume that mankind has the right to survive, then we must find an alternative to war.
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr., The Christmas Sermon On Peace in on Dec 24, 1967

wisdom.quote: Freedom is never voluntarily given by the oppressor; it must be demanded by the oppressed.
wisdom.author: Martin Luther King Jr., Why We Can't Wait

wisdom.quote: The trouble with being poor is that it takes up all of your time.
wisdom.author: Willem de Kooning

wisdom.quote: All of the significant battles are waged within the self.
wisdom.author: Sheldon Kopp

wisdom.quote: In the long run, we get no more than we have been willing to risk giving.
wisdom.author: Sheldon Kopp

wisdom.quote: The unspoken word never does harm.
wisdom.author: Kossuth

wisdom.quote: What can you say about a society that says that God is dead and Elvis is alive?
wisdom.author: Irv Kupcinet

wisdom.quote: The road to hell is paved with adverbs.
wisdom.author: Stephen King

wisdom.quote: You can't deny laughter. When it comes, it plops down in your favorite chair and stays as long as it wants.
wisdom.author: Stephen King

wisdom.quote: Any word you have to hunt for in a thesaurus is the wrong word. There are no exceptions to this rule.
wisdom.author: Stephen King, "Everything You Need to Know About Writing Successfully - in Ten Minutes", 1988

wisdom.quote: You can't deny laughter; when it comes, it plops down in your favorite chair and stays as long as it wants.
wisdom.author: Stephen King, "Hearts in Atlantis"

wisdom.quote: If you don't have the time to read, you don't have the time or the tools to write.
wisdom.author: Stephen King, On Writing, p. 147

wisdom.quote: You can approach the act of writing with nervousness, excitement, hopefulness, or even despair–the sense that you can never completely put on the page what’s in your mind and heart. You can come to the act with your fists clenched and your eyes narrowed, ready to kick ass and take down names. You can come to it because you want a girl to marry you or because you want to change the world. Come to it any way but lightly. Let me say it again: you must not come lightly to the blank page.
wisdom.author: Stephen King, On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft, 2000

wisdom.quote: You must not come lightly to the blank page.
wisdom.author: Stephen King, On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft, 2000

wisdom.quote: I don't think you're a very good friend if you're always being supportive. You also have to add criticism.
wisdom.author: Jason Kottke, Keynote Speech, SXSW 2006

wisdom.quote: I believe America's best days are ahead of us because I believe that the future belongs to freedom, not to fear.
wisdom.author: John Kerry

wisdom.quote: I would rather be the candidate of the NAACP than the NRA.
wisdom.author: John Kerry

wisdom.quote: I'm glad the President finally found an economic development program. I'm just sad that it's only in Baghdad.
wisdom.author: John Kerry

wisdom.quote: It�s time we framed every question - every issue -- not in terms of what�s in it for �me,� but what�s in it for all of us?
wisdom.author: John Kerry, 9/19/05 Senator John Kerry's Speech at Brown University http://www.johnkerry.com/pressroom/speeches/spc_2005_09_19.html

wisdom.quote: In this remarkable time for the world, I refuse to believe it's time to stop believing in the possibilities of our remarkable country. I refuse to accept the downsizing of the American Dream. I refuse to bet against American entrepreneurial spirit and American ingenuity.
wisdom.author: John Kerry, 9/26/05 Speech at the Boston Chamber of Commerce http://www.johnkerry.com/pressroom/speeches/spc_2005_09_26.html

wisdom.quote: We must uphold the promise of Roosevelt, Truman, Kennedy, Johnson, Carter, and Clinton and never allow the President and his Republican friends to threaten Social Security by putting it on the Wall Street trading block.
wisdom.author: John Kerry, Speech at Democratic Convention, May 31, 2002

wisdom.quote: American can do better, and help is on the way.
wisdom.author: John Kerry, speech in 2004

wisdom.quote: At every step of the way, George W. Bush has put the narrow interests of the few ahead of the interests of most Americans.
wisdom.author: John Kerry, speech in New York, August 24, 2004

wisdom.quote: I defended this country as a young man, and I will defend it as president.
wisdom.author: John Kerry, speech in New York, August 24, 2004

wisdom.quote: Feminism is the radical notion that women are people.
wisdom.author: Cheris Kramarae, and Paula Treichler

wisdom.quote: The more original a discovery, the more obvious it seems afterwards.
wisdom.author: Arthur Koestler

wisdom.quote: We cannot think unless we are insane.
wisdom.author: Arthur Koestler

wisdom.quote: The more minimal the art, the more maximum the explanation.
wisdom.author: Hilton Kramer

wisdom.quote: The more minimal the art, the more maximum the explination.
wisdom.author: Hilton Kramer, The New York Times art critic, in the late 1960

wisdom.quote: The thing that impresses me the most about America is the way parents obey their children.
wisdom.author: King Edward VIII

wisdom.quote: Learn to get in touch with the silence within yourself and know that everything in this life has a purpose.
wisdom.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

wisdom.quote: There is no need to go to India or anywhere else to find peace. You will find that deep place of silence right in your room, your garden or even your bathtub.
wisdom.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

wisdom.quote: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.
wisdom.author: Krishnamarti

wisdom.quote: Both the cockroach and the bird would get along very well without us, although the cockroach would miss us most.
wisdom.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

wisdom.quote: Gardens are not made by sitting in the shade.
wisdom.author: Rudyard Kipling

wisdom.quote: He wrapped himself in quotations- as a beggar would enfold himself in the purple of Emperors.
wisdom.author: Rudyard Kipling

wisdom.quote: Often and often afterwards, the beloved Aunt would ask me why I had never told anyone how I was being treated. Children tell little more than animals, for what comes to them they accept as eternally established.
wisdom.author: Rudyard Kipling

wisdom.quote: Take everything you like seriously, except yourselves.
wisdom.author: Rudyard Kipling

wisdom.quote: Once there was The People - Terror gave it birth; Once there was The People, and it made a hell of earth! Earth arose and crushed it. Listen, oh, ye slain! Once there was The People - it shall never be again!
wisdom.author: Rudyard Kipling, As Easy as A.B.C. (1917)

wisdom.quote: I keep six honest serving-men (They taught me all I knew); Their names are What and Why and When And How and Where and Who.
wisdom.author: Rudyard Kipling, The Elephant's Child (1902)

wisdom.quote: Every woman knows all about everything.
wisdom.author: Rudyard Kipling, The Eye of Allah (1926)

wisdom.quote: There's no jealousy in the grave.
wisdom.author: Rudyard Kipling, The Eye of Allah (1926)

wisdom.quote: Funny how the new things are the old things.
wisdom.author: Rudyard Kipling, With the Night Mail (1909)

wisdom.quote: The universe may not always play fair, but at least it's got a hell of a sense of humor.
wisdom.author: Michael Patrick King, Sex and the City

wisdom.quote: Nothing else exists when art does.
wisdom.author: Michael Patrick King, Sex and the City, An American Girl in Paris: Part Deux, 2004

wisdom.quote: Maybe our mistakes are what make our fate. Without them, what would shape our lives? Perhaps, if we never veered off course, we wouldn't fall in love or have babies or be who we are.
wisdom.author: Michael Patrick King, Sex and the City, I Heart NY, 2002

wisdom.quote: Seasons change, so do cities. People come into your life and people go, but it's comforting to know: the ones you love are always in your heart and if you're very lucky, a plane ride away.
wisdom.author: Michael Patrick King, Sex and the City, I Heart NY, 2002

wisdom.quote: I don't wear a watch. How do I know my time? I find that someone will always tell me.
wisdom.author: Michael Patrick King, Sex and the City, One, 2003

wisdom.quote: I always like a good math solution to any love problem.
wisdom.author: Michael Patrick King, Sex and the City, Take Me Out To The Ballgame, 1999

wisdom.quote: That's the thing about needs. Sometimes, when you get them met, you don't need them anymore.
wisdom.author: Michael Patrick King, Sex and the City, The Good Fight, 2002

wisdom.quote: When real people fall down in life, they get right back up and keep on walking.
wisdom.author: Michael Patrick King, Sex and the City, The Real Me, 2001

wisdom.quote: About the capitalist states, it doesn't depend on you whether we (Soviet Union) exist. If you don't like us, don't accept our invitations, and don't invite us to come to see you. Whether you like it our not, history is on our side. We will bury you.
wisdom.author: Nikita Khrushchev

wisdom.quote: Berlin is the testicle of the West. When I want the West to scream, I squeeze on Berlin.
wisdom.author: Nikita Khrushchev

wisdom.quote: Politicians are the same all over. They promise to build a bridge even where there is no river.
wisdom.author: Nikita Khrushchev

wisdom.quote: Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you.
wisdom.author: Nikita Khrushchev, remark at the Polish embasy in Moscow, Nov. 18, 1956

wisdom.quote: I once said, "We will bury you," and I got into trouble with it. Of course we will not bury you with a shovel. Your own working class will bury you.
wisdom.author: Nikita Khrushchev, Speech in Yugoslavia, Aug. 24, 1963

wisdom.quote: Courage is an accumulation of small steps.
wisdom.author: George Konrad

wisdom.quote: The best blush to use is laughter. It puts roses in your cheeks and in your soul.
wisdom.author: Linda Knight

wisdom.quote: Mourning never really ends, only as time goes on, as we do our work, it may erupt less frequently.
wisdom.author: Ruth Davis Konigsberg, The Truth About Grief, 2011

wisdom.quote: I already knew to eat clean and listen to my body, to only eat when I was in a calm mental state. Everyone knew. But when you're fat in the head, it's never about knowing the answers. It's about living them.
wisdom.author: Stephanie Klein, Moose, 2008

wisdom.quote: I'd heard it all the time, 'Live in the moment.' But if I did that, I'd weigh more than a dump truck. Losing weight wasn't about the moment at all; it was about having faith in the future. It was about knowing there would be another meal in a few hours.
wisdom.author: Stephanie Klein, Moose, 2008

wisdom.quote: That's the thing about being a former fat camp champ: when asked if I'd change my past if I could, I always answer no. The pain of being an overweight kid, the humiliation, make you think twice before ever cutting anyone else down.
wisdom.author: Stephanie Klein, Moose, 2008

wisdom.quote: There's something almost perfect in the ugly duckling syndrome. Because a sensitivity is tattooed on a part of you no one else can see but can somehow guess is there.
wisdom.author: Stephanie Klein, Moose, 2008

wisdom.quote: When we die, no one remembers us for what we weighed. Our weight isn't etched into our headstones.
wisdom.author: Stephanie Klein, Moose, 2008

wisdom.quote: The great nations have always acted like gangsters, and the small nations like prostitutes.
wisdom.author: Stanley Kubrick, in Guardian, June 5, 1963

wisdom.quote: I'm having a glorious old age. One of my greatest delights is that I have outlived most of my opposition.
wisdom.author: Maggie Kuhn, Speech to Vermont state legislature, 1991

wisdom.quote: Freedom's just another word for nothing left to lose.
wisdom.author: Kris Kristofferson, "Me and Bobby McGee"

wisdom.quote: What makes the engine go? Desire, desire, desire.
wisdom.author: Stanley Kunitz, O Magazine, September 2003

wisdom.quote: In a mad world only the mad are sane.
wisdom.author: Akira Kurosawa

wisdom.quote: Givers have to set limits because takers rarely do.
wisdom.author: Irma Kurtz, Cosmopolitan Magazine, September 2003

wisdom.quote: If you leave the pool you have dug for yourself and go out into the river of life then life has an astonishing way of taking care of you, because then there is no taking care on your part.
wisdom.author: Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: In the space which thought creates around itself there is no love. This space divides man from man, and in it is all the becoming, the battle of life, the agony and fear. Meditation is the ending of this space, the ending of the me.
wisdom.author: Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: So when you are listening to somebody, completely, attentively, then you are listening not only to the words, but also to the feeling of what is being conveyed, to the whole of it, not part of it.
wisdom.author: Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: The ending of sorrow is the beginning of wisdom. Knowledge is always within the shadow of ignorance. Meditation is freedom from thought and a movement in the ecstasy of truth. Meditation is explosion of intelligence.
wisdom.author: Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: Truth is a pathless land.
wisdom.author: Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: What is needed, rather than running away or controlling or suppressing or any other resistance, is understanding fear; that means, watch it, learn about it, come directly into contact with it. We are to learn about fear, not how to escape from it.
wisdom.author: Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: When we talk about understanding, surely it takes place only when the mind listens completely-- the mind being your heart, your nerves, your ears- when you give your whole attention to it.
wisdom.author: Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: Without freedom from the past, there is no freedom at all, because the mind is never new, fresh, innocent.
wisdom.author: Krishnamurti

wisdom.quote: In obedience there is always fear, and fear darkens the mind.
wisdom.author: Krishnamurti, Beginnings of Learning

wisdom.quote: When one loses the deep intimate relationship with nature, then temples, mosques and churches become important.
wisdom.author: Krishnamurti, Beginnings of Learning

wisdom.quote: Thanks to the Interstate Highway System, it is now possible to travel from coast to coast without seeing anything.
wisdom.author: Charles Kuralt

wisdom.quote: One of the most sublime experiences we can ever have is to wake up feeling healthy after we have been sick.
wisdom.author: Rabbi Harold Kushner

wisdom.quote: If I've learned one thing in the 14 years I've been a full-time cartoonist, it's that you can not let anyone else define your professionalism. It has to be a personal ethos to which you adhere despite third party influence or acceptance. The old measuring sticks for professionalism are going away and now more than ever it's time for independent creatives to set the bar. Set it high.
wisdom.author: Scott R. Kurtz, PvPonline, 11-28-2011

wisdom.quote: The only real prison is fear, and the only real freedom is freedom from fear.
wisdom.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

wisdom.quote: Love is a desire for that lost half of ourselves.
wisdom.author: Milan Kundera

wisdom.quote: Young is the one that plunges in the future and never looks back.
wisdom.author: Milan Kundera

wisdom.quote: The basis of shame is not some personal mistake of ours, but the ignominy, the humiliation we feel that we must be what we are without any choice in the matter, and that this humiliation is seen by everyone.
wisdom.author: Milan Kundera, Immortality

wisdom.quote: Nobody got anywhere in the world by simply being content.
wisdom.author: Louis L'Amour

wisdom.quote: A mind, like a home, is furnished by its owner, so if one's life is cold and bare he can blame none but himself.
wisdom.author: Louis L'Amour, 'Bendigo Shafter'

wisdom.quote: Beware so long as you live, of judging people by appearances.
wisdom.author: La Fontaine

wisdom.quote: When we ask for advice, we are usually looking for an accomplice.
wisdom.author: Marquis de la Grange

wisdom.quote: My parents only had one argument in forty-five years. It lasted forty-three years.
wisdom.author: Cathy Ladman

wisdom.quote: Intuition isn't the enemy, but the ally, of reason.
wisdom.author: John Kord Lagemann

wisdom.quote: A life lived in chaos is an impossibility...
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'Engle

wisdom.quote: If we aren't capable of being hurt we aren't capable of feeling joy.
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'Engle

wisdom.quote: It takes too much energy to be against something unless it's really important.
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'Engle

wisdom.quote: We can't take any credit for our talents. It's how we use them that counts.
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'Engle

wisdom.quote: Truth is eternal, knowledge is changeable. It is disastrous to confuse them.
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'Engle,  An Acceptable Time

wisdom.quote: When we were children, we used to think that when we were grown-up we would no longer be vulnerable. But to grow up is to accept vulnerability... To be alive is to be vulnerable.
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'Engle, "Walking on Water: Reflections on Faith and Art", 1980

wisdom.quote: Maybe you have to know darkness before you can appreciate the light.
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'engle, her novel-- "A Ring of Endless Light"

wisdom.quote: The great thing about getting older is that you don't lose all the other ages you've been.
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'Engle, in New York Times, 1985

wisdom.quote: That's the way things come clear. All of a sudden. And then you realize how obvious they've been all along.
wisdom.author: Madeleine L'Engle, The Arm of the Starfish, 1965

wisdom.quote: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth.
wisdom.author: Diogenes Laertius

wisdom.quote: From the moment of birth, when the stone-age baby confronts the twentieth-century mother, the baby is subjected to these forces of violence, called love, as its mother and father have been, and their parents and their parents before them. These forces are mainly concerned with destroying most of its potentialities. This enterprise is on the whole successful.
wisdom.author: R. D. Laing

wisdom.quote: Life is a sexually transmitted disease.
wisdom.author: R. D. Laing

wisdom.quote: The range of what we think and do is limited by what we fail to notice. And because we fail to notice that we fail to notice, there is little we can do to change; until we notice how failing to notice shapes our thoughts and deeds.
wisdom.author: R. D. Laing

wisdom.quote: We live in a moment of history where change is so speeded up that we begin to see the present only when it is already disappearing.
wisdom.author: R. D. Laing

wisdom.quote: Children are not things to be molded, but are people to be unfolded.
wisdom.author: Jess Lair

wisdom.quote: Education is the guardian genius of democracy. It is the only dictator that free men recognize, and the only ruler that free men require.
wisdom.author: Mirabeau Buonaparte Lamar

wisdom.quote: I have thought too much to stoop to action.
wisdom.author: Adam De L'Isle

wisdom.quote: Accept what people offer. Drink their milkshakes. Take their love.
wisdom.author: Wally Lamb

wisdom.quote: Hope begins in the dark, the stubborn hope that if you just show up and try to do the right thing, the dawn will come. You wait and watch and work: You don't give up.
wisdom.author: Anne Lamott

wisdom.quote: You can safely assume that you've created God in your own image when it turns out that God hates all the same people you do.
wisdom.author: Anne Lamott

wisdom.quote: I want to change the pop world one sequin at a time. Artists tend to take themselves way too seriously and don't enjoy the fun of making an impact on culture. I just have a good time and sequins represent a good time.
wisdom.author: Lady Gaga, BBC Breakfast, 04-21-09

wisdom.quote: Sometimes in life you don't always feel like a winner, but that doesn't mean you're not a winner.
wisdom.author: Lady Gaga, Ellen Degeneres Show, 09-08-09

wisdom.quote: I think it's absolutely a blessing when you just know what your purpose is and your destiny. I don't think it's a curse at all.
wisdom.author: Lady Gaga, The Today Show, 12-08-08

wisdom.quote: Getting fired is nature's way to telling you that you had the wrong job in the first place.
wisdom.author: Hal Lancaster, in The Wall Street Journal

wisdom.quote: All married couples should learn the art of battle as they should learn the art of making love. Good battle is objective and honest - never vicious or cruel. Good battle is healthy and constructive, and brings to a marriage the principle of equal partnership.
wisdom.author: Ann Landers

wisdom.quote: Don't accept your dog's admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful.
wisdom.author: Ann Landers

wisdom.quote: Expect trouble as an inevitable part of life, and when it comes, hold your head high, look it squarely in the eye and say, 'I will be bigger than you. You cannot defeat me.'
wisdom.author: Ann Landers

wisdom.quote: Television has proved that people will look at anything rather than each other.
wisdom.author: Ann Landers

wisdom.quote: My thoughts are my company; I can bring them together, select them, detain them, dismiss them.
wisdom.author: Walter Landor

wisdom.quote: Somebody should tell us, right at the start of our lives, that we are dying. Then we might live life to the limit, every minute of every day. Do it! I say. Whatever you want to do, do it now!
wisdom.author: Michael Landon

wisdom.quote: Whatever you want to do, do it now. There are only so many tomorrows.
wisdom.author: Michael Landon

wisdom.quote: No important institution is ever merely what the law makes it. It accumulates about itself traditions, conventions, ways of behaviour, which are not less formidable in their influence.
wisdom.author: Harold Laki

wisdom.quote: You can cover a great deal of country in books.
wisdom.author: Andrew Lang

wisdom.quote: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
wisdom.author: Hedy Lamarr

wisdom.quote: I am determined that my children shall be brought up in their father's religion, if they can find out what it is.
wisdom.author: Charles Lamb

wisdom.quote: Lawyers, I suppose, were children once.
wisdom.author: Charles Lamb

wisdom.quote: There is nothing so nice as doing good by stealth and being found out by accident.
wisdom.author: Charles Lamb

wisdom.quote: Two men look out through the same bars: One sees the mud and one the stars.
wisdom.author: Frederick Langbridge

wisdom.quote: Anyone who limits her vision to memories of yesterday is already dead.
wisdom.author: Lily Langtry

wisdom.quote: In human life, art may arise from almost any activity, and once it does so, it is launched on a long road of exploration, invention, freedom to the limits of extravagance, interference to the point of frustration, finally discipline, controlling constant change and growth.
wisdom.author: Susanne Langer

wisdom.quote: I've known what it is to be hungry, but I always went right to a restaurant.
wisdom.author: Ring Lardner

wisdom.quote: A good many young writers make the mistake of enclosing a stamped, self-addressed envelope, big enough for the manuscript to come back in. This is too much of a temptation to the editor.
wisdom.author: Ring Lardner, "How to Write Short Stories"

wisdom.quote: Advertising may be described as the science of arresting the human intelligence long enough to get money from it.
wisdom.author: Stephen Leacock

wisdom.quote: I detest life-insurance agents; they always argue that I shall some day die, which is not so.
wisdom.author: Stephen Leacock

wisdom.quote: Newspapermen learn to call a murderer 'an alleged murderer' and the King of England 'the alleged King of England' to avoid libel suits.
wisdom.author: Stephen Leacock

wisdom.quote: Lord Ronald said nothing; he flung himself from the room, flung himself upon his horse and rode madly off in all directions.
wisdom.author: Stephen Leacock, "Nonsense Novels",1911

wisdom.quote: Mistrust the man who finds everything good, the man who finds everything evil and still more the man who is indifferent to everything.
wisdom.author: Johann K. Lavater

wisdom.quote: Never tell evil of a man, if you do not know it for certainty, and if you know it for a certainty, then ask yourself, 'Why should I tell it?'
wisdom.author: Johann K. Lavater

wisdom.quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.
wisdom.author: Vernon Sanders Law

wisdom.quote: Courage is saying, "Maybe what I'm doing isn't working; maybe I should try something else."
wisdom.author: Anna Lappe, O Magazine, June 2003

wisdom.quote: Every time you spend money, you're casting a vote for the kind of world you want.
wisdom.author: Anna Lappe, O Magazine, June 2003

wisdom.quote: Hope doesn't come from calculating whether the good news is winning out over the bad. It's simply a choice to take action.
wisdom.author: Anna Lappe, O Magazine, June 2003

wisdom.quote: Depend not on another, but lean instead on thyself...True happiness is born of self-reliance.
wisdom.author: The laws of Manu

wisdom.quote: My friends, love is better than anger. Hope is better than fear. Optimism is better than despair. So let us be loving, hopeful and optimistic. And we�ll change the world.
wisdom.author: Jack Layton, Letter to Canada, 08-20-2011

wisdom.quote: Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone; it has to be made, like bread, remade all the time, made new.
wisdom.author: Ursula K. LeGuin

wisdom.quote: The only thing that makes life possible is permanent, intolerable uncertainty; not knowing what comes next.
wisdom.author: Ursula K. LeGuin

wisdom.quote: All men dream: but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds wake in the day to find that it was vanity: but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act their dream with open eyes, to make it possible.
wisdom.author: T. E. Lawrence, "The Seven Pillars of Wisdom"

wisdom.quote: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
wisdom.author: Reggie Leach

wisdom.quote: Even the fear of death is nothing compared to the fear of not having lived authentically and fully.
wisdom.author: Frances Moore Lappe, O Magazine, May 2004

wisdom.quote: I've grown certain that the root of all fear is that we've been forced to deny who we are.
wisdom.author: Frances Moore Lappe, O Magazine, May 2004

wisdom.quote: You get fifteen democrats in a room, and you get twenty opinions.
wisdom.author: Senator Patrick Leahy, May 1990

wisdom.quote: There is no possible line of conduct which has art some time and place been condemned, and which has not at some other time and place been enjoined as a duty.
wisdom.author: William Lecky

wisdom.quote: Egotism is the anesthetic that dulls the pain of stupidity.
wisdom.author: Frank Leahy

wisdom.quote: Intimate relationships cannot substitute for a life plan. But to have any meaning or viability at all, a life plan must include intimate relationships.
wisdom.author: Harriet Lerner

wisdom.quote: Anger is a signal, and one worth listening to.
wisdom.author: Harriet Lerner, The Dance of Anger, 1985

wisdom.quote: Necessity has no law.
wisdom.author: William Langland

wisdom.quote: There smites nothing so sharp, nor smelleth so sour as shame.
wisdom.author: William Langland

wisdom.quote: Who will bell the cat?
wisdom.author: William Langland, The Vision of Piers Plowman

wisdom.quote: To know oneself is to study oneself in action with another person.
wisdom.author: Bruce Lee, Tao of Jeet Kune Do

wisdom.quote: The opposite of war isnt peace its creation
wisdom.author: Jonathan Larson, R.E.N.T

wisdom.quote: The most important work you and I will ever do will be within the walls of our own homes.
wisdom.author: Harold B. Lee

wisdom.quote: It was on my fifth birthday that Papa put his hand on my shoulder and said, 'Remember, my son, if you ever need a helping hand, you'll find one at the end of your arm.'
wisdom.author: Sam Levenson

wisdom.quote: It's so simple to be wise. Just think of something stupid to say and then don't say it.
wisdom.author: Sam Levenson

wisdom.quote: Somewhere on this globe, every ten seconds, there is a woman giving birth to a child. She must be found and stopped.
wisdom.author: Sam Levenson

wisdom.quote: The reason grandparents and grandchildren get along so well is that they have a common enemy.
wisdom.author: Sam Levenson

wisdom.quote: You must learn from the mistakes of others. You can't possibly live long enough to make them all yourself.
wisdom.author: Sam Levenson

wisdom.quote: I won't change anything because I think the most important thing is being yourself and that's what I'm going to continue to do.
wisdom.author: Avril Lavigne

wisdom.quote: To succeed is nothing, it's an accident. but to feel no doubts about oneself is something very different: it is character.
wisdom.author: Marie Leneru, Oprah Magazine, May 2004

wisdom.quote: Seek not happiness too greedily, and be not fearful of happiness.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: He who knows does not speak.He who speaks does not know.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: He who knows others is wise;He who know himself is enlightened.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: He who loves the world as his body may be entrusted with the empire.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: I have three treasures. Guard and keep them:The first is deep love,The second is frugality,And the third is not to dare to be ahead of the world.Because of deep love, one is courageous.Because of frugality, one is generous.Because of not daring to be ahead of the world, one becomes the leader of the world.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: Manifest plainness,Embrace simplicity,Reduce selfishness,Have few desires.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: People are difficult to govern because they have too much knowledge.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: The best [man] is like water.Water is good; it benefits all things and does not compete with them.It dwells in [lowly] places that all disdain.This is why it is so near to Tao.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: The more laws and order are made prominent,The more thieves and robbers there will be.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: The softest things in the world overcome the hardest things in the world.Through this I know the advantage of taking no action.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: The Way of Heaven is to benefit others and not to injure.The Way of the sage is to act but not to compete.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: There is no calamity greater than lavish desires.There is no greater guilt than discontentment.And there is no greater disaster than greed.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: To be worn out is to be renewed.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: To have little is to possess.To have plenty is to be perplexed.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: To know that you do not know is the best.To pretend to know when you do not know is a disease.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: To produce things and to rear them,To produce, but not to take possession of them,To act, but not to rely on one's own ability,To lead them, but not to master them -This is called profound and secret virtue.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: When armies are mobilized and issues are joined,The man who is sorry over the fact will win.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: When the highest type of men hear Tao,They diligently practice it.When the average type of men hear Tao,They half believe in it.When the lowest type of men hear Tao,They laugh heartily at it.Without the laugh, there is no Tao.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: When the people of the world all know beauty as beauty,There arises the recognition of ugliness.When they all know the good as good,There arises the recognition of evil.
wisdom.author: Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu

wisdom.quote: Nothing succeeds like the appearance of success.
wisdom.author: Christopher Lasch

wisdom.quote: Delete the adjectives and [you'll] have the facts.
wisdom.author: Harper Lee

wisdom.quote: Before I can live with other folks, I�ve got to live with myself. The one thing that doesn�t abide by majority rule is a person�s conscience.
wisdom.author: Harper Lee, To Kill a Mockingbird

wisdom.quote: I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand. It's when you know you're licked before you begin but you begin anyway and you see it through no matter what.
wisdom.author: Harper Lee, To Kill a Mockingbird, 1960

wisdom.quote: Touch your customer, and you're halfway there.
wisdom.author: Estee Lauder

wisdom.quote: An exile's life is no life.
wisdom.author: Leonidas of Tarentum, from The Greek Anthology, 1973, Peter Jay

wisdom.quote: Isn't it fascinating how long a few minutes seem when you are completely alone with not a familiar face in sight?
wisdom.author: Kirby Larson, Hattie Big Sky, 2006

wisdom.quote: It seems the misfortune of one can plow a deeper furrow in the heart than the misfortune of millions.
wisdom.author: Kirby Larson, Hattie Big Sky, 2006

wisdom.quote: It's the company, not the cooking, that makes a meal.
wisdom.author: Kirby Larson, Hattie Big Sky, 2006

wisdom.quote: My bounce-around life had taught me that dreams were dangerous things - they look solid in your mind, but you just try to reach for them. It's like gathering clouds.
wisdom.author: Kirby Larson, Hattie Big Sky, 2006

wisdom.quote: The lessons this life has planted in my heart pertain more to caring than crops, more to Golden Rule than gold, more to the proper choice than to the popular choice.
wisdom.author: Kirby Larson, Hattie Big Sky, 2006

wisdom.quote: The worst thing of all is standing by when folks are doing something wrong.
wisdom.author: Kirby Larson, Hattie Big Sky, 2006

wisdom.quote: There is nothing like the occasional outburst of profanity to calm jangled nerves.
wisdom.author: Kirby Larson, Hattie Big Sky, 2006

wisdom.quote: There should be fireworks, at least, when a dream dies.
wisdom.author: Kirby Larson, Hattie Big Sky, 2006

wisdom.quote: My most important piece of advice to all you would-be writers: when you write, try to leave out all the parts readers skip.
wisdom.author: Elmore Leonard

wisdom.quote: Faith is, at one and the same time, absolutely necessary and altogether impossible.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw Lem

wisdom.quote: Cannibals prefer those who have no spines.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw Lem, "Holiday", 1963

wisdom.quote: Do not trust people. They are capable of greatness.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw Lem, "Holiday", September 1963

wisdom.quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment.
wisdom.author: Barry LePatner

wisdom.quote: The secret of dealing successfully with a child is not to be its parent.
wisdom.author: Mel Lazarus

wisdom.quote: Ask yourself: Have you been kind today? Make kindness your daily modus operandi and change your world.
wisdom.author: Annie Lennox

wisdom.quote: One single grateful thought raised to heaven is the most perfect prayer.
wisdom.author: G. E. Lessing

wisdom.quote: A lie told often enough becomes the truth.
wisdom.author: Lenin

wisdom.quote: While the State exists, there can be no freedom. When there is freedom there will be no State.
wisdom.author: Lenin, "State and Revolution", 1919

wisdom.quote: All sanity depends on this: that it should be a delight to feel heat strike the skin, a delight to stand upright, knowing the bones are moving easily under the flesh.
wisdom.author: Doris Lessing

wisdom.quote: Laughter is by definition healthy.
wisdom.author: Doris Lessing

wisdom.quote: That is what learning is. You suddenly understand something you've understood all your life, but in a new way.
wisdom.author: Doris Lessing

wisdom.quote: The great secret that all old people share is that you really haven't changed in 70 or 80 years. Your body changes, but you don't change at all.
wisdom.author: Doris Lessing, O Magazine, October 2003

wisdom.quote: If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there'd be peace.
wisdom.author: John Lennon

wisdom.quote: Would those of you in the cheaper seats clap your hands? And the rest of you, if you'll just rattle your jewelry.
wisdom.author: John Lennon

wisdom.quote: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
wisdom.author: John Lennon, "Beautiful Boy"

wisdom.quote: Living is easy with eyes closed, misunderstanding all you see.
wisdom.author: John Lennon, Strawberry Fields

wisdom.quote: Women who seek to be equal with men lack ambition.
wisdom.author: Timothy Leary

wisdom.quote: I know that there are people who do not love their fellow man, and I hate people like that!
wisdom.author: Tom Lehrer

wisdom.quote: I wish people who have trouble communicating would just shut up.
wisdom.author: Tom Lehrer

wisdom.quote: The Army has carried the American ... ideal to its logical conclusion. Not only do they prohibit discrimination on the grounds of race, creed and color, but also on ability.
wisdom.author: Tom Lehrer

wisdom.quote: On my income tax 1040 it says 'Check this box if you are blind.' I wanted to put a check mark about three inches away.
wisdom.author: Tom Lehrer, lecturing in "The Nature of Math", 4/4/90

wisdom.quote: A peculiar virtue in wildlife ethics is that the hunter ordinarily has no gallery to applaud or disapprove of his conduct. Whatever his acts, they are dictated by his own conscience, rather than by a mob of onlookers. It is difficult to exaggerate the importance of this fact.
wisdom.author: Aldo Leopold, A Sand County Almanac

wisdom.quote: We are opening up an enormous new era in archaeology. Time capsules in the deep oceans.
wisdom.author: John Lehman

wisdom.quote: Power corrupts. Absolute power is kind of neat.
wisdom.author: John Lehman, Secretary of the Navy, 1981-1987

wisdom.quote: The joy of a spirit is the measure of its power.
wisdom.author: Ninon de Lenclos

wisdom.quote: I have everything now I had 20 years ago except now, it's all lower.
wisdom.author: Gypsy Rose Lee

wisdom.quote: My evil genius Procrastination has whispered me to tarry 'til a more convenient season.
wisdom.author: Mary Todd Lincoln

wisdom.quote: While one person hesitates because he feels inferior, the other is busy making mistakes and becoming superior.
wisdom.author: Henry C. Link

wisdom.quote: Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach a man to fish and he will eat for a lifetime. Teach a man to create an artificial shortage of fish and he will eat steak.
wisdom.author: Jay Leno

wisdom.quote: Go through your phone book, call people and ask them to drive you to the airport. The ones who will drive you are your true friends. The rest aren't bad people; they're just acquaintances.
wisdom.author: Jay Leno

wisdom.quote: Here's something to think about: How come you never see a headline like 'Psychic Wins Lottery'?
wisdom.author: Jay Leno

wisdom.quote: How would it be if we discovered that aliens only stopped by earth to let their kids take a leak?
wisdom.author: Jay Leno

wisdom.quote: I went into a McDonald's yesterday and said, 'I'd like some fries.' The girl at the counter said, 'Would you like some fries with that?'
wisdom.author: Jay Leno

wisdom.quote: If God had wanted us to vote, he would have given us candidates.
wisdom.author: Jay Leno

wisdom.quote: Now there are more overweight people in America than average-weight people. So overweight people are now average. Which means you've met your New Year's resolution.
wisdom.author: Jay Leno

wisdom.quote: The reason there are two senators for each state is so that one can be the designated driver.
wisdom.author: Jay Leno

wisdom.quote: I think high self-esteem is overrated. A little low self-esteem is actually quite good�Maybe you're not the best, so you should work a little harder.
wisdom.author: Jay Leno, O Magazine, February 2003

wisdom.quote: There's this big pie in show business, and you physically can't eat the whole pie. If you give everybody a slice of pie, you will still have more than enough. The real trick is not to try to get the whole pie, but to keep the biggest slice.
wisdom.author: Jay Leno, O Magazine, February 2003

wisdom.quote: You cannot be mad at somebody who makes you laugh - it's as simple as that.
wisdom.author: Jay Leno, O Magazine, February 2003

wisdom.quote: To believe with certainty we must begin with doubting.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw Leszczynski

wisdom.quote: Personality can open doors, but only character can keep them open.
wisdom.author: Elmer G. Letterman

wisdom.quote: Do not ask God the way to heaven; he will show you the hardest one.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec

wisdom.quote: If you are not a psychiatrist, stay away from idiots. They are too stupid to pay a layman for his company.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec

wisdom.quote: Never lie when the truth is more profitable.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec

wisdom.quote: Thoughts, like fleas, jump from man to man, but they don't bite everybody.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec

wisdom.quote: Advice to writers: Sometimes you just have to stop writing. Even before you begin.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec, "Unkempt Thoughts"

wisdom.quote: All is in the hands of man. Therefore wash them often.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec, "Unkempt Thoughts"

wisdom.quote: People find life entirely too time-consuming.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec, "Unkempt Thoughts"

wisdom.quote: The first condition of immortality is death.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec, "Unkempt Thoughts"

wisdom.quote: There are grammatical errors even in his silence.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec, "Unkempt Thoughts"

wisdom.quote: When you jump for joy, beware that no one moves the ground from beneath your feet.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec, "Unkempt Thoughts"

wisdom.quote: You must first have a lot of patience to learn to have patience.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec, "Unkempt Thoughts"

wisdom.quote: I am against using death as a punishment. I am also against using it as a reward.
wisdom.author: Stanislaw J. Lec, Unkempt Thoughts

wisdom.quote: All God's children are not beautiful. Most of God's children are, in fact, barely presentable.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: Ask your child what he wants for dinner only if he's buying.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: Food is an important part of a balanced diet.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: Great people talk about ideas, average people talk about things, and small people talk about wine.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: I must take issue with the term 'a mere child,' for it has been my invariable experience that the company of a mere child is infinitely preferable to that of a mere adult.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: I never took hallucinogenic drugs because I never wanted my consciousness expanded one unnecessary iota.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: I've done the calculation and your chances of winning the lottery are identical whether you play or not.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: If you are a dog and your owner suggests that you wear a sweater, suggest that he wear a tail.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: In real life, I assure you, there is no such thing as algebra.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: Life is something that happens when you can't get to sleep.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: My favorite animal is steak.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: No animal should ever jump up on the dining-room furniture unless absolutely certain that he can hold his own in the conversation.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: Special-interest publications should realize that if they are attracting enough advertising and readers to make a profit, the interest is not so special.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: Success didn't spoil me, I've always been insufferable.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: The opposite of talking isn't listening. The opposite of talking is waiting.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: Your life story would not make a good book. Don't even try.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz

wisdom.quote: Humility is no substitute for a good personality.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz, Metropolitan Life, 1978

wisdom.quote: Remember that as a teenager you are at the last stage of your life when you will be happy to hear that the phone is for you.
wisdom.author: Fran Lebowitz, Social Studies (1981)

wisdom.quote: You don't have to be anti-man to be pro-woman.
wisdom.author: Jane Galvin Lewis

wisdom.quote: Mortal lovers must not try to remain at the first step; for lasting passion is the dream of a harlot and from it we wake in despair.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis, 'The Pilgrim's Regress'

wisdom.quote: Every poem can be considered in two ways--as what the poet has to say, and as a thing which he makes.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis, A preface to "Paradise Lost"

wisdom.quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis, http://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/authors/c/c_s_lewis.html

wisdom.quote: If we discover a desire within us that nothing in this world can satisfy, also we should begin to wonder if perhaps we were created for another world.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis, Mere Christianity

wisdom.quote: No Christian and, indeed, no historian could accept the epigram which defines religion as 'what a man does with his solitude.'
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis, The Weight of Glory

wisdom.quote: I quit therapy because my analyst was trying to help me behind my back.
wisdom.author: Richard Lewis

wisdom.quote: Advertising is a valuable economic factor because it is the cheapest way of selling goods, particularly if the goods are worthless.
wisdom.author: Sinclair Lewis

wisdom.quote: Intellectually, I know that America is no better than any other country; emotionally I know she is better than every other country.
wisdom.author: Sinclair Lewis

wisdom.quote: People will buy anything that is one to a customer.
wisdom.author: Sinclair Lewis

wisdom.quote: Oh, I don't blame Congress. If I had $600 billion at my disposal, I'd be irresponsible, too.
wisdom.author: Lichty and Wagner

wisdom.quote: The reason there is so little crime in Germany is that it's against the law.
wisdom.author: Alex Levin

wisdom.quote: When I was twelve, I went hunting with my father and we shot a bird. He was laying there and something struck me. Why do we call this fun to kill this creature who was as happy as I was when I woke up this morning.
wisdom.author: Marv Levy

wisdom.quote: A lot of people mistake a short memory for a clear conscience.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: Accomplishing the impossible means only that the boss will add it to your regular duties.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: Few things are more satisfying than seeing your own children have teenagers of their own.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: Home computers are being called upon to perform many new functions, including the consumption of homework formerly eaten by the dog.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: If all the cars in the United States were placed end to end, it would probably be Labor Day Weekend.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: If people concentrated on the really important things in life, there'd be a shortage of fishing poles.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: If the English language made any sense, a catastrophe would be an apostrophe with fur.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: Instead of giving a politician the keys to the city, it might be better to change the locks.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: Spring is when you feel like whistling even with a shoe full of slush.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: The aging process has you firmly in its grasp if you never get the urge to throw a snowball.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: The cat could very well be man's best friend but would never stoop to admitting it.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: The only nice thing about being imperfect is the joy it brings to others.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: The surprising thing about young fools is how many survive to become old fools.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: What some people mistake for the high cost of living is really the cost of high living.
wisdom.author: Doug Larson

wisdom.quote: The only cure for grief is action.
wisdom.author: George Henry Lewes

wisdom.quote: Man has six organs to serve him and he is master only of three. He cannot control his eye, ear or nose, but he can his mouth, hand and foot.
wisdom.author: Leone Levi

wisdom.quote: One voice can enter ten ears, but ten voices cannot enter one ear.
wisdom.author: Leone Levi

wisdom.quote: A successful individual typically sets his next goal somewhat but not too much above his last achievement. In this way he steadily raises his level of aspiration.
wisdom.author: Kurt Lewin

wisdom.quote: If you don't think your life is worth more than someone else's, sign your donor card and kill yourself now.
wisdom.author: Matthew V. Lewis, House M.D., Last Resort, 2008

wisdom.quote: If you can attain repose and calm, believe that you have seized happiness.
wisdom.author: Julie-Jeanne-Eleonore de Lespinasse, O Magazine, October 2002

wisdom.quote: Nobody will believe in you unless you believe in yourself.
wisdom.author: Liberace

wisdom.quote: Duty then is the sublimest word in the English language. You should do your duty in all things. You can never do more, you should never wish to do less.
wisdom.author: Robert E. Lee

wisdom.quote: To be a good soldier, you must love the army. To be a good commander, you must be willing to order the death of the thing you love.
wisdom.author: Robert E. Lee, Conversation with Gen. Longstreet

wisdom.quote: Strike the tent.
wisdom.author: Robert E. Lee, last words, 12 October 1870.

wisdom.quote: You cannot be a true man until you learn to obey.
wisdom.author: Robert E. Lee, Lee to students at washington college

wisdom.quote: True patriotism sometimes requires of men to act exactly contrary, at one period, to that which it does at another, and the motive which impels themthe desire to do rightis precisely the same.
wisdom.author: Robert E. Lee, Letter to General P. G. T. Beauregard, October 3, 1865

wisdom.quote: It is well that war is so terrible - otherwise we would grow too fond of it.
wisdom.author: Robert E. Lee, Statement at the Battle of Fredericksburg (13th December 1862)

wisdom.quote: A pessimist sees only the dark side of the clouds, and mopes; a philosopher sees both sides, and shrugs; an optimist doesn't see the clouds at all - he's walking on them.
wisdom.author: Leonard Louis Levinson

wisdom.quote: He's a fine friend. He stabs you in the front.
wisdom.author: Leonard Louis Levinson

wisdom.quote: History is the short trudge from Adam to atom.
wisdom.author: Leonard Louis Levinson

wisdom.quote: There is no place in nature for extinction.
wisdom.author: Licretius

wisdom.quote: Obviously crime pays, or there'd be no crime.
wisdom.author: G. Gordon Liddy

wisdom.quote: When a book and a head collide and there is a hollow sound, is it always from the book?
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: With most men, unbelief in one thing springs from blind belief in another.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: Marvelous Truth, confront us at every turn, in every guise.
wisdom.author: Denise Levertov

wisdom.quote: You only live once - but if you work it right, once is enough.
wisdom.author: Joe E. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Be still when you have nothing to say; when genuine passion moves you, say what you've got to say, and say it hot.
wisdom.author: D. H. Lawrence

wisdom.quote: For whereas the mind works in possibilities, the intuitions work in actualities, and what you intuitively desire, that is possible to you. Whereas what you mentally or "consciously" desire is nine times out of ten impossible; hitch your wagon to star, or you will just stay where you are.
wisdom.author: D. H. Lawrence

wisdom.quote: How beautiful maleness is, if it finds its right expression.
wisdom.author: D. H. Lawrence

wisdom.quote: I never saw a wild thing sorry for itself. A bird will fall frozen dead from a bough without ever having felt sorry for itself.
wisdom.author: D. H. Lawrence

wisdom.quote: It is a fine thing to establish one's own religion in one's heart, not to be dependent on tradition and second-hand ideals. Life will seem to you, later, not a lesser, but a greater thing.
wisdom.author: D. H. Lawrence

wisdom.quote: Men can such the heady juice of exalted self-importance from the bitter weed of failure--failures are usually the most conceited of men.
wisdom.author: D. H. Lawrence

wisdom.quote: Everyone has a purpose in life. Perhaps yours is watching television.
wisdom.author: David Letterman

wisdom.quote: Fall is my favorite season in Los Angeles, watching the birds change color and fall from the trees.
wisdom.author: David Letterman

wisdom.quote: I'm just trying to make a smudge on the collective unconscious.
wisdom.author: David Letterman

wisdom.quote: New York now leads the world's great cities in the number of people around whom you shouldn't make a sudden move.
wisdom.author: David Letterman

wisdom.quote: Sometimes when you look in his eyes you get the feeling that someone else is driving.
wisdom.author: David Letterman

wisdom.quote: There's no business like show business, but there are several businesses like accounting.
wisdom.author: David Letterman

wisdom.quote: Traffic signals in New York are just rough guidelines.
wisdom.author: David Letterman

wisdom.quote: USA Today has come out with a new survey - apparently, three out of every four people make up 75% of the population.
wisdom.author: David Letterman

wisdom.quote: A dollar saved is a quarter earned.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: Behind the phony tinsel of Hollywood lies the real tinsel.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: Happiness isn't something you experience; it's something you remember.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: I am no more humble than my talents require.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: I envy people who drink. At least they have something to blame everything on.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: I once said cynically of a politician, 'He'll doublecross that bridge when he comes to it.'
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: I'm going to memorize your name and throw my head away.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: So little time and so little to do.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: The only difference between the Democrats and the Republicans is that the Democrats allow the poor to be corrupt, too.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: There's a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: Underneath this flabby exterior is an enormous lack of character.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: What the world needs is more geniuses with humility, there are so few of us left.
wisdom.author: Oscar Levant

wisdom.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: As I would not be a slave, so I would not be a master. This expresses my idea of democracy.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak out and remove all doubt.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: Discourage litigation. Persuade your neighbors to compromise whenever you can. As a peacemaker the lawyer has superior opportunity of being a good man. There will still be business enough.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: Force is all-conquering, but its victories are short-lived.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: He can compress the most words into the smallest ideas of any man I ever met.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: Human action can be modified to some extent, but human nature cannot be changed.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: I am a firm believer in the people. If given the truth, they can be depended upon to meet any national crises. The great point is to bring them the real facts.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: I don't think much of a man who is not wiser than he was yesterday.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: I will prepare and some day my chance will come.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: If you would win a man to your cause, first convince him that you are his sincere friend.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: It is difficult to make a man miserable while he feels worthy of himself and claims kindred to the great God who made him.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: Let me not be understood as saying that there are no bad laws, nor that grievances may not arise for the redress of which no legal provisions have been made. I mean to say no such thing. But I do mean to say that although bad laws, if they exist, should be repealed as soon as possible, still, while they continue in force, for the sake of example they should be religiously observed.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: Most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: No man has a good enough memory to make a successful liar.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: No man is good enough to govern another man without that other's consent.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: A man can no more diminish God's glory by refusing to worship Him than a lunatic can put out the sun by scribbling the word 'darkness' on the walls of his cell.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Aim at heaven and you will get earth thrown in. Aim at earth and you get neither.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Can a mortal ask questions which God finds unanswerable? Quite easily, I should think. All nonsense questions are unanswerable.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues , but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Do not let us mistake necessary evils for good.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Don't use words too big for the subject. Don't say 'infinitely' when you mean 'very'; otherwise you'll have no word left when you want to talk about something really infinite.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Education without values, as useful as it is, seems rather to make man a more clever devil.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Eros will have naked bodies; Friendship naked personalities.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Even in literature and art, no man who bothers about originality will ever be original: whereas if you simply try to tell the truth (without caring twopence how often it has been told before) you will, nine times out of ten, become original without ever having noticed it.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another: What! You too? I thought I was the only one.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: If you look for truth, you may find comfort in the end; if you look for comfort you will not get either comfort or truth only soft soap and wishful thinking to begin, and in the end, despair.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: It is hard to have patience with people who say "There is no death" or "Death doesn't matter." There is death. And whatever is matters. And whatever happens has consequences, and it and they are irrevocable and irreversible. You might as well say that birth doesn't matter.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: It's so much easier to pray for a bore than to go and see one.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: The trouble about trying to make yourself stupider than you really are is that you very often succeed.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: There are only two kinds of people in the end: those who say to God, 'Thy will be done,' and those to whom God says, in the end, 'Thy will be done.'
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: Try to say the very thing you really mean, the whole of it, nothing more or less or other than what you really mean. That is the whole are and joy of words.
wisdom.author: C. S. Lewis

wisdom.quote: A book is a mirror; if an ass peers into it, you can not expect an apostle to peer out.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: A person reveals his character by nothing so clearly as the joke he resents.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: Don't judge a man by his opinions, but what his opinions have made of him.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: Everyone is a genius at least once a year. The real geniuses simply have their bright ideas closer together.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: Everyone is a genius at least once a year; a real genius has his original ideas closer together.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: First there is a time when we believe everything, then for a little while we believe with discrimination, then we believe nothing whatever, and then we believe everything again - and, moreover, give reasons why we believe.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: He who is in love with himself has at least this advantage - he won't encounter many rivals.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: Judge men not by their opinions, but by what their opinions have made of them.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: Nothing is more conducive to peace of mind than not having any opinion at all.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: Nothing is more conducive to peace of mind than not having any opinions at all.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: One of the greatest creations of the human mind is the art of reviewing books without having read them.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: One's first step in wisdom is to question everything - and one's last is to come to terms with everything.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: Perhaps in time the so-called Dark Ages will be thought of as including our own.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: The human tendency to regard little things as important has produced very many great things.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: The proof that man is the noblest of all creatures is that no other creature has ever denied it.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: The worst thing you can possibly do is worrying and thinking about what you could have done.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: There are people who think that everything one does with a serious face is sensible.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: To do just the opposite is also a form of imitation.
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: What a blessing it would be if we could open and shut our ears as easily as we open and shut our eyes!
wisdom.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

wisdom.quote: Because I am a woman, I must make unusual efforts to succeed. If I fail, no one will say, 'She doesn't have what it takes.' They will say, 'Women don't have what it takes.'
wisdom.author: Clare Booth Luce

wisdom.quote: Censorship, like charity, should begin at home; but, unlike charity, it should end there.
wisdom.author: Clare Booth Luce

wisdom.quote: Lying increases the creative faculties, expands the ego, and lessens the frictions of social contacts.
wisdom.author: Clare Booth Luce

wisdom.quote: There are no hopeless situations; there are only men who have grown hopeless about them.
wisdom.author: Clare Booth Luce

wisdom.quote: No good deed goes unpunished.
wisdom.author: Clare Booth Luce, in H. Faber, The Book of Laws, 1980

wisdom.quote: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount.
wisdom.author: Clare Booth Luce, in Reader's Digest, 1979

wisdom.quote: A poet must need be before his own age, to be even with posterity.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: All the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single lovely action.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: Creativity is not the finding of a thing, but the making something out of it after it is found.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: Democracy gives every man the right to be his own oppressor.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: Democracy is that form of society, no matter what its political classification, in which every man has a chance and knows that he has it.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: Folks never understand the folks they hate.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: In creating, the only hard thing is to begin: a grass blade's no easier to make than an oak.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: Mishaps are like knives, that either serve us or cut us, as we grasp them by the blade or the handle.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: Sincerity is impossible, unless it pervades the whole being, and the pretence of it saps the very foundation of character.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: There is no good arguing with the inevitible. The only argument available with an east wind is to put on your overcoat.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: They are slaves who fear to speak,For the fallen and the weak.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: Toward no crime have men shown themselves so cold-bloodedly cruel as in punishing differences of belief.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: Truth, after all, wears a different face to everybody, and it would be too tedious to wait till all were agreed.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: Whatever you may be sure of, be sure of this, that you are dreadfully like other people.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: Whatever you may be sure of, be sure of this-that you are dreadfully like other people.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell

wisdom.quote: This imputation of inconsistency is one to which every sound politician and every honest thinker must sooner or later subject himself. The foolish and the dead alone never change their opinion.
wisdom.author: James Russell Lowell, My Study Windows,1899

wisdom.quote: I want to believe in intelligent design, and hence I am suspicious of anything that seems to confirm my desire to believe.
wisdom.author: James Lileks, The Bleat web log, September 15, 2003

wisdom.quote: A Children�s Museum, however, is more of a Funatorium. You are encouraged to touch things, which is poor training for subsequent museum visitation.
wisdom.author: James Lileks, The Bleat, 03-20-2006

wisdom.quote: Do not hold as gold all that shines as gold.
wisdom.author: Alain de Lille, Parabolae

wisdom.quote: In the province of the mind, what one believes to be true either is true or becomes true.
wisdom.author: John Lilly

wisdom.quote: Real freedom lies in wildness, not in civilization.
wisdom.author: Charles Lindbergh

wisdom.quote: I realized that If I had to choose, I would rather have birds than airplanes.
wisdom.author: Charles Lindbergh, Interview shortly before his death, 1974

wisdom.quote: All my businesses are scrupulously legal. Not because I have any moral problems with crime. It just makes my life easier to obey the law. Crime is for poor people; you don't need to rob the bank if you own it.
wisdom.author: Josh Lieb, I am a Genius of Unspeakable Evil and I Want to be Your Class President, 2009

wisdom.quote: Fahrenheit 451 is one of those books that is about how amazing books are and how amazing the people who write books are. Writers love writing books like this, and for some reason, we let them get away with it.
wisdom.author: Josh Lieb, I am a Genius of Unspeakable Evil and I Want to be Your Class President, 2009

wisdom.quote: Gratitude can sometimes be as annoying as whininess.
wisdom.author: Josh Lieb, I am a Genius of Unspeakable Evil and I Want to be Your Class President, 2009

wisdom.quote: I am amused when goody-goodies proclaim, from the safety of their armchairs, that children are naturally prejudice-free, that they only learn to "hate" from listening to bigoted adults. Nonsense. Tolerance is a learned trait, like riding a bike or playing the piano. Those of us who actually live among children, who see them in their natural environment, know the truth: Left to their own devices, children will gang up on and abuse anyone who is even slightly different from the norm.
wisdom.author: Josh Lieb, I am a Genius of Unspeakable Evil and I Want to be Your Class President, 2009

wisdom.quote: Important days don't look like anything special when they start. Invariably, the sun rises and people wake up. Coffee is swilled and eggs are swallowed. Everybody goes about the business of acting like their lives matter and then, no matter how important the events of the day end up being, the sun invariably sets. The sun rose before the soldiers stormed Omaha Beach on D-Day, and the sun set after Archduke Franz Ferdinand was killed. Sunrises and sunsets are real jerks about putting things in perspective.
wisdom.author: Josh Lieb, I am a Genius of Unspeakable Evil and I Want to be Your Class President, 2009

wisdom.quote: Insanity is just what we call stupidity when it doesn't make sense.
wisdom.author: Josh Lieb, I am a Genius of Unspeakable Evil and I Want to be Your Class President, 2009

wisdom.quote: It doesn't pay to be good at something unless you are the absolute best at it.
wisdom.author: Josh Lieb, I am a Genius of Unspeakable Evil and I Want to be Your Class President, 2009

wisdom.quote: It's interesting, on your second day of existence, to realize that your father is going to blame all the future failures of his life on you.
wisdom.author: Josh Lieb, I am a Genius of Unspeakable Evil and I Want to be Your Class President, 2009

wisdom.quote: You don't have to be a genius when you're surrounded by morons.
wisdom.author: Josh Lieb, I am a Genius of Unspeakable Evil and I Want to be Your Class President, 2009

wisdom.quote: A simple enough pleasure, surely, to have breakfast alone with one's husband, but how seldom married people in the midst of life achieve it.
wisdom.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

wisdom.quote: Arranging a bowl of flowers in the morning can give a sense of quiet in a crowded day - like writing a poem, or saying a prayer.
wisdom.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

wisdom.quote: Perhaps I am a bear, or some hibernating animal underneath, for the instinct to be half asleep all winter is so strong in me.
wisdom.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

wisdom.quote: Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee and just as hard to sleep after.
wisdom.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh, 'Gift From the Sea'

wisdom.quote: Courage is the power to let go of the familiar.
wisdom.author: Raymond Lindquist

wisdom.quote: Engineering is the practice of safe and economic application of the scientific laws governing the forces and materials of nature by means of organization, design and construction, for the general benefit of mankind.
wisdom.author: S. E. Lindsay, 1920

wisdom.quote: Easy is an adjective used to describe a woman who has the sexual morals of a man.
wisdom.author: Nancy Linn-Desmond

wisdom.quote: I do beseech you to direct your efforts more to preparing youth for the path and less to preparing the path for the youth.
wisdom.author: Ben Lindsey

wisdom.quote: If writers stopped writing about what happened to them, then there would be a lot of empty pages.
wisdom.author: Elaine Liner, We Got Naked, Now What, SXSW 2006

wisdom.quote: Tact is the ability to describe others as they see themselves.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: That some should be rich, shows that others may become rich, and, hence, is just encouragement to industry and enterprise.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: The probability that we may fail in the struggle ought not to deter us from the support of a cause we believe to be just.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: There has never been but one question in all civilization-how to keep a few men from saying to many men: You work and earn bread and we will eat it.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: When the conduct of men is designed to be influenced, persuasion, kind unassuming persuasion, should ever be adopted. It is an old and true maxim that 'a drop of honey catches more flies than a gallon of gall.' So with men. If you would win a man to your cause, first convince him that you are his sincere friend. Therein is a drop of honey that catches his heart, which, say what he will, is the great highroad to his reason, and which, once gained, you will find but little trouble in convincing him of the justice of your cause, if indeed that cause is really a good one.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: When you have got an elephant by the hind leg, and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: You may deceive all the people part of the time, and part of the people all the time, but not all the people all the time.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln

wisdom.quote: 'Tis better to be silent and be thought a fool, than to speak and remove all doubt.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln, (attributed)

wisdom.quote: When I do good, I feel good; when I do bad, I feel bad, and that is my religion.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln, (attributed)

wisdom.quote: You can fool some of the people all of the time, and all of the people some of the time, but you can not fool all of the people all of the time.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln, (attributed)

wisdom.quote: The dogmas of the quiet past, are inadequate to the stormy present. The occasion is piled high with difficulty, and we must rise with the occasion. As our case is new, so we must think anew and act anew. We must disenthrall ourselves, and then we shall save our country.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln, Annual message to Congress, December 1, 1862

wisdom.quote: There is an important sense in which government is distinctive from administration. One is perpetual, the other is temporary and changeable. A man may be loyal to his government and yet oppose the particular principles and methods of administration.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln, Congressional Record, April 15, 1942

wisdom.quote: While the people retain their virtue, and vigilance, no administration, by any extreme of wickedness or folly, can very seriously injure the government, in the short space of four years.
wisdom.author: Abraham Lincoln, First Inaugural Adress, march 4, 1861

wisdom.quote: I do the very best I know how-the very best I can; and I mean to keep doing so until the end. If the end brings me out all right, what is said against me won't amount to anything. If the end brings me out wrong, ten angels swearing I was right would make no difference.
